SA15dhkpvsvu:00105_0: na anarthy eva subhāṣitaiḥ parigato vidveṣṭy api īrṣyā-malaiḥ //
SA15dhkpvsvu:00106_0: tena ayaṃ na para-upakāra iti naś cintā api cetaś ciraṃ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:00110_0: pakṣa-dharmas tad-aṃśena vyāpto hetus tridhā eva saḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:00112_0: pakṣo dharmī / avayave samudāya-upacārāt / prayojana-abhāvād anupacāra
SA15dhkpvsvu:00202_0: iti cet / na / dṛṣṭānta-dharmiṇo api pratyāsatteḥ / tad-aṃśa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:00204_0: parigrahaḥ / siddhe punar vacanaṃ niyama-artham āśaṅkyeta /
SA15dhkpvsvu:00205_0: sajātīya eva sattvam iti siddhe api vijātīya-vyatireke sādhya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:00207_0: gaurava-parihāra-arthaṃ ca pakṣa-vacanam / pakṣasya dharmatve tad-
SA15dhkpvsvu:00208_0: viśeṣaṇa-apekṣasya anyatra ananuvṛtter asādhāraṇatā iti cet / na / ayogavyavacchedena
SA15dhkpvsvu:00209_0: viśeṣaṇāt / yathā caitro dhanurdharaḥ / na anyayogavyavacchedena /
SA15dhkpvsvu:00211_0: tad-aṃśas tad-dharmaḥ / vaktur abhiprāya-vaśāt / na tad-eka-deśaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:00212_0: pakṣa-śabdena samudāya-avacanāt / vyāptir vyāpakasya tatra bhāva
SA15dhkpvsvu:00213_0: eva / vyāpyasya vā tatra eva bhāvaḥ etena avayava-vyatirekau yathāsvaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:00214_0: pramāṇena niścitāv uktau pakṣa-dharmaś ca / ta ete kārya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:00215_0: svabhāva-anupalabdhi-lakṣaṇās trayo hetavaḥ / yathā agnir atra dhūmāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:00216_0: vṛkṣo ayaṃ śiṃśapātvāt / pradeśa-viśeṣe kvacin na ghaṭa upalabdhi-
SA15dhkpvsvu:00218_0: eva syān na anyathā / tena upalabdhi-lakṣaṇa-prāpta-sattvasya ity uktaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:00219_0: bhavati / tatra dvau vastu-sādhanau ekaḥ pratiṣedha-hetuḥ / svabhāvapratibandhe
SA15dhkpvsvu:00220_0: hi saty artho arthaṃ na vyabhicarati / sa ca
SA15dhkpvsvu:00222_0: na / dharma-bheda-parikalpanād iti vakṣyāmaḥ / tathā ca āha / sarva
SA15dhkpvsvu:00301_0: bhedena iti / bhedo dharma-dharmitayā buddhy-ākāra-kṛto na artho
SA15dhkpvsvu:00303_0: kalpita-viṣayād artha-pratītāv anartha-pratilambha eva syāt / kāryasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:00305_0: etau dvāv anumeya-pratyayau sākṣād anutpatter atat-pratibhāsitve
SA15dhkpvsvu:00306_0: api tadutpattes tad-vyabhicāriṇāv iti pramāṇaṃ pratyakṣa-vat /
SA15dhkpvsvu:00307_0: pratyakṣasya api hy artha-avyabhicāra eva prāmāṇyam / tad -abhāve
SA15dhkpvsvu:00308_0: bhāvinas tad-vipralambhāt / avyabhicāraś ca anyasya ko anyas tadutpatteḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:00316_0: tat-kāryatva-niyamāt tair eva dharmair ye tair vinā na bhavati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:00317_0: aṃśena janyajanakatva-prasaṅga iti cet / na / taj-janya-viśeṣa-grahaṇe
SA15dhkpvsvu:00402_0: hetur iti vartate / tādātmyaṃ hi arthasya tan-mātra-anurodhini eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:00403_0: na anyā āyatte / tad-bhāve abhūtasya paścād bhāva-niyama-abhāvāt / kāraṇānāṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:00409_0: iti idaṃ sad-asat-pratiṣedha-vidhi-hetvos tulyaṃ rūpam / tathā
SA15dhkpvsvu:00410_0: hi sattvam upalabdhir eva vastu-yogyatā-lakṣaṇā tad-āśrayā vā
SA15dhkpvsvu:00414_0: hetur anupalabdhiḥ / bhedo asyā viśeṣaṇam upalabdhi-lakṣaṇa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:00415_0: prāpta-sattvam / atra anupalabdher liṅgād asattāyām upalabdher
SA15dhkpvsvu:00416_0: abhāvo api anyayā anupalabdhyā sādhya iti anavasthānād apratipattiḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:00417_0: syāt / atha upalabdhy-abhāvo vinā anupalabdhyā syāt / tathā
SA15dhkpvsvu:00418_0: sattā abhāvo api syāt / apārthika-anupalabdhiḥ / atha anya-upalabdhyā
SA15dhkpvsvu:00419_0: anupalabdhi-siddhir iti pratyakṣa-siddhā anupalabdhiḥ / tathā anya-sattayā
SA15dhkpvsvu:00420_0: asattā kiṃ na sidhyati iti / yadā punar evaṃvidhā anupalabdhir
SA15dhkpvsvu:00421_0: eva asatām asattā tadā siddhe api viṣaye mohād viṣayiṇo
SA15dhkpvsvu:00423_0: samaye pravartyate / yathā gaur ayam sāsnā-ādi-samudāya-ātmakatvād
SA15dhkpvsvu:00424_0: iti / tathā ca dṛṣṭānta-asiddhi-codanā api prativyūḍhā
SA15dhkpvsvu:00505_0: uktā / na tu vyatireka-darśana-ādāv upayujyate / saṃśayāt / dvitīyā
SA15dhkpvsvu:00506_0: tv atra pramāṇaṃ niścaya-phalatvāt / sā ca prayoga-bhedāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:00509_0: yāvān kaścit pratiṣedhaḥ sa sarvo anupalabdheḥ / tathā hi sa dvidhā
SA15dhkpvsvu:00510_0: kriyeta kasyacid vidhinā niṣedhena vā / vidhau viruddho vā vidhīyeta
SA15dhkpvsvu:00514_0: abhāvād virodha-gatiḥ / sa ca anupalabdheḥ / anyonya-upalabdhi-parihāra-
SA15dhkpvsvu:00515_0: sthita-lakṣaṇatā vā virodho nitya-anityatva-vat / tatra apy eka-upalabdhyā
SA15dhkpvsvu:00516_0: anya-anupalabdhir eva ucyate / anyathā aniṣiddha-upalabdher abhāva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:00517_0: asiddheḥ / ekasya niṣedhena anya-abhāva-sādhane siddhā eva anupalabdhiḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:00519_0: kārya-kāraṇayor anubhavasya vā / tatra anubhavasya apratibandhāt tad-
SA15dhkpvsvu:00520_0: abhāve anyena na bhavitavyam iti kuta etat / kārya-anupalabdhāv
SA15dhkpvsvu:00521_0: api na avaśyaṃ kāraṇā api tadvanti bhavanti iti tad-abhāvaḥ kutaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:00522_0: tasmāt kāraṇa-anupalabdhir eva abhāvaṃ gamayati iti / svabhāva-anupalabdhis
SA15dhkpvsvu:00523_0: tu svayam asattā eva / tatra kevalaṃ viṣayī sādhyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:00524_0: asyām api yadā vyāpaka-dharma-anupalabdhyā vyāpya-abhāvam āha
SA15dhkpvsvu:00525_0: tadā abhāvo api iti / iyaṃ pratiṣedha-viṣaya-anupalabdhiḥ prayoga-
SA15dhkpvsvu:00601_0: bhedena caturdhā bhavati / viruddha-siddhyā yathā na śīta-sparśo
SA15dhkpvsvu:00602_0: atra agneḥ / etena vyāpaka-viruddha-siddhir uktā veditavyā yathā
SA15dhkpvsvu:00603_0: na tuṣāra-sparśo atra agneḥ / viruddha-kārya-siddhyā yathā na śīta-
SA15dhkpvsvu:00604_0: sparśo atra dhūmāt / hetv-asiddhyā yathā na atra dhūmo anagneḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:00605_0: svabhāva-asiddhyā yathā na atra dhūmo anupalabdheḥ / etena vyāpaka-
SA15dhkpvsvu:00606_0: svabhāva-asiddher uktā yathā na atra śiṃśapā vṛkṣā-abhāvāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:00607_0: sarvatra ca asyām abhāva-sādhanyām anupalabdhau dṛśya-ātmanām eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:00608_0: teṣāṃ tad-viruddhānāṃ ca siddhir asiddhiś ca veditavyā / anyeṣām
SA15dhkpvsvu:00613_0: yathā na śīta-sparśo atra kāṣṭhād iti / nimittayoḥ punar virodhe
SA15dhkpvsvu:00614_0: gamikā eva yathā na asya roma-harṣa-ādi-viśeṣāḥ santi saṃnihita-dahana-
SA15dhkpvsvu:00615_0: viśeṣatvāt etena tat kāryād api tad-viruddha-kārya-abhāva-gatir
SA15dhkpvsvu:00616_0: uktā veditavyā yathā na roma-harṣa-ādi-viśeṣa-yukta-puruṣavān ayaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:00617_0: pradeśo dhūmāt / iyaṃ ca hetv-asiddhyā eva tad-viruddha-siddhiḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:00618_0: prāg eva nirdiṣṭā iti iyaṃ prayoga-bhedād aṣṭadhā-anupalabdhiḥ / tatra
SA15dhkpvsvu:00621_0: anyathā vyabhicāri syād bhasmā iva aśīta-sādhane //6//
SA15dhkpvsvu:00622_0: yas tarhi samagreṇa hetunā kārya-utpādo anumīyate sa kathaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:00626_0: asāv api yathā asaṃnihitān na anyam apekṣata iti tan-mātra-anubandhī
SA15dhkpvsvu:00627_0: svabhāvo bhāvasya / tatra hi kevalaṃ samagrāt kāraṇāt kārya-utpatti-
SA15dhkpvsvu:00629_0: yogyatā ca sāmagrī-mātra-anubandhinī iti svabhāva-bhūtā eva anumīyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:00701_0: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ sāmagryāḥ kāryam eva na anumīyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:00705_0: na hi samagrāṇi ity eva kāraṇa-dravyāṇi sva-kāryaṃ janayanti sāmagrī-
SA15dhkpvsvu:00707_0: antare ca pratibandha-sambhavān na kārya-anumānam / yogyatāyās
SA15dhkpvsvu:00708_0: tu dravya-antara-anapekṣatvān na virudhyate anumānam / uttarottara-
SA15dhkpvsvu:00710_0: śakti-pariṇāma-pratyayasya anyasya apekṣaṇīyasya abhāvād iti / pūrva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:00712_0: ity ucyate / yā tarhy akāryakāraṇabhūtena anyena rasa-ādinā rūpa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:00716_0: tatra hetur eva tathābhūto anumīyate / pravṛtta-śakti-rūpa-upādāna-
SA15dhkpvsvu:00717_0: kāraṇa-sahakāri-pratyayo hi rasa-hetū rasaṃ janayati / indhana-vikāra-
SA15dhkpvsvu:00801_0: na vinā rasaḥ sa eva anya-kāraṇam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:00804_0: rasa utpannas tathābhūtam anumāpayan rūpam anumāpayati
SA15dhkpvsvu:00812_0: tena na anyo hetur gamako asti / apratibaddha-svabhāvasya avinābhāva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:00814_0: varṣa-ādy-anumānam uktam / tatra api bhūta-pariṇāma eva varṣa-hetuḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:00816_0: hetunā tv asamagreṇa yat kāryam anumīyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:00818_0: samagrāṇy eva hi kāraṇāni yogyatām apy anumāpayanty asamagrasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:00822_0: na kevalānāṃ sāmarthyam asti iti / vipakṣa-vṛtter adṛṣṭāv api
SA15dhkpvsvu:00903_0: na hi rāga-ādīnām eva kāryaṃ spandana-vacana-ādayaḥ vaktukāmatā-
SA15dhkpvsvu:00904_0: sāmānya-hetutvāt / sa eva rāga iti cet iṣṭatvān na kiṃcid bādhitaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:00906_0: cetaso abhiṣvaṅgaṃ rāgam āhuḥ / na evaṃ karuṇā-ādayo anyathā
SA15dhkpvsvu:00907_0: api sambhavād iti nivedayiṣyāmaḥ / atra yathā rakto bravīti
SA15dhkpvsvu:00908_0: tathā virakto api iti vacana-mātrād apratipattiḥ / na api viśeṣāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:00910_0: prayojana-abhāvād avyāhāra iti cet na parārthatvāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:00911_0: na yukto vīta-rāgatvād iti cet na karuṇā api vṛtteḥ / sa eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:00912_0: rāga iti cet / iṣṭam / aviparyāsa-samudbhavān na doṣaḥ / asaty
SA15dhkpvsvu:00914_0: bhavaty eva karuṇā / tathā hi / sattva-dharma-ādy-ālambanā maitry-ādaya
SA15dhkpvsvu:00915_0: iṣyante / etāś ca sajātīya-abhyāsa-vṛttayo na rāga-apekṣiṇyaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:00916_0: na evaṃ rāga-ādayo viparyāsa-abhāve abhāvāt / kāruṇikasya api
SA15dhkpvsvu:00917_0: niṣphala ārambho aviparyāsād iti cet / na / parārthasya eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:00918_0: phalatvena iṣṭatvāt / icchā-lakṣaṇatvāt phalasya / sarvathā abhūta-
SA15dhkpvsvu:00919_0: asamāropān nirdoṣaḥ / tad-anyena doṣavattva-sādhane na kiṃcid
SA15dhkpvsvu:00920_0: aniṣṭam / vaktary ātmani rāga-ādi-darśanena anyatra tad-anumāne
SA15dhkpvsvu:00921_0: atiprasaṅgaḥ / vyabhicārāt / ananya-anumāne iha avyabhicāra iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:01001_0: ko niścayaḥ / karaṇa-guṇa-vaktukāmate hi vacanam anumāpayet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:01003_0: atiprasaṅgaḥ uktaḥ / rāgasya anupayoge kathaṃ tac-śaktir upayujyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:01004_0: śakty-upayoge hi sa eva upayuktaḥ syāt tac ca na asti ity uktam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:01005_0: tasmān nāntarīyakam eva kāryaṃ kāraṇam anumāpayati tat-
SA15dhkpvsvu:01006_0: pratibandhāt na anyad vipakṣe adarśane api / sarva-darśino hi darśana-
SA15dhkpvsvu:01007_0: vyāvṛttiḥ sarvatra abhāvaṃ gamayet / kvacit tathā dṛṣṭānām
SA15dhkpvsvu:01008_0: api deśa-kāla-saṃskāra-bhedena anyathā adarśanād / yathā āmalakyaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:01009_0: kṣīra-avasekena madhura-phalā bhavanti / na ca evaṃ bahulaṃ dṛśyante /
SA15dhkpvsvu:01010_0: tena evaṃ syād yuktaṃ vaktum mādṛśo vaktā rāgī iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:01012_0: tadā apy apārthako vacana-udāhāraḥ / tasmād vipakṣe adṛṣṭir ahetuḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:01015_0: na hi bahulaṃ pakva-darśane api sthāly-antargamana-mātreṇa pākaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:01016_0: sidhyati / vyabhicāra-darśanāt / evaṃ tu syād evaṃ svabhāvā
SA15dhkpvsvu:01017_0: etat-samāna-pāka-hetavaḥ pakvā iti / anyathā tu śeṣavad etad anumānaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:01021_0: sa tasya vyatireko na niścita iti vipakṣe vṛttir āśaṅkyeta / vyatireka-
SA15dhkpvsvu:01023_0: gamikā / tasmād eka-nivṛttyā anya-nivṛttim icchatā tayoḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:01024_0: kaścit svabhāvapratibandho apy eṣṭavyaḥ / anyathā agamako
SA15dhkpvsvu:01026_0: hetos triṣu api rūpeṣu niścayas tena varṇitaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:01028_0: na hy asati pratibandhe anvaya-vyatireka-niścayo asti / tena tam
SA15dhkpvsvu:01101_0: eva darśayan niścayam āha / tatra anvayasya niścayena viruddha-
SA15dhkpvsvu:01102_0: tat pakṣyāṇāṃ nirāsaḥ / vyatirekasya anaikāntikasya tat-pakṣasya ca
SA15dhkpvsvu:01105_0: api / anyathā hy asati pratibandhe adarśana-mātreṇa vyatireke /
SA15dhkpvsvu:01107_0: yad āha / eṣa tāvan nyāyo yad ubhayaṃ vaktavyam viruddha- anaikāntika-
SA15dhkpvsvu:01113_0: na hi tasya prāg darśana-bhrāntir yā vacanena nivartyeta / smṛtir
SA15dhkpvsvu:01201_0: vāca-adarśane kriyata iti cet / darśanaṃ khalv apratīyamānam
SA15dhkpvsvu:01202_0: anaṅgam iti yuktaṃ tatra smaraṇa-ādhānam / adarśanaṃ tu darśana-
SA15dhkpvsvu:01203_0: abhāvaḥ / sa darśanena bādhyate / tad-abhāve tu siddha eva ity apārthakaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:01205_0: tāvatā na asti iti bhavati tad-arthaṃ vacanam iti cet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:01206_0: na ca na asti iti vacanāt tan na asty eva yathā yadi /
SA15dhkpvsvu:01207_0: na asti sa khyāpyate nyāyas tadā na asti iti gamyate //17//
SA15dhkpvsvu:01208_0: yady anupalabhamāno na asti iti na pratyeti vacanād api na eva pratyeṣyati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:01209_0: tad api hy anupalambham eva khyāpayati / na ca eka-anupalambho
SA15dhkpvsvu:01210_0: anya-abhāvaṃ sādhayaty atiprasaṅgāt / na ca tena
SA15dhkpvsvu:01211_0: na asti iti vacanāt tathā bhavaty atiprasaṅgāt / tat kathaṃ vaidharmya-vacanena
SA15dhkpvsvu:01213_0: tatra nyāyo vaktavyaḥ yato asya vyāvṛttam iti bhavati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:01215_0: yady adṛṣṭyā nivṛttiḥ syāc śeṣavad vyabhicāri kim /
SA15dhkpvsvu:01216_0: yathā pakvāny etāni phalāny evaṃ-rasāni vā rūpa-aviśeṣād eka-śākhā-
SA15dhkpvsvu:01217_0: prabhavatvād vā upayukta-vad iti / atra api vivakṣita-aśeṣa-pakṣīkaraṇe
SA15dhkpvsvu:01218_0: hetoḥ sādhya-abhāve anupalambho asti iti kathaṃ vyabhicāraḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:01219_0: pratyakṣa-bādhā-āśaṅkā vyabhicāra ity eke / na / pakṣīkṛta-
SA15dhkpvsvu:01220_0: viṣaye abhāvāt / kadācid bhaved iti cet / tathā śaṅkāyām atiprasaṅgaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:01221_0: anyatra apy abhāva-niyama-abhāvāt / vṛttaṃ pramāṇaṃ bādhakam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:01222_0: avṛtta-bādhane sarvatra anāśvāsaḥ / vyatirekas tu siddha
SA15dhkpvsvu:01223_0: eva sādhanam iti tathā abhāva-niścayam apekṣate / anupalambhāt tu
SA15dhkpvsvu:01224_0: kvacid abhāva-siddhāv apy apratibaddhasya tad-abhāve sarvatra
SA15dhkpvsvu:01302_0: na idaṃ nirātmakaṃ jīvaccharīram aprāṇa-ādimattva-prasaṅgād iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:01306_0: iti cet / katham idānīm ātma-siddhiḥ / parasya apy apramāṇikā
SA15dhkpvsvu:01308_0: vibhajya tatra abhāvena gamakatvaṃ kathayatā āgamikatvam
SA15dhkpvsvu:01309_0: ātmani pratipannaṃ syāt / na anumeyatvam / tasmād adarśane apy
SA15dhkpvsvu:01310_0: ātmano-nivṛtty-asiddheḥ / tan-nivṛttau kvacin nivṛttāv api prāṇa-ādīnām
SA15dhkpvsvu:01312_0: yā apy asiddhi-yojanā tathā sapakṣe sann asann ity evam-ādiṣv api
SA15dhkpvsvu:01313_0: yathāyogam udāharyam ity evam-ādikā / sā api
SA15dhkpvsvu:01315_0: anupalambha eva saṃśayāt / upalambhe tad-abhāvāt / anupalambhāc
SA15dhkpvsvu:01316_0: ca vyatireka iti saṃśayito anivāryaḥ syāt / yathāyoga-vacanāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:01317_0: anivārita eva iti cet / na / ya eva tu ubhaya-niścita-vācī ity ādi-vacanāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:01318_0: tena anupalambhe api saṃśayād anivṛttiṃ manyamānaḥ tat-pratiṣedham
SA15dhkpvsvu:01402_0: śrāvaṇatvasya api nitya-anityayor adarśanād vyāvṛttir iti tad-vyavaccheda-
SA15dhkpvsvu:01403_0: hetutā syāt / na hi tad-vyāvṛtter anyad vyavacchedanam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:01404_0: avyavacchedas tu kutaścid vyāvṛtter eva aniścayāt / yo hi yatra
SA15dhkpvsvu:01405_0: na asti iti niścitaḥ sa bhavaṃs tad-abhāvaṃ kathaṃ na gamayet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:01407_0: atha api syād ubhaya-vyavacchede pramāṇa-antaraṃ bādhakam asti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:01413_0: lakṣaṇa-yukte bādhā-asambhave tal-lakṣaṇam eva dūṣitaṃ syād iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:01415_0: darśanād anāśvāsa-prasaṅga iti cet / na / yathokte asambhavāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:01417_0: cet / anumāna-viṣaye avacanād iṣṭam / viṣayaṃ ca asya nivedayiṣyāmaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:01419_0: dṛṣṭā ayuktir adṛṣṭeś ca syāt sparśasya avirodhinī //20//
SA15dhkpvsvu:01420_0: yadi hy anupalambhena abhāvaḥ sidhyet / yad āha / yady adarśana-
SA15dhkpvsvu:01421_0: mātreṇa dṛṣṭebhyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ kriyate / na ca so api yukta
SA15dhkpvsvu:01501_0: iti / katham ayuktaḥ / anupalambhād abhāva-siddheḥ / nanu upalabdhi-
SA15dhkpvsvu:01502_0: lakṣaṇa-prāpteḥ sparśasya yukta eva pratiṣedhaḥ / na yuktaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:01504_0: gṛhītvā ayaṃ pratiṣedham āha / tatra ca tūla-upala-pallava-
SA15dhkpvsvu:01505_0: ādiṣu tad-bhāve api sparśa-bheda-darśanāt asya api kvacid viśeṣe
SA15dhkpvsvu:01506_0: sambhava-āśaṅkayā bhavitavyam iti sarvatra adarśana-mātreṇa ayuktaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:01507_0: pratiṣedha iti / evam ācāryīyaḥ kaścid anupalambhād abhāvaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:01510_0: tatra eka-dṛṣṭyā na anyatra yuktas tad-bhāva-niścayaḥ //21//
SA15dhkpvsvu:01511_0: yadi kathaṃcid vipakṣe adarśana-mātreṇa apratibaddhasya api tad-
SA15dhkpvsvu:01512_0: avyabhicāraḥ / kvacid deśe kānicid dravyāṇi kathaṃcid dṛṣṭāni
SA15dhkpvsvu:01513_0: punar anyathā anyatra dṛśyante / yathā kāścid oṣadhayaḥ kṣetra-
SA15dhkpvsvu:01514_0: viśeṣe viśiṣṭa-rasa-vīrya-vipākā bhavanti / na anyatra / tathā kāla-
SA15dhkpvsvu:01515_0: saṃskāra-bhedāt / na ca tad-deśais tathā dṛṣṭā iti sarvās tattvena
SA15dhkpvsvu:01517_0: viśeṣa-hetv-abhāve tu syād anumānam / yathā adṛṣṭa-kartṛkam api
SA15dhkpvsvu:01519_0: sarva-prakārāṇāṃ puruṣaiḥ karaṇasya darśanāt / na evam asambhavad-
SA15dhkpvsvu:01522_0: saṃskāra-bhedena viśeṣa-pratipatteḥ / tadvad anyasya api sambhavād /
SA15dhkpvsvu:01525_0: kārya-abhāvāt / sambhave api viśeṣāṇāṃ draṣṭum aśakyatvāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:01601_0: tādṛśāṃ ca apratikṣepa-arthatvāt / na evaṃ vākyāni dṛśya-viśeṣatvāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:01603_0: viśeṣāṇām anyatra api śakya-kriyatvāt / pratyakṣāṇāṃ śabdānām
SA15dhkpvsvu:01607_0: tad abhinna-svabhāvānāṃ sarveṣāṃ puruṣa-kriyā na vā kasyacit /
SA15dhkpvsvu:01610_0: sa eva anupalambhaḥ kiṃ hetv-abhāvasya sādhakaḥ //22//
SA15dhkpvsvu:01611_0: anupalambhaṃ ca asya pramāṇayata ātma-vādo nirālambaḥ syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:01614_0: kim apy asya kāraṇam asti iti / ca tv evaṃbhūtam iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:01615_0: na evaṃ sukha-ādi-kāryaṃ prasādhitaṃ kaṃcid arthaṃ puṣṇāti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:01616_0: yena kenacit kāraṇavattva-abhyupagamāt / tathā ca anupalambha
SA15dhkpvsvu:01617_0: eva ātmanaḥ syāt / taṃ tena pratyācakṣāṇaḥ kim iti prativyūḍho
SA15dhkpvsvu:01618_0: anupalambhasya asādhanatvād iti / katham asādhanaṃ vyatirekaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:01619_0: sādhayet / mṛdaḥ khalv api kaścic caitanyam anupalabhyamānam
SA15dhkpvsvu:01620_0: api icchann adarśanād vacana-āder vyāvṛttim āha / dadhy-ādikaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:01621_0: ca aparaḥ kṣīra-ādiṣv apara-artheṣu saṃghātatva-adarśanād vyatirekam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:01622_0: ko hy atra niyamaḥ saṃhatair avaśyaṃ parārthair bhavitavyam iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:01623_0: asty eva upalambho dadhy-ādīnāṃ kṣīra-ādiṣv anumānam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:01624_0: aśaktād anutpatteḥ / atha kā iyaṃ śaktiḥ sa eva bhāvaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:01625_0: uta anyad eva kiṃcit / sa eva cet tathā eva upalabhyeta viśeṣa-abhāvāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:01626_0: anyac cet katham anya-bhāve tad asti / upacāra-mātraṃ tu syād
SA15dhkpvsvu:01628_0: tasmāt tan-mātra-sambandhaḥ svabhāvo bhāvam eva vā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:01630_0: yathā vṛkṣaḥ śiṃśapāṃ / śākhā-ādimad-viśeṣasya eva kasyacit tathā-
SA15dhkpvsvu:01701_0: prasiddheḥ sa tasya svabhāvaḥ / svaṃ ca svabhāvaṃ parityajya
SA15dhkpvsvu:01702_0: kathaṃ bhāvo bhavet / svabhāvasya eva bhāvatvād iti tasya svabhāvapratibandhād
SA15dhkpvsvu:01705_0: kāraṇaṃ nivartamānaṃ kāryaṃ nivartayati / anyathā tat tasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:01706_0: kāryam eva na syāt / siddhas tu kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ svabhāvaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:01707_0: niyamayati ity ubhayathā svabhāvapratibandhād eva nivṛttiḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:01709_0: na aśvavān iti martyena na bhāvyaṃ gamatā api kim //24//
SA15dhkpvsvu:01710_0: saṃnidhānāt tathā ekasya katham anyasya saṃnidhiḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:01711_0: gomān ity eva martyena bhāvyam aśvavatā api kim //25//
SA15dhkpvsvu:01712_0: tasmāt svabhāvapratibandhād eva hetuḥ sādhyaṃ gamayati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:01713_0: sa ca tad-bhāva-lakṣaṇas tadutpatti-lakṣaṇo vā / sa eva avinābhāvo
SA15dhkpvsvu:01715_0: tasmād vaidharmya-dṛṣṭānte na iṣṭo avaśyam iha āśrayaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:01716_0: tad-abhāve ca tan na iti vacanād api tad-gateḥ //26//
SA15dhkpvsvu:01721_0: tat-svabhāvatayā khyāpyate / yaḥ kṛtakaṃ svabhāvaṃ janayati
SA15dhkpvsvu:01722_0: so anitya-svabhāvaṃ santaṃ janayati iti pramāṇaṃ dṛṣṭāntena upadarśyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:01801_0: tena ca pramāṇena sādhya-dharmasya tan-mātra-anubandhaḥ khyāpyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:01802_0: sva-kāraṇād eva kṛtakas tathābhūto jāto yo naśvaraḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:01804_0: vā tasmin saty eva bhāvād iti dṛṣṭāntena pradarśyate artha-antarasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:01805_0: tathā prasiddhe tad-bhāve hetu-bhāve vā anityatva-abhāve kṛtakatvaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:01806_0: na bhavati dahana-abhāve ca dhūmaḥ / tathā hi sa tasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:01807_0: svabhāvo hetur vā / kathaṃ svaṃ svabhāvaṃ hetuṃ vā antareṇa bhaved
SA15dhkpvsvu:01808_0: ity āśrayam antareṇa api vaidharmya-dṛṣṭānte prasidhyati vyatirekaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:01809_0: yeṣāṃ punaḥ prasiddhāv eva tad-bhāva-hetu-bhāvau teṣām
SA15dhkpvsvu:01811_0: viduṣāṃ vācyo hetur eva hi kevalaḥ //27//
SA15dhkpvsvu:01812_0: yad-arthe dṛṣṭānta ucyate so arthaḥ siddha iti kiṃ tad-vacanena
SA15dhkpvsvu:01813_0: tadā / tat-pradarśane api kiṃ vaidharmya-dṛṣṭānta-āśrayeṇa iti manyamāna
SA15dhkpvsvu:01817_0: yad āha arthāpattyā vā anyatareṇa ubhaya-pradarśanād iti / tatra api
SA15dhkpvsvu:01819_0: eka-vacanena dvitīya-siddhim āha / tathā hi yat kṛtakaṃ tad
SA15dhkpvsvu:01820_0: anityam ity ukte anartha-antara-bhāve vyaktam ayam asya svabhāvas
SA15dhkpvsvu:01822_0: tad-bhāvasya arthāpattyā anityatva-abhāve kṛtakatvaṃ na bhavati iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:01823_0: bhavati / na hi svabhāvasya abhāve bhāvo bhavaty abhedāt / anyathā
SA15dhkpvsvu:01824_0: tad-bhāve bhavati ity eva na syāt / tathā tad-abhāve na bhavati
SA15dhkpvsvu:01825_0: ity ukte / tata eva tad-bhāvatā-vedinaḥ / tathā hy ayam asya
SA15dhkpvsvu:01826_0: svabhāvo yena tad-abhāve na bhavati / anyathā ayogād iti tat-
SA15dhkpvsvu:01902_0: dhūmas tatra agnir ity ukte kāryaṃ dhūmo dahanasya / yena
SA15dhkpvsvu:01903_0: dhūme avaśyam agnir bhavati / anyathā artha-antarasya tad-anubandha-
SA15dhkpvsvu:01904_0: niyama-abhāvāt svātantryaṃ bhāvasya syāt / atas tad-abhāve
SA15dhkpvsvu:01905_0: api svabhāva-avaikalyān na abhāvaḥ / kārye tv avaśyaṃ kāraṇaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:01906_0: bhavati / idam eva hi kāraṇasya kāraṇatvaṃ yad artha-antara-bhāve
SA15dhkpvsvu:01907_0: svabhāva-upadhānaṃ / kāryasya api tad-bhāva eva bhāvaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:01908_0: tac ca asti dhūme / tasmāt kāryaṃ dhūma ity anvayena vidhita-
SA15dhkpvsvu:01909_0: tat-kāryatvasya dahana-abhāve dhūmo na bhavati ity arthād vyatireka-pratipattir
SA15dhkpvsvu:01910_0: bhavati / tathā asaty agnau dhūmo na asti ity
SA15dhkpvsvu:01911_0: ukte agnir dhūme bhavaty avaśyam ity arthād anvaya-pratipattiḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:01912_0: anyathā hi tad-abhāve kiṃ na bhaved iti / nanu ca nitya-anitya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:01913_0: artha-kāryatva-abhāve api śravaṇa-jñānaṃ na bhavati tad-abhāve /
SA15dhkpvsvu:01914_0: na vai na bhavati / tayor eva tataḥ saṃśayāt / anyathā
SA15dhkpvsvu:01915_0: abhāvena niścitāt kathaṃ tad-bhāva-parāmarśena saṃśayaḥ syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:01916_0: kevalaṃ tu bhāva-niścaya-abhāvān na asti ity ucyate / yadā punar
SA15dhkpvsvu:01917_0: dṛṣṭāntena na agni-dhūmayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ pradarśyate / tadā
SA15dhkpvsvu:01918_0: yatra dhūmas tatra agnir ity eva na syāt / pratibandha-abhāvāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:01919_0: kuto agny-abhāve dhūmo na asti ity arthād vyatireka-siddhiḥ / tathā
SA15dhkpvsvu:01920_0: vaidharmyeṇa abhāva-asiddher anvaya-smṛtiḥ tasmād dṛṣṭāntena ayam
SA15dhkpvsvu:01925_0: tāv eva hi nivartamānau sva-pratibaddhaṃ nivartayata iti kasyacid
SA15dhkpvsvu:01926_0: arthasya pratiṣedham api sādhayitukāmena hetor vyāpakasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:02001_0: vā svabhāvasya nivṛttir hetutvena ākhyeyā / apratibandhe hi katham
SA15dhkpvsvu:02007_0: iti iyaṃ trividhā apy ukta-anupalabdhir anekadhā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:02009_0: trividha eva hi pratiṣedha-hetuḥ / upalabhya-sattvasya hetos tathābhāva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:02010_0: niścaye vyāpakasya svātmanaś ca anupalabdhir iti / sa
SA15dhkpvsvu:02012_0: prakāra uktaḥ / tasya agatyā tad-viruddha-gatyā viruddha-kārya-gatyā
SA15dhkpvsvu:02019_0: artha-antara-nimitto hi dharmaḥ syād anya eva saḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:02020_0: na hi tasmin niṣpanne aniṣpanno bhinna-hetuko vā tat-svabhāvo
SA15dhkpvsvu:02021_0: yuktaḥ / ayam eva khalu bhedo bheda-hetur vā bhāvānāṃ viruddha-dharma-
SA15dhkpvsvu:02022_0: adhyāsaḥ kāraṇa-bhedaś ca / tau cen na bhedakau tadā
SA15dhkpvsvu:02023_0: na kasyacit kutaścid bheda ity ekaṃ dravyaṃ viśvaṃ syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:02024_0: tataś ca saha utpatti-vināśau sarvasya ca sarvatra upayogaḥ syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:02101_0: anyathā ekam ity eva na syāt / nāma-antaraṃ vā / artha-bhedam abhyupagamya
SA15dhkpvsvu:02102_0: tathā abhidhānāt / nanv anartha-antara-hetutve api bhāva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:02103_0: kāle anityatā aniṣpattes tulyā atat-svabhāvatā / na vai kācid anyā
SA15dhkpvsvu:02104_0: anityatā nāma yā paścān niṣpadyeta / sa eva hi bhāvaḥ kṣaṇa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:02105_0: sthiti-dharmā anityatā / vacana-bhede api dharmi-dharmatayā nimittaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:02106_0: vakṣyāmaḥ / tāṃ punar asya kṣaṇa-sthito-dharmatāṃ svabhāvaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:02107_0: sva-hetor eva tathā-utpatteḥ paśyann api manda-buddhiḥ sattā-
SA15dhkpvsvu:02110_0: paścād asya anupalabdhyā asthito-pratipatter niścaya-kāla iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:02114_0: eva anityatā syāt / anya-nimittatve animittatve vā / tathā ca bhāvas
SA15dhkpvsvu:02115_0: tadvān na syāt / tad-anupayogāt / upayoge vā sa eva asya
SA15dhkpvsvu:02116_0: svātmabhūto anityatā iti kim anyayā / svabhāvena vā acalasya artha-antara-
SA15dhkpvsvu:02117_0: yoge api tad-bhāva-anutpatteḥ / sa ca artha-antarād bhavann anityatā
SA15dhkpvsvu:02118_0: anyo vā dharmo hetuḥ phalaṃ vā syāt / ahetu-phalasya asambandhāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:02120_0: paścād bhāvān na hetutvaṃ phale apy ekāntatā kutaḥ //33//
SA15dhkpvsvu:02121_0: sa hi niṣpanne bhāve artha-antarataḥ paścād bhavan kathaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:02122_0: tasya hetuḥ syāt / phalasya api na avaśyaṃ hetau bhāva iti tad-
SA15dhkpvsvu:02123_0: bhāva-hetor anaikāntikatvam / tan na artha-antara-nimitto dharmo
SA15dhkpvsvu:02124_0: bhāve avaśyaṃ bhāvi ity ananumānam / yadi tarhi darśana -adarśane
SA15dhkpvsvu:02125_0: na anvaya-vyatireka-gater āśrayaḥ kathaṃ dhūmo agniṃ na vyabhicarati
SA15dhkpvsvu:02202_0: yeṣām upalambhe tal-lakṣaṇam anupalabdhaṃ yad upalabhyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:02203_0: tatra eka-abhāve api na upalabhyate / tat tasya kāryaṃ / tac ca dhūme
SA15dhkpvsvu:02205_0: sa bhavaṃs tad-abhāve tu hetumattāṃ vilaṅghayet //34//
SA15dhkpvsvu:02206_0: sakṛd api tathā adarśanāt kāryaṃ siddhaḥ / akāryatve akāraṇāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:02207_0: sakṛd apy abhāvāt / kāryasya ca sva-kāraṇam antareṇa bhāve
SA15dhkpvsvu:02208_0: ahetumattā eva syāt / na hi yasya yam antareṇa bhāvaḥ sa tasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:02209_0: hetur bhavati / bhavati ca dhūmo agnim antareṇa tan na tad-hetuḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:02210_0: anya-hetukatvān na ahetukatvam iti cet / na / tatra api
SA15dhkpvsvu:02211_0: tulyatvāt / tad-abhāve apy agnau bhavati iti / kathaṃ vā tato
SA15dhkpvsvu:02212_0: anyato vā ataj-janana-svabhāvād bhavet / svayam atat-svabhāvasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:02213_0: ajananāt tasya ahetutā syāt / na vai sa eva bhavati tādṛśasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:02214_0: bhāvāt / anya-adṛśād bhavan kathaṃ tādṛśaḥ syāt / tādṛśād hi
SA15dhkpvsvu:02215_0: bhavan tādṛśaḥ syāt / anya-adṛśād api tādṛśo bhāve tac-śakti-niyama-
SA15dhkpvsvu:02216_0: abhāvān na hetu-bhedo bhedaka iti akāraṇaṃ viśvasya vaiśvarūpyaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:02217_0: syāt / sarvaṃ vā sarvasmāj jāyeta / tasmāt kāraṇa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:02218_0: bheda-abhedābhyāṃ kārya-bheda-abhedau / tan na dhūmo arthād dṛṣṭa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:02220_0: nityaṃ sattvam asattvaṃ vā ahetor anya-anapekṣaṇāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:02222_0: sa hi dhūmo ahetur bhavan nirapekṣatvān na kadācin na bhavet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:02223_0: tad-bhāve vaikalya-abhāvād iṣṭa-kāla-vat / tadā api vā na bhavet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:02224_0: abhāva-kāla-aviśeṣāt / apekṣayā hi bhāvāḥ kādācitkā bhavanti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:02302_0: yogyatayor deśa-kālayos tadvattā itarayor niyama-ayogāt / sā ca
SA15dhkpvsvu:02303_0: yogyatā hetu-bhāvāt kim anyat / tasmād eka-deśa-kāla-parihāreṇa anya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:02304_0: deśa-kālayor vartamāno bhāvas tat-sāpekṣo nāma bhavati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:02305_0: tathā hi / tathā vṛttir eva apekṣā tat-kṛta-upakāra-anapekṣasya tan-niyama-
SA15dhkpvsvu:02306_0: ayogāt / tan niyata-deśa-kālatvād dhūmo atra dṛṣṭaḥ sakṛd
SA15dhkpvsvu:02307_0: vaikalye ca punar na dṛṣṭaḥ taj-janyo asya svabhāvaḥ / anyathā
SA15dhkpvsvu:02308_0: sakṛd apy abhāvāt / sa tat-pratiniyato anyatra kathaṃ bhavet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:02309_0: bhavan vā na dhūmaḥ syāt / taj-janito hi svabhāva-viśeṣo dhūma
SA15dhkpvsvu:02310_0: iti / tathā hetur api tathābhūta-kārya-janana-svabhāvaḥ / tasya anyato
SA15dhkpvsvu:02311_0: api bhāve na sa tasya svabhāva iti sakṛd api na janayet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:02312_0: na vā sa dhūmo adhūma-janana-svabhāvād bhāvāt / tat-svabhāvatve
SA15dhkpvsvu:02313_0: ca sa eva agnir ity avyabhicāraḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:02314_0: agni-svabhāvaḥ śakrasya mūrddhā yady agnir eva saḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:02315_0: atha anagni-svabhāvo asau dhūmas tatra kathaṃ bhavet //36//
SA15dhkpvsvu:02317_0: adhūma-hetor dhūmasya bhāve sa syād ahetukaḥ //37//
SA15dhkpvsvu:02318_0: iti saṃgrahaślokau / kathaṃ tarhi idānīṃ bhinnāt sahakāriṇaḥ kārya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:02319_0: utpatter yathā cakṣū-rūpa-āder vijñānasya / na vai kiṃcid ekaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:02320_0: janakaṃ tat-svabhāvam / kiṃ tu sāmagrī janikā tat-svabhāvā / sa eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:02321_0: anumīyate / sa eva ca sāmagrī svabhāva-sthity-āśrayaḥ kāryasya /
SA15dhkpvsvu:02322_0: ata eva sahakāriṇām apy aparyāyeṇa jananam / yad api kiṃcid
SA15dhkpvsvu:02323_0: vijātīyād bhavad dṛṣṭaṃ gomaya-ādeḥ śāluka-ādi / tatra api tathā abhidhāne
SA15dhkpvsvu:02324_0: apy asty eva sva-bīja-prabhavāt svabhāva-bhedaḥ / hetu-svabhāva-bhedāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:02326_0: tādṛśaṃ loko vivecayaty ākāra-bhedāt / tasmān na suvivecita-ākāraṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:02402_0: svabhāvas tasya tad-hetur ato bhinnān na sambhavaḥ //38//
SA15dhkpvsvu:02403_0: iti saṃgrahaślokaḥ / tasmāt sakṛd api darśana-adarśanābhyāṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:02404_0: kāryakāraṇabhāva-siddher bhavati tatas tat-pratipattiḥ / na anyathā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:02406_0: amūrtatve nityatva-darśane apy anyatra anyathā adṛṣṭeḥ / kvacin
SA15dhkpvsvu:02407_0: nityatva-abhāve apy adṛṣṭasya punar dṛṣṭer iti bhavatu kāryasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:02408_0: kāraṇena avinābhāvas tadutpatteḥ / svabhāva idānīṃ katham avinābhāvaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:02411_0: yo hi bhāva-mātra-anurodhī svabhāvas tatra avinābhāvo bhāvasya iṣyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:02413_0: tad-abhāve svayaṃ bhāvasya abhāvaḥ syād abhedataḥ //39//
SA15dhkpvsvu:02414_0: ya eva bhāvo bhāva-mātra-anurodhī svabhāva ity ucyate / sa eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:02415_0: svayaṃ vastuto bhāvaḥ / sa ca ātmānaṃ parityajya kathaṃ bhavet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:02416_0: ya eva tarhi kṛtakaḥ sa eva anityo bheda-abhāvāt / pratijñārthaikadeśo
SA15dhkpvsvu:02417_0: hetuḥ syāt / na eṣa doṣaḥ / yasmāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:02420_0: tasmād yato yato arthānāṃ vyāvṛttis tan-nibandhanāḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:02422_0: tasmād yo yena dharmeṇa viśeṣaḥ sampratīyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:02423_0: na sa śakyas tato anyena tena bhinnā vyavasthitiḥ //42//
SA15dhkpvsvu:02424_0: sarva eva hi bhāvāḥ svarūpa-sthitayaḥ / te na ātmānaṃ pareṇa
SA15dhkpvsvu:02425_0: miśrayanti / tasya aparatva-prasaṅgāt / yad apy eṣām abhinnam
SA15dhkpvsvu:02426_0: ātmabhūtaṃ rūpaṃ na tat teṣām / tadānīṃ teṣām abhāvāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:02501_0: tad eva hi syād abhinnasya bhāvāt / tad-vyatiriktasya bhinnasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:02502_0: ca abhāvāt / tasya eva ca punar bheda-virodhāt / tac ca ātmani vyavasthitam
SA15dhkpvsvu:02503_0: amiśram eva / artha-antaram apy aneka-sambandhe api
SA15dhkpvsvu:02504_0: na tat teṣāṃ sāmānyam atad-rūpatvāt / dvitva-ādi-saṃyoga-kārya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:02505_0: dravyeṣv api prasaṅgāt / na hi sambandhinā apy anyena anye samānā
SA15dhkpvsvu:02506_0: nāma / tadvanto nāma syuḥ / bhūta-vat / kaṇṭhe-guṇena /
SA15dhkpvsvu:02507_0: na abhinna-pratyaya-viṣayāḥ / bhūta-vat / tadātmānam eva hi buddhiḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:02508_0: saṃsṛjantī sāmānya-viṣayā pratibhāsate / na eka-sambandhināv iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:02509_0: bhūta-vat / tad-darśinyāḥ sā bhrāntir iti cet / tad-darśinī iti kutaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:02510_0: nirbīja-bhrānty-ayogād iti cet / ta eva tad-eka-kāryā bījam / saṃkhyā-
SA15dhkpvsvu:02511_0: saṃyoga-kārya-dravya-ādimatsu bhūta-ādiṣv abhāvāc ca / tan na tathā
SA15dhkpvsvu:02512_0: sāmānya-buddhau niveṣa-abhāvāt sāmānyam anyat / sati vā tasya api
SA15dhkpvsvu:02513_0: svātmani vyavasthānād amiśraṇam anyena / tasmād ime bhāvāḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:02514_0: sajātīya-abhimatād anyasmāc ca vyatiriktāḥ svabhāvena eka-rūpatvāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:02516_0: śabdais tatas tato bhedam upādāya svabhāva-abhede apy aneka-
SA15dhkpvsvu:02517_0: dharmāṇaḥ pratīyante / te api śabdāḥ sarva-bheda-anākṣepe apy eka-
SA15dhkpvsvu:02518_0: bheda-codanāt tat-svalakṣaṇa-niṣṭhā eva bhavanti / tad ekasmād
SA15dhkpvsvu:02519_0: api tasya bhedo asti iti / tasmād ekasya bhāvasya yāvanti pararūpāṇi
SA15dhkpvsvu:02521_0: tad-bhedāt / yāvat yaś ca vyāvṛttayas tāvat yaḥ śrutayo
SA15dhkpvsvu:02524_0: tasmāt svabhāva-abhede api yena yena dharmeṇa nāmnā yo viśeṣo
SA15dhkpvsvu:02525_0: bhedaḥ pratīyate na sa śakyo anyena pratyāyayitum iti na eka-arthāḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:02526_0: sarva-śabdāḥ / tan na pratijñārthaikadeśo hetur iti / kathaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:02527_0: punar etad gamyate vyavacchedaḥ śabda-liṅgābhyāṃ pratipādyate
SA15dhkpvsvu:02528_0: vidhinā na vastu-rūpam eva iti / pramāṇa-antarasya śabda- antarasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:02603_0: ko anyo na dṛṣṭo bhāgaḥ syād yaḥ pramāṇaiḥ parīkṣyate //43//
SA15dhkpvsvu:02604_0: eko hy artha-ātmā / sa pratyakṣaḥ asiddhe dharmiṇi sādhana-asambhavāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:02605_0: yathā anityatve sādhye śabdaḥ / tasya pratyakṣeṇa eva siddheḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:02606_0: sarva-ākāra-siddhiḥ / tad-anyasya asiddhasya abhāvāt / bhāve vā
SA15dhkpvsvu:02607_0: atat-svabhāvatvam / na hi yo yad ekayogakṣemo na bhavati sa
SA15dhkpvsvu:02609_0: anyathā abhāva-prasaṅgād ity uktam / tasmāt pratyakṣe dharmiṇi
SA15dhkpvsvu:02614_0: yadi dṛṣṭa-sarva-tattvasya api bhāvasya tathā niścaya-pratirodhinā
SA15dhkpvsvu:02615_0: bhrānti-nimittena guṇa-antaraṃ na saṃyojyate / yathā śuktau rajata-
SA15dhkpvsvu:02616_0: ākāraḥ / na hi śuktau dve rūpe samānaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ ca tathā
SA15dhkpvsvu:02618_0: atiprasaṅgāc ca / tasmāt paśyan śukti-rūpaṃ viśiṣṭam eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:02620_0: paśyāmi iti manyate / tato asya rajata-samāropaḥ / tathā / sadṛśā-para-apara-
SA15dhkpvsvu:02622_0: yāvanto asya parabhāvās tāvanta eva yathāsvaṃ nimitta-
SA15dhkpvsvu:02623_0: bhāvinaḥ samāropā iti tad-vyavacchedakāni bhavanti pramāṇāni
SA15dhkpvsvu:02624_0: saphalāni syuḥ / teṣāṃ tu vyavaccheda-phalānāṃ na apratīta-vastv-aṃśa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:02701_0: pratyāyane pravṛttis tasya dṛṣṭatvāt / anaṃśasya ca eka-deśena
SA15dhkpvsvu:02703_0: tasmād dṛṣṭasya bhāvasya dṛṣṭa eva akhilo guṇaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:02704_0: bhrānter niścīyate na iti sādhanaṃ sampravartate //45//
SA15dhkpvsvu:02705_0: iti saṃgrahaślokaḥ / tasmān na adṛṣṭa-grahaṇāya dṛṣṭe pramāṇa-antara-vṛttiḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:02707_0: vastu-grahe anumānāc ca dharmasya ekasya niścaye /
SA15dhkpvsvu:02708_0: sarva-dharma-graho apohe na ayam doṣaḥ prasajyate //46//
SA15dhkpvsvu:02709_0: na kevalaṃ pratyakṣa-dṛṣṭe pramāṇa-antara-avṛttiḥ kvacit / yadā anumānam
SA15dhkpvsvu:02710_0: api vastu vidhinā pratyāyayati na vyavaccheda-kṛt tadā eka-
SA15dhkpvsvu:02712_0: antara-avṛttiḥ na hi tasmin niścite tadātmā aniścito yuktaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:02713_0: yadā punar anumānena samāropa-vyavacchedaḥ kriyate tadā na eka-
SA15dhkpvsvu:02714_0: samāropa-vyavacchedād anya-vyavacchedaḥ kṛto bhavati iti tad-artham
SA15dhkpvsvu:02715_0: anyat pravartate / nanu na avaśyaṃ viparyāsa-pūrvaka eva apratīta-
SA15dhkpvsvu:02716_0: niścayo bhavati / yathā akasmād dhūmād agni-pratipattiḥ / na hi
SA15dhkpvsvu:02717_0: tatra anagni-samāropaḥ sambhāvyate / tan na sarvatra vyavacchedaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:02718_0: kriyate / uktam atra / dharmi-pratipattāv abhedāt sarva-pratipattiḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:02719_0: bhede vā asambaddhasya tatra apratipattir iti / tasmāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:02720_0: tatra api tad-darśinas tat-svabhāva-aniścayaḥ kutaḥ viparyāsāt / sa
SA15dhkpvsvu:02721_0: ca taṃ pradeśaṃ tad-viviktena rūpeṇa niścinvann agni-sattā-bhāvanā-
SA15dhkpvsvu:02722_0: vimuktayā buddhyā katham aviparyasto nāma / tad-ākāra-
SA15dhkpvsvu:02801_0: samāropa-saṃśaya-rahitaś ca tat-pratipattau na liṅgam anusaret /
SA15dhkpvsvu:02804_0: anyathā dharmiṇaḥ siddhāv asiddhaṃ kim ataḥ param //47//
SA15dhkpvsvu:02806_0: kvacid dṛṣṭe api yaj jñānaṃ sāmānya-arthaṃ vikalpakam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:02809_0: tat katham asati samārope bhavad vyavaccheda-viṣayaṃ bhavati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:02810_0: samāropa-viṣaye tasya abhāvāt / yatra hy asya samāropo yathā
SA15dhkpvsvu:02811_0: sthiraḥ sātmaka iti vā na tatra bhede niścayo bhavati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:02813_0: na hi sarvato bhinno dṛṣṭo api bhāvas tathā eva pratyabhijñāyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:02814_0: kvacid bhede vyavadhāna-sambhavāt / yathā śukteḥ śuktitve /
SA15dhkpvsvu:02815_0: yatra tu pratipattur bhrānti-nimittaṃ na asti tatra eva asya tad-darśana-
SA15dhkpvsvu:02816_0: aviśeṣe api smārto niścayo bhavati / samāropa-niścayayor bādhyabādhakabhāvāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:02819_0: tad-viveka eva ca anyāpohaḥ / tasmāt tad api tan-mātra-apoha-gocaram /
SA15dhkpvsvu:02820_0: na vastu-svabhāva-niścaya-ātmakam / tathā hi kasyacin niścaye
SA15dhkpvsvu:02821_0: apy anyasya apratipatti-darśanāt / tat-svabhāva-niścaye ca tasya ayogāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:02902_0: tāvantā eva śabdāś ca tena te bhinna-gocarāḥ //50//
SA15dhkpvsvu:02903_0: anyathā ekena śabdena vyāpta ekatra vastuni /
SA15dhkpvsvu:02904_0: buddhyā vā na anya-viṣaya iti paryāyatā bhavet //51//
SA15dhkpvsvu:02906_0: yasya api nānā-upādher dhīr grāhika-arthasya bhedinaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:02907_0: yo api manyate bhinnā eva upādhayaḥ parasparam āśrayāc ca /
SA15dhkpvsvu:02908_0: tan-nibandhanāḥ śrutayas tad-ādhāreṣu vartante / tatra eva vā
SA15dhkpvsvu:02909_0: tad ayam aprasaṅga iti / tasya api /
SA15dhkpvsvu:02911_0: sarvātmanā upakārasya ko bhedakaḥ syād aniścitaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:02912_0: yady apy upādhayo bhinnā eva śabda-jñāna-antarāṇāṃ nimittam
SA15dhkpvsvu:02913_0: arthe / sa tu tais tadvān eka eva upalīyate / tasya nānā-upādhīnām
SA15dhkpvsvu:02915_0: grahaṇe ka eva upādhi-bhedo aniścitaḥ syāt / sarva-upādhy-upakārakatvena
SA15dhkpvsvu:02916_0: grahaṇāt / na hy upakārakatvaṃ anyad eva tasya svarūpeṇa
SA15dhkpvsvu:02917_0: gṛhyamāṇasya agṛhītaṃ nāma / ato yad eva asya svabhāvena
SA15dhkpvsvu:02918_0: grahaṇaṃ tad eva upakāratvena api iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:02921_0: eka-jñāne dvayor api grahaṇam iti eka-upādhi-viśiṣṭe api tasmin
SA15dhkpvsvu:02923_0: upādhimad-grahaṇasya / anyathā tathā api na gṛhyeta /
SA15dhkpvsvu:02924_0: na hy anya eva anya-upakārako yo na gṛhītaḥ syāt / na ca apy upakārake
SA15dhkpvsvu:02925_0: tathā gṛhīte upakārya-agrahaṇaṃ tasya apy agrahaṇa-prasaṅgāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:02926_0: svasvāmitva-vat / tasmād artha-antara-upādhi-vāde api samānaḥ prasaṅgaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:02927_0: atha api syād bhinnā eva śaktayaḥ śaktimato yābhir upādhīn
SA15dhkpvsvu:02928_0: upakaroti / tato na ayaṃ prasaṅga iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:03001_0: dharma-upakāra-śaktīnāṃ bhede tās tasya kiṃ yadi /
SA15dhkpvsvu:03002_0: na upakāras tatas tāsāṃ tathā syād anavasthitiḥ //54//
SA15dhkpvsvu:03003_0: yadi pratyupādhy upakārakatvāni tasya na svātmabhūtāny eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:03004_0: na api tata upakāram anubhavanti / kiṃ tasya iti tā ucyante / upakāre
SA15dhkpvsvu:03005_0: vā svātmabhūtābhir ayam ekaḥ śaktibhiḥ śaktīr upakurvan
SA15dhkpvsvu:03006_0: eka upādhinā api gṛhyamāṇaḥ sarvātmanā gṛhyata eva / tathā
SA15dhkpvsvu:03007_0: hi / eka-upādhi-grahaṇe tad-upakāriṇyāḥ śakter grahaṇam / tad-grahaṇe
SA15dhkpvsvu:03009_0: sarvāḥ śaktīr grāhayati tāś ca sva-upādhīn iti tad-avasthaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:03010_0: prasaṅgaḥ / atha tā api śakty-upakāriṇyaḥ śaktayo bhinnā eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:03011_0: bhāvāt / evam upādhīnāṃ tac-śaktīnāṃ ca aparā parāsv eva śaktiṣv
SA15dhkpvsvu:03012_0: aparyavasānena ghaṭanāt sa ekas tābhiḥ kadācid apy agṛhītas
SA15dhkpvsvu:03013_0: tad-upakāra-ātmā tadvattvena na gṛhyate / yadi punaḥ kevalān
SA15dhkpvsvu:03014_0: eva upādhīn śabda-jñānāny upalīyeran / tadā tasya asamāveṣān na
SA15dhkpvsvu:03015_0: bhavati tat-pratipatti-mukhena sarva-pratipattiḥ / tadā api tasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:03016_0: śabdair anākṣepān na syāt tatra pravṛttir iti vyarthaḥ śabda-prayogaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:03017_0: syāt / arthakriyā-āśrayo hi sarvo vidhi-pratiṣedhābhyāṃ vyavahāraḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:03018_0: upādhayaś ca tatra asamarthāḥ samarthaś ca na eva ucyata
SA15dhkpvsvu:03019_0: iti kiṃ śabda-prayogaiḥ / tataś ca upādhayo na upādhayaḥ syuḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:03020_0: kvacit pravṛttau hi kasyacit pradhānasya aṅga-bhāvāt tad-apekṣayā
SA15dhkpvsvu:03021_0: tathā ucyate / tasya śabdair anākṣepān na te kasyacid aṅga-
SA15dhkpvsvu:03022_0: bhūtā iti kim upādhayaḥ / lakṣita-lakṣaṇād adoṣa iti cet samānaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:03023_0: prasaṅgaḥ / sa tāvat tair upādhibhir nāntarīyakatayā upalakṣyamāṇa
SA15dhkpvsvu:03024_0: ekena apy upalakṣaṇe sarvātmanā upalakṣita iti tad-avasthaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:03025_0: prasaṅgaḥ / ko hy atra viśeṣaḥ śabdā vā enam upalakṣayeyus tal-lakṣitā
SA15dhkpvsvu:03101_0: vā upādhayaḥ / sa tāvat tadānīṃ niścīyate sarva-upakārakaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:03103_0: eka-upakārake grāhye na upakāras tato apare /
SA15dhkpvsvu:03104_0: dṛṣṭe tasminn adṛṣṭā ye tad-grahe sakala-grahaḥ //55//
SA15dhkpvsvu:03106_0: yadi bhrānti-nivṛtty-arthaṃ gṛhīte apy anyad iṣyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:03107_0: syād etat nirbhāgasya vastuno grahaṇe ko anyas tadā na gṛhīto
SA15dhkpvsvu:03108_0: nāma / sa tu bhrāntyā na avadhāryata iti pramāṇa-antaraṃ pravartate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:03110_0: tad vyavaccheda-viṣayaṃ siddhaṃ tadvat tato aparam //56//
SA15dhkpvsvu:03112_0: tat tarhi bhrānti-nivṛtty-arthaṃ pravṛttaṃ pramāṇam / anya-samāropa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:03114_0: anyad api / asamāropa-viṣaye vṛtteḥ / yatra asya samāropo na tatra
SA15dhkpvsvu:03115_0: niścaya iti samāropa-abhāve vartamāno anyāpoha-viṣayaḥ siddhaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:03117_0: yan na niścīyate rūpaṃ tat teṣāṃ viṣayaḥ katham //57//
SA15dhkpvsvu:03118_0: iyam eva khalu niścayānāṃ svārtha-pratipattir yat tan-niścayanam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:03119_0: tac ced ākāra-antara-vad aniścitaṃ kathaṃ tair gṛhītaṃ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:03120_0: katham idānīm aniścīyamānaṃ pratyakṣeṇa api gṛhītaṃ nāma /
SA15dhkpvsvu:03121_0: na pratyakṣaṃ kasyacin niścāyakam / tad ayam api gṛhṇāti tan
SA15dhkpvsvu:03122_0: na niścayena / kiṃ tarhi / tat-pratibhāsena / tan na niścaya-aniścaya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:03123_0: vaśāt pratyakṣasya grahaṇa-agrahaṇe / na evaṃ niścayānāṃ kiṃcin
SA15dhkpvsvu:03124_0: niścinvato apy anyatra aniścayena pravṛtti-bhedād grahaṇa -agrahaṇam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:03125_0: tasmāt tad eva asya grahaṇaṃ yo niścayaḥ / anyathā eka-ākāre
SA15dhkpvsvu:03126_0: api tan na syāt / kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ sarvato bhinne vastu-rūpe
SA15dhkpvsvu:03127_0: anubhava-utpattāv api tathā eva na smārto niścayo bhavati / sahakāri-
SA15dhkpvsvu:03202_0: yad viśeṣa-avasāye asti pratyakṣaḥ sa pratīyate //58//
SA15dhkpvsvu:03203_0: yady apy aṃśa-rahitaḥ sarvato bhinna-svabhāvo bhāvo anubhūtas
SA15dhkpvsvu:03204_0: tathā api na sarva-bhedeṣu tāvatā niścayo bhavati / kāraṇa-antara-
SA15dhkpvsvu:03205_0: apekṣyatvāt / anubhavo hi yathā avikalpa-abhyāsaṃ niścaya-pratyayān
SA15dhkpvsvu:03210_0: janakatva-adhyāpakatva-aviśeṣe api pitaram āyāntaṃ dṛṣṭvā pitā me
SA15dhkpvsvu:03211_0: āgacchati na upādhyāya iti / so api bhavan niścayo asati bhrānti-
SA15dhkpvsvu:03212_0: kāraṇe bhavati / tasmān na abhūta ity eva sarva-ākāra-niścayaḥ /

SA15dhkpvsvu:05202_0: sāmānyam ayaṃ vā tadvān iti na syāt / tathā ca tat-pratipattyā
SA15dhkpvsvu:05205_0: syād etad bhavanti vyaktayas tasya ālambana-bhāvena kāraṇaṃ na
SA15dhkpvsvu:05206_0: tu kevalāḥ / yadā punar āsām ekaṃ sahakāry asti tadā tat-sahitā
SA15dhkpvsvu:05208_0: tad ekaṃ vastu kiṃ tāsāṃ nānātvaṃ samapohati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:05209_0: nānātvāc ca eka-vijñāna-hetutā tāsu na iṣyate //102//
SA15dhkpvsvu:05210_0: kiṃ vai teṣāṃ bhedānāṃ tena ekena nānātvaṃ nirākriyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:05211_0: nānātvaṃ hi teṣv eka-vijñāna-akāraṇatve kāraṇam ucyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:05213_0: na brūmo anekam ekaṃ pratyayaṃ na janayati bhedād iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:05214_0: na bhedo janana-virodhī / kiṃ tarhi / kaivalyam / tena ekena
SA15dhkpvsvu:05216_0: tābhir vinā api pratyekaṃ kriyamāṇāṃ dhiyaṃ prati //103//
SA15dhkpvsvu:05217_0: tena ekena api sāmarthyaṃ tāsāṃ na ity agraho dhiyā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:05218_0: katham idānīṃ vyaktīnāṃ tatra jñāne sāmarthya-gatiḥ / pratyekaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:05219_0: tāsām abhāve api tad-bhāvāt / asati sāmānye abhāvād itarathā
SA15dhkpvsvu:05220_0: ca bhāvāt / na eṣa doṣaḥ / yathā nīla-ādiṣv eka-apāye api cakṣurvijñānaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:05221_0: bhavati iti / na samūhe api teṣām asāmarthyam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:05222_0: tathā iha api pratyekam eka-apāye api bhavati iti na sarvadā sāmarthyaṃ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:05302_0: śakti-siddhiḥ samūhe api na evaṃ vyakteḥ kathaṃcana /
SA15dhkpvsvu:05303_0: nīla-ādīnāṃ hi cakṣurvijñāne pratyekam api sāmarthyaṃ dṛṣṭam
SA15dhkpvsvu:05304_0: iti samūhe api śaktir aviruddhā / tathā na kadācid vyaktayaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:05305_0: sāmānya-nirapekṣā anvayi vijñānaṃ janayanti / tasmād asamarthā
SA15dhkpvsvu:05306_0: eva vyaktayas tatra iti na tena gṛhyeran /
SA15dhkpvsvu:05307_0: tāsām anyatama-apekṣaṃ tac cec śaktaṃ na kevalam //105//
SA15dhkpvsvu:05308_0: atha api syāt na vema-rahitaḥ kuvindaḥ paṭaṃ karoti praty ekam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:05309_0: vema-abhāve api kuvindaḥ karoti iti na tata eva paṭa-utpattiḥ / tathā
SA15dhkpvsvu:05310_0: na kevalam ekaika-vyakty-apāye vijñāna-utpattāv api sāmānyaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:05311_0: tad-hetuḥ / kiṃ tarhi / vyaktīnām ekāṃ kāṃcid apekṣya vijñānam
SA15dhkpvsvu:05313_0: tad ekam upakuryus tāḥ kathaṃ ekāṃ dhiyaṃ ca na /
SA15dhkpvsvu:05314_0: bhinnānāṃ hy arthānām eka-artha-upakriyā virodhinī iti sarvo ayam
SA15dhkpvsvu:05315_0: ārambhaḥ / tāś ced vyaktayo bhinnā apy ekaṃ sāmānyam upakurvanti
SA15dhkpvsvu:05316_0: kaḥ punar āsāṃ vijñānena aparādhaḥ kṛto yat tan na upakurvanti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:05318_0: apy eka-sāmānya-upakaraṇa-śaktiḥ evaṃ tad eva ekaṃ vijñānaṃ kurvantu /
SA15dhkpvsvu:05320_0: kāryaś ca tāsāṃ prāpto asau jananaṃ yad upakriyā //106//
SA15dhkpvsvu:05321_0: na hy anatiśayam ātmānam asya pūrvavad bibhrataḥ kaścid
SA15dhkpvsvu:05322_0: upakārako nāma / atiprasaṅgāt / artha-antara-janane api tasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:05323_0: kiṃ tena / tasya tad-āśrayatve anupakāriṇaḥ ko ayam āśrayāśrayibhāvaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:05324_0: atiprasaṅgo vā / upakāre api tatra eva tat-pratibandha
SA15dhkpvsvu:05325_0: iti kim anyas tat-karaṇāt tad-upakārī / tad-apekṣasya āśrayasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:05326_0: tad-upayoge anupakāryatve kā iyam apekṣā nāma / tadutpatti-dharmā
SA15dhkpvsvu:05327_0: dharmā bhāvaḥ svabhāvapratibandhād apekṣate nāma anādheyātiśaya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:05401_0: ātmā parair apekṣate ca iti vyāhatam etat / tasmād yaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:05402_0: kaścit kasyacit kvacit pratibandhaḥ sa sarvo janyatāyām eva antarbhavati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:05404_0: ca anupakārāt / tasmād vyakty-upakṛtasya sāmānyasya vijñāna-janane
SA15dhkpvsvu:05405_0: janane vyaktam asya tat-kāryatā-anuyujyate / kevalasya sāmarthye
SA15dhkpvsvu:05406_0: api vyaktīnāṃ kvacid apy atra sāmarthya-asiddheḥ agrāhyatvaṃ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:05407_0: samarthā vyaktayo vijñāne pratibhāsanād iti cet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:05408_0: katham asiddha-upakārāṇāṃ pratibhāsa iti sa eva sāmānya-abhyupagame
SA15dhkpvsvu:05409_0: cintyate / yasmān na anupakārako viṣayo atiprasaṅgāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:05410_0: na aviṣayasya vijñāne pratibhāsaḥ / anupakārakasya aviṣayatve
SA15dhkpvsvu:05412_0: iti cet / bhavantu nāma tad-viṣayāṇi nirviṣayāṇi / nirviṣayatve
SA15dhkpvsvu:05414_0: ātmabhūta eva vijñānasya / bhāva-abhāva-anuvidhānāc ca sāmarthyaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:05415_0: na pratibhāsanāt / apratibhāsino api vyakti-vyatirekeṇa sāmānyasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:05417_0: abhinna-pratibhāsā dhīr na bhinneṣv iti cen matam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:05418_0: na brūmo anekam eka-kārya-kṛn na bhavati iti / kiṃ tarhi / na
SA15dhkpvsvu:05420_0: syāt / na vai sāmānya-grāhiṇīṣu svalakṣaṇa-pratibhāsaḥ tad-abhāve
SA15dhkpvsvu:05421_0: api tāsāṃ bhāvāt ākāra-antareṇa ca sva-jñāne pratibhāsanāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:05501_0: aneka-ākāra-ayogād ekasya atiprasaṅgāc ca / tasmān na iyaṃ bhinna-artha-
SA15dhkpvsvu:05503_0: apy adhyavasāya-vibhramād vyavahārayati lokam / sa tu
SA15dhkpvsvu:05504_0: tasyāṃ pratibhāsamāna ākāro na artheṣv asti / anyatra bhedād abhedinaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:05505_0: sa ca arūpaḥ / tam eva eṣā gṛhṇatī tathā viplavata ity
SA15dhkpvsvu:05506_0: uktaṃ prāk / api ca / vastu-sāmānya-vādino api hi bhinnā eva vyaktayaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:05507_0: kathaṃ tāsv abhinna-ākārā buddhir iti tulyaṃ codyam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:05508_0: na tulyaṃ tatra abhinnasya sāmānyasya sadbhāvāt / nanu tatra
SA15dhkpvsvu:05509_0: tasya ābhāsaḥ sato api na lakṣyate / sā hi varṇa-saṃsthāna-pratibhāsavatī
SA15dhkpvsvu:05510_0: vibhāvyate / na ca īdṛśaṃ sāmānyam / na ca tato vyatiriktaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:05511_0: kaścid abhinna ākāro asti / ākṛti-sāmānya-vādino api viśeṣa-vat
SA15dhkpvsvu:05512_0: tasya avyatirekād artha-antare avṛttir iti bhedān na abhinna-pratibhāso
SA15dhkpvsvu:05514_0: pratibhāso dhiyaṃ bhinnaḥ samānā iti tad-grahāt //107//
SA15dhkpvsvu:05515_0: na eva tāsv abhinnaḥ pratibhāso asti samānā iti grahāt / na hy
SA15dhkpvsvu:05516_0: ekasmin pratibhāse samānā iti yuktaṃ / kiṃ tarhi / tad eva iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:05517_0: dvayasya grahaṇād adoṣa iti cet / tathā api tad iha iti syāt / na samāna
SA15dhkpvsvu:05518_0: iti / tad eva tāsāṃ sāmyam iti cet / katham anyonyasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:05519_0: sāmyam / tat-sambandhād iti cet / na / pratibaddhasya sambandha-
SA15dhkpvsvu:05601_0: nanu samānā iti grahaṇād eva āsv abhinna-pratibhāsaḥ / na vai
SA15dhkpvsvu:05602_0: tad-darśane bhinna-abhinnayoḥ pratibhāsanāt samānā iti pratītiḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:05606_0: na hi vayam artha-jñāne dvāv ākārau paśyāmaḥ / apaśyantaś ca
SA15dhkpvsvu:05607_0: katham artha-dvaya-kalpanena ātmānam eva vipralabhāmahe / eka-
SA15dhkpvsvu:05608_0: kāryās tu vyaktayaḥ kalpanā-viṣayatām upayāntyas tathā anayā
SA15dhkpvsvu:05610_0: nanu dhīḥ kāryaṃ tāsāṃ sā ca vibhidyate //108//
SA15dhkpvsvu:05611_0: pratibhāvaṃ / tadvat tat-pratibhāsino vijñānasya api bhedāt / katham
SA15dhkpvsvu:05612_0: eka-kāryāḥ / tad hi tāsāṃ kāryaṃ tac ca bhidyate / yad
SA15dhkpvsvu:05613_0: apy udaka-āharaṇa-ādikam ekaṃ ghaṭa-ādi-kāryaṃ tad api pratidravyaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:05614_0: bhedād bhidyata eva iti na ekaṃ bhedānāṃ kāryam asti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:05618_0: niveditam etad yathā na bhāvānāṃ svabhāva-saṃsargo asti iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:05619_0: tatra saṃsṛṣṭa-ākārā buddhir bhrāntir eva / tāṃ tu bhedinaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:05620_0: padārthāḥ krameṇa vikalpa-hetavo bhavanto janayanti svabhāvata
SA15dhkpvsvu:05621_0: iti ca / sa tv eṣām abhinno bheda ity ucyate jñāna-ādeḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:05701_0: kasyacid ekasya karaṇāt atat-kāri-svabhāva-vivekaḥ / tad api
SA15dhkpvsvu:05702_0: pratidravyaṃ bhidyamānam api prakṛtyā eka-pratyavamarśasya abheda-
SA15dhkpvsvu:05703_0: avaskandino hetur bhavad abhinnaṃ khyāti / tathābhūta-pratyavamarśa-hetor
SA15dhkpvsvu:05706_0: ekaṃ pratyayaṃ janayanti ity asakṛd uktam etat / tasmād
SA15dhkpvsvu:05713_0: na hi dṛśyaṃ vibhāgena apratibhāsamānam asti ity uktam etat
SA15dhkpvsvu:05714_0: sati vā kvacid anāśritaṃ kathaṃ jñāna-hetur iti / pratiṣedhasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:05715_0: ca vidhānāt tat-kalpanā ayuktā iti / tasmāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:05719_0: eva yuktaḥ / yo ayam anyonyaṃ viveko bhāvānāṃ tat-pratītaya
SA15dhkpvsvu:05720_0: eva saṃketo api kriyamāṇaḥ śobheta atat-kāri-vivekena pravṛtty-arthatayā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:05721_0: yadi hi na tat-pratīty-arthaḥ saṃketas tasya vyavahāra-
SA15dhkpvsvu:05722_0: kāle apy asaṃsparśān na anya-parihāreṇa pravarteta / na hi sa
SA15dhkpvsvu:05723_0: teṣāṃ tebhyo vivekaḥ śabdena codita iti / sā ca śrutiḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:05804_0: vastu-bheda-āśrayāc ca arthe na visaṃvādikā matā //112//
SA15dhkpvsvu:05807_0: pratibhāsitvād akārya-kāriṇam api tat-kārya-kāriṇam iva adhyavasyantīṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:05810_0: paramārthatas tad-vyatirekiṣu padārtheṣu na visaṃvādikā ity ucyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:05811_0: tathā hi sa teṣu vyatireko bhūtaḥ / sarvathā avyatikramaṇīyatvāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:05812_0: na eko vyatirikto avyatirikto vā sarvathā ayogāt / tasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:05813_0: samāveśane vastuni dūra-utsṛṣṭam eva vastu syāc śabda-jñānābhyām /
SA15dhkpvsvu:05814_0: tad-viṣaya-abhimatasya tasya abhāvāt / anyasya ca vastu-
SA15dhkpvsvu:05815_0: dharmasya kasyacid asaṃsparśāt / tata eva ca sā śrutir anyāpoha-
SA15dhkpvsvu:05816_0: viṣayayā ity ucyate / anyavyāvṛtteṣv artheṣu vyāvṛtti-bhedam
SA15dhkpvsvu:05817_0: upādāya aviśeṣeṇa niveśanāt / vyavahāre apy anya-parihāreṇa
SA15dhkpvsvu:05822_0: yady avṛkṣebhyo bhedo vṛkṣas tasya avṛkṣa-grahaṇam antareṇa
SA15dhkpvsvu:05823_0: tathā grahītum aśakyatvāt avijñāta-vṛkṣeṇa avṛkṣasya api tad-vyavaccheda-
SA15dhkpvsvu:05824_0: rūpasya aparijñānāt buddhāv anārūḍhe arthe na saṃketaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:05901_0: teṣām avṛkṣāḥ saṃkete vyavacchinnā na vā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:05902_0: ya evam ekaṃ vastu-sāmānyam abhyupagamya itaretara-āśrayam
SA15dhkpvsvu:05903_0: anya-vyavacchedena saṃkete codayanti / teṣāṃ tatra api saṃketa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:05906_0: vyavacchinnāḥ kathaṃ jñātāḥ prāg vṛkṣa-grahaṇād ṛte //115//
SA15dhkpvsvu:05907_0: na hi tadā pratipattā vṛkṣaṃ vetti na avṛkṣaṃ taj-jñānāya eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:05908_0: tad-arthitayā upagamāt / so ajānānaḥ katham avṛkṣa-vyavacchedaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:05913_0: na hi saṃkete para-avyavacchedena niveśitāc śabdād vyavahāre
SA15dhkpvsvu:05914_0: tat-parihāreṇa pravṛttir yuktā / śiṃśapā-ādi-bheda-vat / atha api syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:05915_0: avidhāya niṣidhya-anyat pradarśya ekaṃ puraḥ sthitam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:05916_0: vṛkṣo ayam iti saṃketaḥ kriyate tat prapadyate //117//
SA15dhkpvsvu:05917_0: vyavahāre api tena ayam adoṣa iti cet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:05918_0: na vai vastu-sat sāmānya-vādinā kasyacid vyavacchedena kiṃcid
SA15dhkpvsvu:05919_0: vidhīyate / kiṃ tarhi / ekam agrato vyavasthitaṃ vastu sandarśya
SA15dhkpvsvu:05920_0: vṛkṣo ayam iti saṃketaḥ kriyate / saṃketa-kāle tathā-dṛṣṭam
SA15dhkpvsvu:05921_0: eva ayam arthaṃ tat-sambandhinaṃ vā vyavahāre api pratipadyata
SA15dhkpvsvu:06001_0: iti na samānaḥ prasaṅgaḥ / na samānaḥ / yasmāt tatra api /
SA15dhkpvsvu:06003_0: ayam apy ayam eva iti prasaṅgo na nivartate //118//
SA15dhkpvsvu:06004_0: ekaṃ pradarśya ayaṃ vṛkṣa ity api bruvāṇo ayam apy ayam eva ity
SA15dhkpvsvu:06005_0: ubhayīṃ gatiṃ na ativartate / tayoś ca sa eva doṣaḥ / na doṣaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:06006_0: dṛṣṭa-viparītasya sujñānatvāt / ekaṃ hi kiṃcit paśyato anyatra
SA15dhkpvsvu:06007_0: tad-ākāra-vivekinīṃ buddhim anubhavatas tato anyad iti yathā-anubhavaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:06009_0: ayam eva vṛkṣa iti pradarśya vyutpāditaḥ / yatra eva taṃ na
SA15dhkpvsvu:06010_0: paśyati tam eva avṛkṣaṃ svayam eva pratipadyate / na idaṃ vyavaccheda-
SA15dhkpvsvu:06011_0: vādinaḥ sambhavati / ekatra dṛṣṭasya rūpasya kvacid
SA15dhkpvsvu:06012_0: ananvayād darśanena pratipattau vyakty-antare api na syāt tathā
SA15dhkpvsvu:06013_0: pratītiḥ / evaṃ tarhi tatra api tulyam etat / yasmāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:06016_0: niveditam etat prāg yathā ete bhāvāḥ prakṛti-bhedino api jñāna-ādikam
SA15dhkpvsvu:06017_0: ekaṃ kāryaṃ kecit kurvanti na anya iti / tān ayaṃ tatra svayam
SA15dhkpvsvu:06018_0: eva tad-hetūn atad-hetūṃś ca vibhajya pratyeti / tasya /
SA15dhkpvsvu:06021_0: bhedena pratipadyeta ity uktir bhede niyujyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:06022_0: taṃ tasyāḥ pratiyatī dhīr bhrāntyā ekaṃ vastv iva īkṣyate //121//
SA15dhkpvsvu:06025_0: hetutayā tad-anyavyāvṛttyā ca atathābhūtān api tathā-adhyavasitān
SA15dhkpvsvu:06027_0: ete vṛkṣā iti sva-para-vikalpeṣv eka-pratibhāsān ādarśya vikalpa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:06101_0: ity uktim atad-hetubhyo bhede niyuṅkte / taṃ tasyāḥ pratipadyamānā
SA15dhkpvsvu:06102_0: buddhir vikalpikā bhrānti-vaśād eva eka-vastu-grahiṇī iva
SA15dhkpvsvu:06103_0: pratibhāti / na punar ekaṃ vastu tatra dṛśyam asti yasya darśana-
SA15dhkpvsvu:06106_0: agrahaṇāt / agṛhītasya ca apara-pravibhāgena anupalakṣaṇāt / ākṛter
SA15dhkpvsvu:06107_0: apy ekatra dṛṣṭāyā anyatra draṣṭum aśakyatvāt / tad-atadvator
SA15dhkpvsvu:06108_0: vṛkṣa-avṛkṣatve vyaktir eka eva vṛkṣaḥ syāt / bhavatu nāma ghaṭa-ādi-
SA15dhkpvsvu:06110_0: na hy ajñeyaṃ kiṃcid asti yato bhedaḥ syāt / tato bhedena
SA15dhkpvsvu:06111_0: viṣayīkaraṇa eva tasya jñeyatvāt / na eṣa doṣaḥ / yasmāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:06114_0: vyartho anyathā prayogaḥ syāt taj jñeya-ādi-padeṣv api /
SA15dhkpvsvu:06116_0: śabdaṃ hi prayuñjānaḥ sarvo anvaya-vyatirekau na ativartate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:06117_0: tasya pravṛtti-nivṛtty-arthatvāt / yadi hy ayaṃ na kasyacit kutaścin
SA15dhkpvsvu:06119_0: sarva-vyavahāreṣu na kiṃcid vyāharet / vyāhārasya avadhāraṇa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:06120_0: nāntarīyakatvāt / yathā ghaṭena udakam ānayeti / yadi ghaṭena añjalinā
SA15dhkpvsvu:06121_0: vā udaka-ānayanaṃ yathākathaṃcid abhimataṃ syāt udakam
SA15dhkpvsvu:06122_0: ānayety eva vaktavyaṃ syāt / na ghaṭena iti / tathā paṃśunā
SA15dhkpvsvu:06123_0: vā anena vā yena kenacid ānītena artha ānayety eva syād anākṣipta-
SA15dhkpvsvu:06124_0: karaṇa-karmakam / evam ānayanam anyad vā yat kiṃcid
SA15dhkpvsvu:06125_0: anuṣṭhānaṃ vā abhimataṃ tadā ānayety api na
SA15dhkpvsvu:06126_0: brūyāt / vyarthatvād vacanasya / tathā vyavahāra-upanītānāṃ jñeya-ādi-
SA15dhkpvsvu:06201_0: padānām api kenacid vyavacchedyena bhavitavyam / ananya-āśaṅkāyāṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:06202_0: prayoga-ayogāt tatra hi yad eva mūḍha-mater āśaṅkā-sthānaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:06203_0: tad eva nivartyam / anāśaṅkamāno vā kiṃ parasmād
SA15dhkpvsvu:06204_0: upadeśam apekṣate / aśrotṛ-saṃskāraṃ ca bruvāṇaḥ kathaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:06205_0: na unmattaḥ / tat-saṃskārāya eva śabdānāṃ kṛta-saṃketatvāt / avyavahāra-
SA15dhkpvsvu:06206_0: upanītaś ca na eva kaścit jñeya-ādi-śabdo asti / vākya-gatasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:06207_0: padasya artha-cintanāt / kva punar ete śabdāḥ prayujyanta iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:06209_0: jñeya-śabdasya ko artha iti praśne na kaścid arthaḥ / tataḥ kvacid
SA15dhkpvsvu:06210_0: apratipatteḥ / tathā ghaṭa-ādi-śabdānām api / yā api kvacit prakaraṇe
SA15dhkpvsvu:06213_0: tādṛśo jñeya-ādi-śabdeṣv api yathā-darśanam asty eva / tasmāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:06214_0: sarva eva śabda-prayogaḥ kutaścid buddhiṃ nivartya kvacin niveśana-
SA15dhkpvsvu:06216_0: niveśanaṃ ca yo yasmād bhidyate vinivartya tam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:06218_0: sa ca ayam anyavyāvṛttyā gamyate tasya vastunaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:06219_0: kaścid bhāga iti prokto rūpaṃ na asya api kiṃcana //125//
SA15dhkpvsvu:06221_0: na tatra gamyate kaścid viśiṣṭaḥ kenacit paraḥ //126//
SA15dhkpvsvu:06222_0: na ca api śabdo dvaya-kṛd anyonya-abhāva ity asan /
SA15dhkpvsvu:06224_0: niveśyamāno apy eṣa śabdo yasmād bhidyate taṃ vinivartya
SA15dhkpvsvu:06226_0: niveśyata iti / sa eva ayam artha-antara-vyāvṛttyā
SA15dhkpvsvu:06227_0: tasya vastunaḥ kaścid bhāgo gamyate śabdo artha-antara-nivṛtti-
SA15dhkpvsvu:06301_0: viśiṣṭān eva bhāvān āha ity ādinā nirdiṣṭaḥ / sa hi taṃ bhedaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:06304_0: sa eva bhedas tad-vyāvṛttyā gato bhāgas tad-gates tad-upādhitvāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:06305_0: tad-viśiṣṭo gata ity ucyate / na punar artha-antara-nivṛttir viśeṣaṇa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:06306_0: bhūtā keṣāṃcid arthānāṃ yayā viśiṣṭāḥ śabdaiś codyante / daṇḍi-vat /
SA15dhkpvsvu:06308_0: eka-bheda-abhidhāne api nāntarīyakas tad-anya-ākṣepo bhavati iti tayor
SA15dhkpvsvu:06311_0: darśayaṃs tad-vyāvṛttyā gamyate tad-viśiṣṭo vā ity āha / ata
SA15dhkpvsvu:06312_0: eva ca śabdasya na dvau vyāpārau tad-anyavyāvartanaṃ svārtha-
SA15dhkpvsvu:06314_0: svārthasya bheda-rūpatvāt / na hy anvayo avyatireko ananvayo
SA15dhkpvsvu:06316_0: tathā eka-parihārasya kvacit sthity-abhāve / sa ca ayaṃ bhedo arūpaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:06317_0: rūpavattvena tv asya darśanaṃ kevalaṃ buddhi-viplava
SA15dhkpvsvu:06401_0: tena eva aparamārtho asāv anyathā na hi vastunaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:06402_0: vyāvṛttir vastu bhavati bhedo asya asmād iti īraṇāt //128//
SA15dhkpvsvu:06403_0: rūpaṃ hi paramārthaḥ / bhedaś ced rūpaṃ syāt / tad-rūpaṃ vā
SA15dhkpvsvu:06404_0: syād atad-rūpaṃ vā / tādrūpye tad eva iti na anyas tato bhidyeta /
SA15dhkpvsvu:06405_0: na hi tasya rūpam anyasya syāt / na tad eva bhedasya rūpaṃ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:06406_0: rūpaṃ ca anyad eva syāt / tataś ca bhāvas tasmād vyāvarteta /
SA15dhkpvsvu:06407_0: tato asmāt tasya bheda iti na syāt / yat khalu yad-bhedād vyāvartate
SA15dhkpvsvu:06408_0: tad eva tad bhavati iti so asya bheda iti ca na syāt / na
SA15dhkpvsvu:06409_0: hy anyonyasya bhedo bhavati / sambandha-abhāvāt / sati vā sa
SA15dhkpvsvu:06410_0: kāryakāraṇabhāva iti rūpaṃ taj-janitaṃ bheda ity aviśeṣāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:06412_0: ca bhedasya tato apy asya bheda iti bheda-upādhitvāt dravya-antara-van
SA15dhkpvsvu:06413_0: na bhedaḥ syāt / na hi bheda-upādhir eva bhedo ayam ata
SA15dhkpvsvu:06414_0: iti viśeṣa-nirdeśāt / tataś ca upādhy-abhāve bhedasya eva abhāvaḥ syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:06415_0: tasmān na vyatiriktaḥ / tad-anya-gaty-abhāvāc ca vastuno na paramārthaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:06416_0: kathaṃ tarhy abhinnasya vastunaḥ śabdena codane
SA15dhkpvsvu:06417_0: tasya eva anyato api bhedād anaṃśaya-eka-bheda-codane sarva-bheda-
SA15dhkpvsvu:06418_0: gates tatra śabda-pramāṇa-antarāṇi vyarthāni na syuḥ / yasmāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:06420_0: liṅgaṃ vā tatra vicchinnaṃ vācyaṃ vastu na kiṃcana //129//
SA15dhkpvsvu:06422_0: bhaven nānā-phalaḥ śabda eka-ādhāro bhavaty ataḥ //130//
SA15dhkpvsvu:06423_0: uktaṃ prāg yathā saṃsṛṣṭa-bāhya-adhyātmika-bhedā buddhiḥ svam
SA15dhkpvsvu:06425_0: śabda-artham upanayati iti / tatra eva ca te śabdās tais tair bhrānti-
SA15dhkpvsvu:06426_0: kāraṇaiḥ saṃsṛṣṭa-rūpa iva ābhāti yathā-saṃketaṃ vicchedāya vyāpriyante/
SA15dhkpvsvu:06427_0: na ca eka-sādhyaṃ vyavacchedam anyaḥ karoti / saṃketa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:06501_0: pratiniyamāt na ca vicchinnaṃ kiṃcid vastv ākṣipyate
SA15dhkpvsvu:06502_0: yasya abhidhānād vastu-balena akhile gatiḥ syāt / śabdānāṃ buddhi-
SA15dhkpvsvu:06503_0: viplava-viṣayatvāt / tatra ca avastuni vastu-sāmarthya-abhāvāt / tathābhūta-
SA15dhkpvsvu:06505_0: viplava-anusārī vyavahāra iti tasya tat-pratibandhe sati
SA15dhkpvsvu:06506_0: tad-avyabhicāraḥ / tato vitathād apy ante tathābhūta eva vastuni
SA15dhkpvsvu:06508_0: eka-vastu-viṣayatvāt nānā-phalaḥ śabda eka-ādhāro vyāghātāt / yathā varṇite
SA15dhkpvsvu:06511_0: yadā anyaṃ tena sa vyāpta ekatvena ca bhāsate //131//
SA15dhkpvsvu:06514_0: syāt satyaṃ sa hi tatra iti na eka-vastv-abhidhāyini /
SA15dhkpvsvu:06518_0: śabdāś ca buddhayaś ca eva vastuny eṣām asambhavāt //134//
SA15dhkpvsvu:06519_0: yadi hi vidhi-rūpeṇa vastv eva śabdair vikalpair vā api viṣayīkriyeta
SA15dhkpvsvu:06521_0: ādayaś ca iti manyamānaḥ praṇetā nyāya-śāstrasya anyāpoha-
SA15dhkpvsvu:06525_0: tad ekam anaṃśaṃ vastu kathaṃ bhinna-ākārābhir buddhibhir
SA15dhkpvsvu:06526_0: viṣayīkriyate / ākāra-bheda-āśrayatvād bhedasya / tasya ca abhedāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:06527_0: tadātmano api sāmānyasya tad-ekayogakṣematvāt / tad ayam
SA15dhkpvsvu:06601_0: ādir na ca vastv-ātmana ekasya tatra eva vṛttir
SA15dhkpvsvu:06602_0: avṛttiś ca yuktā vyāghātāt / na ca anyatra avartamānaṃ sāmānyaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:06603_0: syāt / sāmānyasya vṛttir na viśeṣasya iti cet / na / bheda-abhāvāt / tad
SA15dhkpvsvu:06604_0: hi eka-rūpaṃ sāmānyaṃ vā bhavet viśeṣo vā / na hy asati rūpa-bhede
SA15dhkpvsvu:06605_0: ayaṃ pravibhāgo yuktaḥ sati vā avyatireko na syād ity uktam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:06606_0: tad ayam avibhāgo anviyād vā na vā / na punar ananvayo anvayī
SA15dhkpvsvu:06607_0: ca / yo api bhinnam eva sāmānyam āha / tasya api /
SA15dhkpvsvu:06609_0: yathāsvaṃ śabdā bhinnam artham abhidadhānāḥ katham eka-artha-
SA15dhkpvsvu:06612_0: sarvatra bhāvād vyāvṛtter na ete doṣāḥ prasaṅginaḥ //136//
SA15dhkpvsvu:06613_0: yathā hy ekas tasmād bhinnas tathā anyo api iti bhedasya asāmānya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:06614_0: doṣo api na asti / pariśiṣṭa-abhāvas tu prāg eva uktaḥ / api ca /
SA15dhkpvsvu:06619_0: yad rūpaṃ śābaleyasya bāhuleyasya na asti tat /
SA15dhkpvsvu:06621_0: artha-abhedena ca vinā śabda-abhedo na yujyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:06622_0: tasmāt tat-kāryatā api iṣṭā atat-kāryād eva bhinnatā //140//
SA15dhkpvsvu:06701_0: yo api manyate katham abhinnam artham antareṇa bahuṣv ekā
SA15dhkpvsvu:06702_0: śrutiḥ teṣām asāmyāt eka-vṛtter anyatra pratyaya-ajananāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:06703_0: apratyāsattike ca pratyaya-utpāde atiprasaṅgāt teṣu ca eka-
SA15dhkpvsvu:06706_0: iti / tasya apy ekam asti ity eva lokena śabdo niveśanīyaḥ tad
SA15dhkpvsvu:06707_0: vā ekam enāṃ śrutiṃ vastu-śaktyā eva dhvanayati iti / na asty etat /
SA15dhkpvsvu:06708_0: kiṃ tarhi kenacit prayojanena kecic śabdāḥ kvacin niveśyante /
SA15dhkpvsvu:06709_0: tatra yady anekam ekatra upayujyeta tad avaśyaṃ tatra codanīyaṃ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:06710_0: tasya pṛthak pṛthak codane atigauravaṃ syāt / na ca asya ananya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:06711_0: sādhāraṇaṃ rūpaṃ śakyaṃ codayitum / na apy asya āyāsa asya
SA15dhkpvsvu:06712_0: kiṃcit sāphalyaṃ / kevalam anena tatra yogyās te arthāś codanīyāḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:06713_0: ta ekena vā śabdena codyeran bahubhir vā iti svātantryam
SA15dhkpvsvu:06714_0: atra vaktuḥ / tad iyam ekā śrutir bahuṣu vaktṛ-abhiprāya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:06715_0: vaśāt pravartamānā na upālambham arhati / na ca iyam aśakya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:06716_0: pravartanā / icchā-adhīnatvāt / yadi hi na prayoktur icchā katham
SA15dhkpvsvu:06717_0: iyam ekatra api pravarteta / icchāyāṃ vā ka enāṃ bahuṣv api
SA15dhkpvsvu:06718_0: pratibandhuṃ samarthaḥ / prayojana-abhāvād / eva apravartanam iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:06719_0: cet / uktaṃ prayojanam / bhinneṣv ekasmāt pratītir atat-prayojana-
SA15dhkpvsvu:06720_0: bhedena ity uktam / na punaḥ svabhāvasya ekatvāt / yathāsvaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:06722_0: śabdo bhinneṣu bhaved ity uktaṃ prāk / atat-prayojana-vyāvṛttis
SA15dhkpvsvu:06723_0: tu bhinnānām aviruddhā iti sa eva artha-abhedaḥ śabda-abhedasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:06724_0: kāraṇaṃ bhavatu / tena ime tat-prayojanā ity atat-prayojanebhyo
SA15dhkpvsvu:06725_0: bhinnā eva uktāḥ / na punar eṣām anyā tat-kāryatā anyatra anyato
SA15dhkpvsvu:06802_0: sambhave kuto rūpa-vijñānam iti vyavahāra-lāghava-arthaṃ kaścit
SA15dhkpvsvu:06803_0: sāṃketikīṃ śrutiṃ niveśayet yaro rūpa-vijñāna-hetuḥ śaso
SA15dhkpvsvu:06804_0: vā iti / api nāma sarveṣāṃ tad-hetūnāṃ sakṛt pratītir yathā syād
SA15dhkpvsvu:06805_0: iti / na ca atra anugāmi kiṃcid rūpam asti / kevalaṃ tad-arthatayā
SA15dhkpvsvu:06806_0: te bhāvā atad-arthebhyo bhinnā iti bheda eva eṣām abhedaḥ / evaṃjātīyāś
SA15dhkpvsvu:06808_0: kiṃcid ekaṃ kāryaṃ kurvanti teṣāṃ tatra viśeṣa-abhāvād apārthikā
SA15dhkpvsvu:06809_0: viśeṣa-codanā iti sakṛt sarveṣāṃ niyojana-artham ekam ayaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:06810_0: lokaḥ śabdaṃ teṣu niyuṅkte ghaṭa iti / te api sajātīyād anyataś ca
SA15dhkpvsvu:06812_0: ity abhedāt tato aviśeṣeṇa pratīyante / tatra ghaṭasya rūpa-ādayo
SA15dhkpvsvu:06816_0: ta evam ucyante / na punar atra anyat kiṃcid yathā-varṇita-lakṣaṇaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:06817_0: dravyam asti tasya tādṛśasya anupalambhāt / eka-vacanam
SA15dhkpvsvu:06819_0: ye hetu-phala-viśeṣa-bhūtāḥ kiṃcid ekaṃ sādhayanti sādhyante
SA15dhkpvsvu:06820_0: vā te api sakṛt pratyaya-arthaṃ vrīhy-ādi-śabdaiḥ kṛta-saṃketāḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:06821_0: kathyanta iti pūrvavad vācyam / ye api pṛthak samastā vā kvacid
SA15dhkpvsvu:06822_0: upayujyante ta avasthā-viśeṣa-vācibhiḥ sakṛd eva śabdaiḥ pratyaya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:06823_0: arthaṃ khyāpyante sanidarśanāḥ sapratighā vā iti tad-anyebhyo
SA15dhkpvsvu:06901_0: apy aneka ekena vyavahāra-artham eva / yathā śābaleyo
SA15dhkpvsvu:06902_0: bāhuleyaḥ prayatnānantarīyakaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtako vā iti / tathā
SA15dhkpvsvu:06903_0: tat-kārya-pratiṣedhena apy acākṣuṣaḥ śabdo anityo anātma iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:06904_0: tat-kāraṇa-pratiṣedhena apy asvāmikaḥ śūnya iti / evaṃ yathāyogam
SA15dhkpvsvu:06905_0: anyad api vācyam / śūnya-anitya-ādi-śabdeṣu yathā-kalpanaṃ samīhita-
SA15dhkpvsvu:06906_0: ākāraṃ buddhāv āropya tad-vyavacchedena vyapadeśaḥ kriyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:06910_0: eka-vṛtter aneko api yady eka-śrutimān bhavet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:06911_0: na kevalam eka-kāryās tad-anya-bheda-aviśeṣād eka-śabdena ucyante
SA15dhkpvsvu:06912_0: api tv eka-vṛttyā apy aneka eka-śabdena ucyeta / ko virodhaḥ syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:06913_0: uktam atra / tasya upalabhya-abhimatasya anupalabdher abhāvāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:06915_0: ādayo na bhaveyur ity ādi / api ca /
SA15dhkpvsvu:06916_0: vṛttir ādheyatā vyaktir iti tasmin na yujyate //143//
SA15dhkpvsvu:06917_0: yad etad ekam anekatra vartamānam ekāṃ śrutiṃ vartayati
SA15dhkpvsvu:06918_0: tasya kā iyaṃ vṛttiḥ / ādheyatā vā syāt / yathā kuṇḍe badarāṇi
SA15dhkpvsvu:06919_0: vartanta iti / vyaktir vā tair abhivyakter / yady ādheyatā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:06921_0: nityaṃ hi sāmānyam iṣyate / anityatve aparāpara-utpatter anekatvād
SA15dhkpvsvu:06922_0: bheda-vad eka-pratyaya-ayogāt / nityasya ca kiṃ kurvāṇa
SA15dhkpvsvu:06923_0: ādhāraḥ syāt / tasya tatra samavāyād ādhāra iti cet ko
SA15dhkpvsvu:07002_0: tad eva idam anupakārakasya āśrayatvaṃ na sambhāvayāmaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:07004_0: ādayo api vastu-sambandhāḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvān na vyatiricyante /
SA15dhkpvsvu:07005_0: parasparam anyato vā anupakāriṇām apratibandhāt / apratibaddhasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:07006_0: ca asambandhāt / yady apy eka-artha-samavāyināṃ parasparam
SA15dhkpvsvu:07007_0: anupakāraḥ / tata ekasmād upakāreṇa bhāvyam / abhāve
SA15dhkpvsvu:07008_0: yathokta-doṣa-prasaṅgāt / ataḥ sva-upakāra-dvāreṇa eva param api
SA15dhkpvsvu:07009_0: buddhyā saṃghaṭayya khyāpyate / tasmāt tatra api kāryakāraṇabhāva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:07010_0: kṛta eva pratibandhaḥ / tad ayam āśrayaḥ sāmānyasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:07011_0: svātmany anupakurvāṇo anapekṣasya ādhāra iti yācitaka-maṇḍanam
SA15dhkpvsvu:07012_0: etat / kathaṃ tarhi idānīm ajanakaṃ kuṇḍaṃ badarāṇām
SA15dhkpvsvu:07016_0: prakṛtyā eva guruṇo dravyasya asamāna-deśa-kārya-utpādana dharmaṇaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:07018_0: kṣaṇa-sahakāri kuṇḍaṃ tatra eva badara-kāryaṃ janayad ādhāra
SA15dhkpvsvu:07019_0: ity ucyate / anyathā iha kuṇḍe badarāṇi ity api na syāt / na vai
SA15dhkpvsvu:07020_0: tad-upakāra-kṛto ayaṃ vyapadeśaḥ / kiṃ tarhi / saṃyoga-kṛtaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:07021_0: kiṃ punaḥ sa tayor eva saṃyogaḥ / tābhyāṃ jananāt samavāyād
SA15dhkpvsvu:07022_0: vā / sa kim ekatra eva na samavaiti janyate vā / tasya asāmarthyāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:07023_0: tad asamarthaṃ pṛthak tat sahitam api tādṛśam eva ity anupakārakatvān
SA15dhkpvsvu:07024_0: na saṃyogena tadvat syāt / sahitasya tad-anya-upakārād
SA15dhkpvsvu:07101_0: api tatra anupakārāt / ubhayathā kārakasya akiṃcitkaratvena
SA15dhkpvsvu:07102_0: anupakārakatvād ity ukta-prāyam / tasmāt sarva eva vastu-
SA15dhkpvsvu:07103_0: sambandhā janakasya eva upayoga-viśeṣa-vaśāt pravibhāgena kāryakāraṇabhāvād
SA15dhkpvsvu:07107_0: na hy ayaṃ janana-viśeṣa-lakṣaṇa ādhāra-bhāvaḥ sāmānye sāmānya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:07111_0: atha api syāt sthāpaka āśrayaḥ sāmānyasya tataḥ sthiti-hetutvād
SA15dhkpvsvu:07112_0: ādhāro na jananād iti / tad ayuktam / tasya tad-abhāve api sthānāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:07113_0: patana-dharmāṇāṃ hi bhāvānāṃ pāta-pratibandhād ajanako api
SA15dhkpvsvu:07114_0: sthāpako bhavet / atra api yadi kaścit pratibandhaṃ na paryanuyuñjīta /
SA15dhkpvsvu:07115_0: sa hi pāta-pratibandho na artha-antaram eva yaḥ sthāpayitrā
SA15dhkpvsvu:07116_0: kriyeta / artha-antaratve tatra eva asya upayoga iti kaḥ patataḥ pratibandhaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:07117_0: pratibandhād apāte api tulyaḥ paryanuyogo anavasthā
SA15dhkpvsvu:07118_0: vā / tasmāt pāta-abhāvaḥ pāta-pratibandhaḥ sa kathaṃ kenacit
SA15dhkpvsvu:07119_0: kriyate / abhāvaṃ karoti iti hi na abhāvo nāma kaścit kāryaḥ / tasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:07120_0: kathaṃcit kārya-rūpatve abhāva-ayogāt / tasmād bhāva- kriyā-pratiṣedha-
SA15dhkpvsvu:07121_0: nirdeśa eṣa bhāvaṃ na karoti iti yāvat / tathā ca ayaṃ na
SA15dhkpvsvu:07122_0: kiṃcit karoti ity akiṃcitkaraś ca kaḥ kasya sthāpako nāma / tena
SA15dhkpvsvu:07123_0: ayaṃ kenacid apratibaddha iti na kadācit tiṣṭhet / tasmāt pāta-
SA15dhkpvsvu:07124_0: pratibandha ity api kṣaṇikānāṃ bhāvānām upādāna-samāna-
SA15dhkpvsvu:07125_0: deśa-utpādanam ucyate / astu nāma ajananaṃ pātināṃ tat-pratibaddhaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:07126_0: tat-karaṇād gatimato dravyasya kaścit sthāpako apy astu /
SA15dhkpvsvu:07127_0: sāmānyasya akriyasya kiṃ-lakṣaṇāṃ sthitiṃ kurvāṇaḥ sthāpakaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:07128_0: syāt / sthitir hi tasya svarūpa-apracyutir eva / sā ca na āśraya-āyattā
SA15dhkpvsvu:07201_0: astu nāma āśraya-hetukā sthitiḥ sāmānyasya / sā sāmānyād anyā
