SA15dhkpvsvu:08120_0: utpādena asya samavayanti iti samayaḥ / tad-vyatikrame tasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:08121_0: paścād apy aviśeṣān na tat-samavāyaḥ syāt / tat-sambandhi-svabhāva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:08122_0: vaiguṇyād hi sa tasya prāṅ na āsīt tatra eva ca asya svabhāve
SA15dhkpvsvu:08123_0: sthitasya paścād bhavati iti duranvayam etat /
SA15dhkpvsvu:08125_0: na apekṣa-atiśaye apy asya kṣaṇikatvāt kriyā kutaḥ //161//
SA15dhkpvsvu:08126_0: karma-upakāram apekṣya pācakatvaṃ dravyeṇa vyajyata iti cet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:08201_0: sthira-svabhāvasya anatiśayād aviśeṣa-ādhāyini kā apekṣā / atiśaye
SA15dhkpvsvu:08202_0: vā kṣaṇikatvāt karmaṇaḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ svabhāva-bhūtasya anyānyasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:08203_0: atiśayasya utpattes tad api kṣaṇikaṃ syāt / tataḥ sva-utpatti-sthāna-vināśinaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:08204_0: kriyā kutaḥ yad-apekṣaṃ vyañjakaṃ syāt / kathaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:08205_0: tarhi idānīm asty abhinne vastuni jñāna-śabdayor anvayinor vṛttiḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:08206_0: yathā pācaka-ādiṣu / nanu tad eva idaṃ cintyate kathaṃ teṣv
SA15dhkpvsvu:08207_0: api iti / cintitam etad yathā na teṣu sambhavati / tat kim idānīm
SA15dhkpvsvu:08208_0: animitte te syātām / na animitte / kiṃ tarhi / na bāhya-tattva-nimitte /
SA15dhkpvsvu:08210_0: na punar vikalpa-abhidhānayor vastu-sattā samāśraya ity ukta-prāyam
SA15dhkpvsvu:08212_0: aparāpara-darśane apy anvayinos tayor darśanāt / na ca tatra
SA15dhkpvsvu:08213_0: tan-nibandhanaḥ kaścit svabhāvo asti paraspara-virodhinor yugapad
SA15dhkpvsvu:08214_0: ekatra samāveśa-ayogāt / aniyamena tarhi syāt / na hy animittaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:08215_0: bhavat kvacid bhavati kvacin na bhavati iti niyamam
SA15dhkpvsvu:08216_0: arhati / na khalu vai tad animittaṃ vāsanā-viśeṣa-nimittatvāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:08217_0: bāhyaṃ tu tathābhūtaṃ dṛśyaṃ na asti iti brūmaḥ / na ca asati tasmin
SA15dhkpvsvu:08220_0: ca te asatsu utpadyanta iti sarvatra sarva-ākāraḥ / vibhāge na eva tathā-upalabdhānāṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:08221_0: vikalpanāt / uktaṃ ca atra kiṃcid asmābhiḥ prakṛtyā
SA15dhkpvsvu:08222_0: api kecid eka-jñāna-kāryāḥ svabhāva-bhedād iti / api ca /
SA15dhkpvsvu:08223_0: tulye bhede yayā jātiḥ pratyāsattyā prasarpati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:08224_0: kvacin na anyatra sa eva astu śabda-jñāna-nibandhanam //162//
SA15dhkpvsvu:08226_0: na nivṛttiṃ vihāya asti yadi bhāva-anvayo aparaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:08227_0: ekasya kāryam anyasya na syād atyanta-bhedataḥ //163//
SA15dhkpvsvu:08228_0: yady ete bhāvā vyāvṛttiṃ muktvā svabhāvena kenacid anvayinā
SA15dhkpvsvu:08301_0: śūnyāḥ / na eṣāṃ bahūnām ekaṃ kāryaṃ syāt / yo hi tasya svabhāvo
SA15dhkpvsvu:08302_0: janakaḥ / na hi so anyasya asti / yo asti sa na janako vyatirekas ya
SA15dhkpvsvu:08303_0: niḥsvabhāvatvāt / yaj-janakaṃ tad eva vastu taj-janakaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:08304_0: ca aparatra na asti iti na aparaṃ janayet / sa hi tasya svabhāvo yo janakaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:08305_0: so anyasya api yadi syāt / sa tena svabhāvena tato abhinnaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:08307_0: yady ekātmatayā anekaḥ kāryasya ekasya kārakaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:08308_0: ātmā ekatra api so asti iti vyarthāḥ syuḥ sahakāriṇaḥ //164//
SA15dhkpvsvu:08309_0: yady eka-svabhāvatvād aneka ekasya kārakaḥ sa teṣām abhinnaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:08310_0: svabhāvaḥ / eka-saṃnidhāne apy asti iti / avaikalyāt kāraṇasya eko
SA15dhkpvsvu:08312_0: na apaity abhinnaṃ tad-rūpaṃ viśeṣāḥ khalv apāyinaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:08313_0: na hi tasya abhinna-svabhāvasya artha-antare viśeṣo asti / viśeṣo abheda-
SA15dhkpvsvu:08314_0: hāneḥ / sa ca tatra apy asti iti na eka-sthitāv api tasya apāyo asti / ye
SA15dhkpvsvu:08315_0: viśeṣās teṣāṃ saha-sthiti-niyama-abhāvāt syād apāyaḥ / na ca te
SA15dhkpvsvu:08317_0: tato janakasya sthānāt / asthāyinaś ca ajanakatvād
SA15dhkpvsvu:08318_0: eka-sthitāv api kārya-utpattiḥ syāt / na ca bhavati / ataḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:08320_0: tat-kāryam aneka-sahakāri-sādhāraṇam eka-viśeṣa-apāye api na bhavati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:08321_0: punar apy avikaleṣu sarveṣu viśeṣeṣu bhavati / na tv avikale
SA15dhkpvsvu:08322_0: apy abhinne rūpe / kāryaṃ hi kutaścid bhāva-dharmi yan na bhavati
SA15dhkpvsvu:08323_0: tat tasya eva vaikalyāt / na ca abhinnasya rūpasya eka-sthitāv
SA15dhkpvsvu:08324_0: api vaikalyam asti / avikale api tasminn abhavat tasya ajanaka-ātmatāṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:08401_0: tata eva utpattiḥ / tasmin sati niyamena bhavatas tad-anyasmād utpatti-
SA15dhkpvsvu:08402_0: kalpanāyām atiprasaṅgāt / tasmād viśeṣā eva janakā na
SA15dhkpvsvu:08403_0: sāmānyaṃ / tatas ta eva vastu / yasmāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:08404_0: sa pāramārthiko bhāvo ya eva arthakriyā-kṣamaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:08405_0: idam eva hi vastv-avastunor lakṣaṇaṃ yad arthakriyā-yogyatā ayogyatā
SA15dhkpvsvu:08409_0: na anveti yo anveti na tasmāt kārya-sambhavaḥ //166//
SA15dhkpvsvu:08410_0: tasmāt sarvaṃ sāmānyam anarthakriyā-yogyatvād avastu / vastu
SA15dhkpvsvu:08411_0: tu viśeṣa eva tata eva tan-niṣpatteḥ / svabhāva-ananvayāt tarhy
SA15dhkpvsvu:08412_0: ekasya janakaṃ rūpam anyasya na asti ity ajanakaḥ syāt / janakatve
SA15dhkpvsvu:08413_0: vā bheda-aviśeṣāt sarvo janakaḥ syāt / na etad asti / yasmāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:08414_0: tena ātmanā hi bhede api hetuḥ kaścin na ca aparaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:08416_0: ekasya janakād ātmano bhidyamānāḥ sarve samaṃ janakā na vā
SA15dhkpvsvu:08417_0: aviśeṣe kaścid iti syād etad yady eṣāṃ na viśeṣaḥ sambhavet / tato bheda-
SA15dhkpvsvu:08418_0: api kutaścid ātma-atiśayāt kaścij janako na aparaḥ / sa hi
SA15dhkpvsvu:08419_0: tasya svabhāvo na aparasya / na hi svabhāvā bhāvānāṃ paryanuyogam
SA15dhkpvsvu:08420_0: arhanti kim agnir dahaty uṣṇo vā na udakam iti / etāvat tu
SA15dhkpvsvu:08421_0: syāt kuto ayaṃ svabhāva iti / nirhetukatve anapekṣiṇo niyama-abhāvena
SA15dhkpvsvu:08422_0: atiprasaṅgāt / tasmāt svabhāvo asya sva-hetor ity ucyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:08423_0: tasya api taj-janana-ātmatā tad-anyasmād ity anādir hetu-paraṃparā
SA15dhkpvsvu:08501_0: bhinnānāṃ hi kaścid hetur na anyaḥ svabhāvād ity atra na kiṃcid
SA15dhkpvsvu:08504_0: abhedāt / svabhāvena eva viśvasya svātma-vad vibhāga-utpatti-sthiti-
SA15dhkpvsvu:08505_0: nirodha-ādayo na syuḥ tathā upalakṣaṇād abhedasya / idam eva hi
SA15dhkpvsvu:08506_0: bheda-abheda-lakṣaṇam eka-ākārasya api vyatireko avyatirekaś ca /
SA15dhkpvsvu:08508_0: bhedo api tena na evaṃ ced /
SA15dhkpvsvu:08509_0: na vai sarva-ākāra-avyatirekaṃ brūmo yena evaṃ syāt / kaścid asya ātmā
SA15dhkpvsvu:08510_0: bhinno na anya iti bhedān na sahotpatty-ādayaḥ / evaṃ tarhi
SA15dhkpvsvu:08513_0: bhedaḥ / sthāna-asthānayor ekātma-āśrayatve ko anyo dharmo bhedaka
SA15dhkpvsvu:08514_0: iti nānātvam eva kvacin na syāt / sarva-ākāra-viveka avivekinor vā arthayor
SA15dhkpvsvu:08515_0: abhyupagamān nāma kevalaṃ na iṣṭaṃ syān na vastv
SA15dhkpvsvu:08516_0: ity uktam / tad ime na ekayogakṣemā bhāvāḥ bhinnā eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:08518_0: tad idam artha-antaram anāyattam ajanyatvād asya idaṃ sāmānyaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:08519_0: bhedo vā iti vyapadeśaṃ na arhati / anyāpohe apy eṣa tulyaḥ prasaṅga
SA15dhkpvsvu:08522_0: na hy anyāpoho nāma kiṃcit tasya ca svabhāva-anuṣaṅgiṇyaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:08524_0: upaplavaś ca sāmānya-dhiyas tena apy adūṣaṇā //169//
SA15dhkpvsvu:08525_0: nirviṣayam eva khalv idaṃ mithyā-jñānaṃ yad anekatra eka-ākāram
SA15dhkpvsvu:08601_0: iti na tad-viṣayasya abhāvāt sthitir asthitir vā / yat punar etad uktaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:08603_0: yat tasya janakaṃ rūpaṃ tato anyo janakaḥ katham /
SA15dhkpvsvu:08604_0: tatra na brūmo anyasya taj-janakaṃ rūpaṃ na asti iti / kiṃ tarhi /
SA15dhkpvsvu:08605_0: yad ekasya taj-janakaṃ tad anyasya na ity anyo api svarūpeṇa eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:08606_0: janako na pararūpeṇa atattvāt / te yathāsvaṃ bhinnāś ca taj-janakāś
SA15dhkpvsvu:08607_0: ca svabhāvena iti ko atra virodhaḥ / eka-rūpa-vikalas tad-rūpo
SA15dhkpvsvu:08608_0: na syāt na atat-kāryaḥ / tena eva ca tat-kāryaṃ kartavyam iti ko
SA15dhkpvsvu:08611_0: ity uktam / na ca te viśeṣās tena ātmanā parasparam anuyanti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:08612_0: yad ekasya janakaṃ rūpam anyasya tan na asti / na ca tāvatā
SA15dhkpvsvu:08615_0: syād etat satyaṃ viśeṣā janakāḥ na punas teṣāṃ viśiṣṭam eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:08616_0: rūpaṃ kiṃ tv abhinnam api tad-eka-śakti-yogāj janakāḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:08618_0: saty api sāmānye rūpe na tena te janakās tasya anapāyād eka-sthitāv
SA15dhkpvsvu:08619_0: api kārya-utpatti-prasaṅgād ity uktaṃ prāk / kiṃ ca /
SA15dhkpvsvu:08622_0: utpatti-sthiti-vināśa-ādi-bhedaś na ity api-śabdāt / yo ayam abhinnān
SA15dhkpvsvu:08623_0: sarva-arthān manyate tasya ayam artheṣu buddhi-pratibhāsa-bhedo
SA15dhkpvsvu:08624_0: viruddha-dharma-adhyāsaś ca na syāt / sati vā tasminn abhede api
SA15dhkpvsvu:08625_0: na kaścid bhedaḥ syāt / tathā ca ayaṃ pravibhāgo na syād ekātma-vat /
SA15dhkpvsvu:08626_0: tasmād ayaṃ bhinna-pratibhāsa-ādir viśeṣa eva / na ca atra aparam
SA15dhkpvsvu:08701_0: sa eva arthas tasya vyāvṛttayo apare //170//
SA15dhkpvsvu:08702_0: tat-kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ ca uktaṃ tat svalakṣaṇam iṣyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:08704_0: yad arthakriyākāri tad eva vastv ity uktam / sa ca viśeṣa eva /
SA15dhkpvsvu:08705_0: yat punar etat sāmānyaṃ nāma tat tasya eva aparasmād bhedaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:08706_0: na hi tasya arthatve dṛśyasya rūpa-anupalakṣaṇaṃ yuktam / tad-
SA15dhkpvsvu:08708_0: yathā abheda-aviśeṣe api na sarvaṃ sarva-sādhanam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:08709_0: tathā bheda-aviśeṣe api na sarvaṃ sarva-sādhanam //173//
SA15dhkpvsvu:08710_0: yad uktam / kathaṃ taj-janaka-svabhāvād bhinno asya janakaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:08711_0: syāt / janakatve vā aviśeṣāt sarvo janakaḥ syād iti / uktam
SA15dhkpvsvu:08712_0: atra / yady aviśeṣaḥ syāt syād etad iti / yathā ca asya svayam
SA15dhkpvsvu:08713_0: abheda-vādino abheda-aviśeṣe api na sarvaḥ sarvasya janaka iti tathā
SA15dhkpvsvu:08715_0: bhede hi kārakaṃ kiṃcid vastu-dharmatayā bhavet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:08716_0: abhede tu virudhyete tasya ekasya kriyā-akriye //174//
SA15dhkpvsvu:08718_0: eva kārakāḥ syuḥ na anye atat-svabhāvatvād ity atra na eva kiṃcid
SA15dhkpvsvu:08719_0: viruddham asti / ekatve tu tasya tatra eva tathā kārakatvam akārakatvaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:08721_0: bhedo apy asty akriyātaś cen na kuryuḥ sahakāriṇaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:08722_0: na vai sarva-ākāra-avivekaṃ brūmo bhedasya api bhāvāt / tasmāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:08723_0: kaścid akārako api iti / tathā api kathaṃcid bhedāt sahakāriṇo
SA15dhkpvsvu:08725_0: paryāyeṇa atha kartṛtvaṃ sa kiṃ tasya eva vastunaḥ //175//
SA15dhkpvsvu:08726_0: atha api syān na eva kaścid akārako asti / sarveṣāṃ sarvatra paryāyeṇa
SA15dhkpvsvu:08727_0: upayogāt / śakter vā vipariṇatāyās tan-niveśinyā rūpa-antareṇa
SA15dhkpvsvu:08728_0: upayogāt / sa eva khalv ayaṃ paryāyo bheda-āśraya ekasya katham /
SA15dhkpvsvu:08801_0: pariṇāmo vā avyatirekiṇyāḥ / viśeṣe vā kathaṃcid ekatva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:08802_0: hānir iti yat kiṃcid etat / kiṃ ca /
SA15dhkpvsvu:08805_0: bhāvāś ced abhinnena ātmanā svātmabhūtena bhedinas tadvantaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:08806_0: syuḥ tad-abhinna-svabhāva-ātmatvād bhedasya api kutaḥ parasparaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:08807_0: bhedaḥ / atha na sa tasya samāna ātmā / tathā sati tadātmanā
SA15dhkpvsvu:08808_0: tena api na yuktaṃ tathā bhavitum / tathā abhāve hy atad-
SA15dhkpvsvu:08809_0: dharmā syāt / na hy ayaṃ pravṛtti-nivṛttimān svabhāva eko yuktaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:08812_0: na hi kvacid asya ekāntiko bhedo abhedo vā vivekena vyavasthāpanāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:08815_0: bhedaḥ sāmānyam ity etad yadi bhedas tadātmanā //177//
SA15dhkpvsvu:08817_0: yadi sāmānya-viśeṣayor yam ātmānam āśritya sāmānyaṃ viśeṣa
SA15dhkpvsvu:08818_0: iti sthitis tena ātmanā bhedas tadā bheda eva / yasmāt tau hi
SA15dhkpvsvu:08819_0: tayoḥ svātmānau tau ced vyatirekiṇau vyatireka eva sāmānya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:08820_0: viśeṣayoḥ svabhāva-bhedāt / svabhāvo hi bhāva iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:08823_0: vyatireke ca bheda-sāmānyayor na bhedaḥ sāmānyān na sāmānyaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:08826_0: yam ātmānaṃ puraskṛtya puruṣo ayaṃ pravartate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:08828_0: cintyete svātmanā bhedo vyāvṛttyā ca samānatā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:08901_0: asty eva vastu na anveti pravṛtty-ādi-prasaṅgataḥ //180 /
SA15dhkpvsvu:08902_0: sarva eva gaur aśvād bhinno abhinno vā iti bhedam abhedaṃ vā
SA15dhkpvsvu:08903_0: pṛcchan viśeṣam eva bhāvasya svabhāva-ākhyam adhikṛtya pravartate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:08904_0: sa eva hi tathā ucyate / dravyatva-ādayas tu na tatra śabda-coditāḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:08906_0: tato gatiḥ syāt / nirloṭhitaṃ ca etad ācāryeṇa / tad ayaṃ gava-ādi-śabda-
SA15dhkpvsvu:08907_0: pratyupasthāpitam arthaṃ bhinnam abhinnaṃ vā pṛcchann
SA15dhkpvsvu:08908_0: artha-antara-upakṣepeṇa tatra kim iti dvi-mukha-buddhiḥ kriyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:08909_0: tasmād yo asya ātmā ananya-sādhāraṇo yaṃ puraskṛtya puruṣo
SA15dhkpvsvu:08910_0: viśiṣṭa-arthakriyā-arthī pravartate yathā gor vāha-doha-ādau na anya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:08911_0: sambhavino arthasya yathā yuddha-praveśe sa eva svabhāvo
SA15dhkpvsvu:08912_0: yathāsvaṃ śabda-codito na dravyatva-ādi sāmānyam / tac-codanayā
SA15dhkpvsvu:08913_0: tadā prāptum anabhipretatvāt / gava-ādi-samāveśāt tad ātmabhūtānāṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:08914_0: ca ananvayena tatra anubhaya-rūpatvāt / tam eva ca ayaṃ bhāvaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:08916_0: asya abādhaka eva / sarvatra svabhāvena bhedasya abhyupagamāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:08917_0: sāmānyasya ca vyāvṛtti-lakṣaṇasya svabhāva-bhūtasya ca sāmānyasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:08918_0: abhede apy uktam / svātmanā eva abhede tu tat-svabhāva-nibandhana-
SA15dhkpvsvu:08919_0: arthakriyā-arthī samaṃ dvayor api pravarteta / eko api
SA15dhkpvsvu:08920_0: tām arthakriyāṃ tat-svabhāvatvād eva karoti / tad-anyasya api
SA15dhkpvsvu:08921_0: tat tulyam iti so api kiṃ na karoti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:08922_0: etena eva yad ahrīkāḥ kiṃ apy aślīlam ākulam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:08924_0: yad ayam ahrīkaḥ syād uṣṭro dadhi syān na iti kim apy aślīlam
SA15dhkpvsvu:08925_0: ayuktam aheya-upādeyam apariniṣṭhānād ākulaṃ pralapanti / tad
SA15dhkpvsvu:08926_0: apy anena nirastaṃ svabhāvena ekānta-bhedāt / tad-anvaye vā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:08928_0: codito dadhi khādeti kim uṣṭraṃ na abhidhāvati //182//
SA15dhkpvsvu:09001_0: tathā hy uṣṭro api syād dadhi na api sa eva uṣṭraḥ ye na anyo api syād
SA15dhkpvsvu:09002_0: uṣṭraḥ / tathā dadhy api syād uṣṭraḥ na api tad eva dadhi yena anyad
SA15dhkpvsvu:09003_0: api syād dadhi / tad anayor ekasya api kasyacit tad-rūpa-abhāvasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:09004_0: abhāvāt svarūpasya vā atad-bhāvinaḥ sva-niyatasya abhāvāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:09005_0: na kaścid viśeṣa iti / dadhi khādeti codita uṣṭram api khādet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:09006_0: atha asty atiśayaḥ kaścid yena bhedena vartate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:09007_0: sa eva dadhi so anyatra na asti ity anubhayaṃ param //183//
SA15dhkpvsvu:09008_0: atha anayoḥ kaścid atiśayo asti yena ayaṃ tathā coditaḥ kṣīra-vikāra
SA15dhkpvsvu:09009_0: eva pravartate na anyatra / sa eva atiśayo arthakriyā-arthi-pravṛtti-viṣayo
SA15dhkpvsvu:09011_0: vastu dadhi iti / sa ca tādṛśaḥ svabhāvo anyatra na asti iti / pravṛtty-abhāvād
SA15dhkpvsvu:09012_0: arthinaḥ / tasmāt tan na ubhaya-rūpam ity ekānta-vādaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:09014_0: sarvātmatve ca sarveṣāṃ bhinnau syātāṃ na dhī-dhvanī /
SA15dhkpvsvu:09016_0: so ayam ahrīkaḥ kvacid apy ekam ākāraṃ pratiniyatam apaśyan
SA15dhkpvsvu:09018_0: ādhimucyeta arthān abhilaped vā / tato bheda-agrahāt tat-saṃhāra-
SA15dhkpvsvu:09019_0: vādo na syāt syād uṣṭro dadhi syān na iti / atha punar asaṃsṛṣṭāv
SA15dhkpvsvu:09021_0: kvacit pratiniyamāt tat-pratibhāsa-bheda-kṛta eva tayo rūpayoḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:09023_0: tathā ca na ekas tad-ubhaya-rūpaḥ syād iti mithyā-vāda
SA15dhkpvsvu:09024_0: eṣaḥ / sthitam etat na bhāvānāṃ kaścit svabhāva-anvayo asti
SA15dhkpvsvu:09025_0: bheda-lakṣaṇam eva tu sāmānyam / atha ca prakṛtyā kecid eka-jñāna-
SA15dhkpvsvu:09026_0: ādi-phalāḥ kecin na iti / bhavatu nāma bhāvānāṃ svabhāva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:09101_0: bhedaḥ sāmānyam / yeṣāṃ tu nirupākhyānāṃ svabhāva eva na asti
SA15dhkpvsvu:09102_0: tatra kathaṃ svabhāva-bheda-viṣayāḥ śabdāḥ / teṣv avaśyaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:09104_0: ayogāt / tathā ca sarvatra ayam anvaya-vyatireka-āśrayo vyavahāro
SA15dhkpvsvu:09105_0: na syāt uṣṇa-svabhāvo agnir na anuṣṇa ity api / svabhāva-antarasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:09107_0: agni-svabhāvasya apratipattir iti vyāmūḍhaṃ jagat syāt / syād etat
SA15dhkpvsvu:09108_0: na tatra kasyacid asato niṣedhaḥ anuṣṇaṃ sad eva artha-antaraṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:09109_0: niṣidhyata iti / katham idānīṃ sad asan nāma / na brūmaḥ sarvatra
SA15dhkpvsvu:09110_0: asat tatra na asti iti deśa-kāla-dharma-niṣedha eva sarva-bhāveṣu
SA15dhkpvsvu:09112_0: anirdiṣṭa-viṣayasya naño aprayogāt / so api tarhi deśa-ādi-
SA15dhkpvsvu:09113_0: pratiṣedhaḥ katham / yasmān na tatra api deśa-ādīnāṃ pratiṣedho
SA15dhkpvsvu:09114_0: na apy arthasya / sambandho niṣedhyata iti cet / nanu tan-niṣedhe
SA15dhkpvsvu:09115_0: api tulyo doṣo niṣedhād asati śabda-apravṛttir ity ādi / asato vā asya
SA15dhkpvsvu:09116_0: niṣedhe tadvad dharmiṇo api niṣedhaḥ / na vai sambandhasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:09117_0: na asti iti niṣedhaḥ / kiṃ tarhi / na iha ghaṭo na idānīṃ na evam ity uktau
SA15dhkpvsvu:09118_0: na anena sambandho asti na etad dharmā vā iti pratītiḥ / tathā
SA15dhkpvsvu:09119_0: ca sambandho niṣiddho bhavati iti / tathā api kathaṃ niṣiddho yāvad
SA15dhkpvsvu:09120_0: asya sambandho dharmo vā na asti iti matir na bhavati / na ca asyāḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:09121_0: kathaṃcid bhāve sambhavo abhāveṣu tathā abhāvāt / tasmāt sambandha-
SA15dhkpvsvu:09122_0: abhāva-pratīter na ayam iha ity ādyā pratītiḥ / sa tad-abhāve
SA15dhkpvsvu:09201_0: na syāt / pratītau vā tad-abhāvasya / yathā pratīti-matas tat-prabhavāḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:09202_0: śabdāḥ kena nivāryante / sa eva hi śabdānāṃ na viṣayo
SA15dhkpvsvu:09203_0: yo na vitarkāṇām / te cet pravṛttāḥ ko vacanasya niṣeddhā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:09204_0: na hy avācyam arthaṃ buddhayaḥ samīhante / sambandhasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:09205_0: tu svarūpeṇa anabhidhānam uktam / abhidhāne sambandhitvena
SA15dhkpvsvu:09206_0: buddhāv upasthānāt / yathā-abhiprāyam apratītiḥ / tad ayaṃ pratīyamāno
SA15dhkpvsvu:09207_0: api sambandhi-rūpa eva iti svarūpeṇa na abhidhīyate / tasmān
SA15dhkpvsvu:09208_0: na abhāva-vat sambandhe api prasaṅgaḥ / api ca / ayam
SA15dhkpvsvu:09209_0: abhāvam abhidheyaṃ bruvāṇaṃ prati pratividadhad abruvāṇaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:09210_0: kathaṃ pratividadhyāt / vacane vā asya katham abhāvo anuktaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:09211_0: atha abhāvam eva na icchet / tena avacanam / tad eva idānīṃ katham
SA15dhkpvsvu:09212_0: abhāvo na asti iti / yat punar etad artha-niṣedhe anarthaka-śabda-aprayogān
SA15dhkpvsvu:09213_0: nirviṣayasya naño aprayoga ity atra uttaraṃ vakṣyate / tasmāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:09214_0: santy abhāveṣu śabdāḥ / teṣu kathaṃ svabhāva-bheda iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:09217_0: na āśaṅkyā eva siddhās te vyavacchedasya vācakāḥ //185//
SA15dhkpvsvu:09218_0: vastu-vṛttīnāṃ śabdānāṃ kiṃ rūpam abhidheyam āhosvid bheda
SA15dhkpvsvu:09219_0: iti śaṅkā syāt / abhāvas tu viveka-lakṣaṇa eva nimittīkartavyasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:09220_0: kasyacid rūpasya abhāvāt tad-bhāve abhāva-ayogāt / tad-bhāva-lakṣaṇatvād
SA15dhkpvsvu:09221_0: bhāvasya / tasmād ayam eva sa mukhyo vivekaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:09222_0: tasya tathā abhāva-khyāpinaḥ śabdāḥ kiṃ viveka-viṣayā ity asthānam
SA15dhkpvsvu:09223_0: eva etad āśaṅkāyāḥ / tasmāt siddham etat sarve śabdā viveka-viṣayā
SA15dhkpvsvu:09301_0: vikalpāś ca / ta ete eka-vastu-pratiśaraṇā api yathāsvam
SA15dhkpvsvu:09302_0: avadhi-bheda-upakalpitair bhedair bhinneṣv iva pratibhātsu buddhau
SA15dhkpvsvu:09303_0: vivekeṣu upalayanād bhinna-viṣayā eva / tena svabhāvasya eva sādhyasādhanabhāve
SA15dhkpvsvu:09304_0: api na sādhya-sādhana-saṃsargaḥ / tau na pratijñārthaikadeśo
SA15dhkpvsvu:09305_0: hetur iti / sa ca ayaṃ hetutvena apadiśyamānaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:09309_0: tena iyaṃ kṛtaka-śrutiḥ svabhāva-abhidhāyiny api para-upādhim enam
SA15dhkpvsvu:09311_0: upādhi-bheda-apekṣaḥ kvacit svabhāvo hetur ucyate kvacid anapekṣaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:09312_0: sāmānyena yathā anityatva eva sattvam kvacit svabhāva-bhūta-
SA15dhkpvsvu:09313_0: dharma-viśeṣa-parigraheṇa yathā tatra eva utpattiḥ / anayā
SA15dhkpvsvu:09315_0: sattā-svabhāvo hetuś cen na sattā sādhyate katham /
SA15dhkpvsvu:09317_0: yadi sattvam anityatve anyatra vā hetuḥ syāt sādhyam api kasmāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:09318_0: na iṣyate / tat kila evaṃ prasādhyamānaṃ viśeṣībhavati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:09319_0: na ca viśeṣaḥ sādhāyituṃ śakyate ananvayāt / yathā āha pramāṇa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:09320_0: viśeṣayā ajñānād iti / so ayaṃ viśeṣo na sādhya eva vyāhanyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:09321_0: kiṃ tarhi / hetāv api tulya-doṣatvāt / na hi hetur ananvayaḥ siddher
SA15dhkpvsvu:09322_0: aṅgaṃ tataḥ saṃśayāt / na eṣa doṣaḥ / yasmāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:09402_0: na kaścid arthaḥ siddhaḥ syād aniṣiddhaṃ ca tādṛśam //188//
SA15dhkpvsvu:09403_0: na sarvathā sattā-sādhane viśeṣaḥ sādhito bhavati / bhāva-mātra-
SA15dhkpvsvu:09404_0: viśeṣaṇo asti kaścid dharmī iti prasādhayato anirdiṣṭa-svabhāva-viśeṣasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:09405_0: kasyacit sattā-mātre virodha-abhāvāt na iha sattā-sādhana-
SA15dhkpvsvu:09406_0: pratiṣedhaḥ kiṃ tu sa tathā asti kaścid iti kaṃcana asya bhedam
SA15dhkpvsvu:09407_0: aparāmṛśan bruvāṇaḥ kaṃ svārthaṃ puṣṇāti / tasmād anena upātta-
SA15dhkpvsvu:09409_0: upātta-bhede sādhye asmin bhavad hetur ananvayaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:09410_0: sattāyāṃ tena sādhyāyāṃ viśeṣaḥ sādhito bhavet //189//
SA15dhkpvsvu:09411_0: sa hi dharmī pradhāna-lakṣaṇa eko nityaḥ sukha-ādy-ātmako anyo
SA15dhkpvsvu:09412_0: vā iti yathākathaṃcid api viśeṣitas tat-svabhāvaḥ prasādhito bhavati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:09413_0: sa ca tathā na anveti / yad api sattā-mātram anveti na tena
SA15dhkpvsvu:09414_0: siddhena kiṃcit / nanv evam agny-ādiṣv api prasaṅgaḥ / tatra api
SA15dhkpvsvu:09415_0: na agni-sattā-mātre kaścid vivādaḥ / viśiṣṭa-ādhāra-viśeṣasya tv abhimatasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:09416_0: ananvayād asiddhiḥ / na vai sa ādhāras taṃ viśeṣīkaroti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:09417_0: tad-ayogavyavacchedena viśeṣaṇād ity uktaṃ vakṣyate ca / tasmāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:09419_0: na tathā iha api kvacit sattāyāḥ sādhanam / pradhāna-ādi-śabda-vācyasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:09420_0: eva arthasya kvacid abhāvān nirviśeṣaṇā eva sā / katham abhāvo
SA15dhkpvsvu:09421_0: jñeya-abhidheya-prameyatvaiḥ so api siddha eva / tat kim idānīṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:09422_0: jñeyam asti iti siddhir astu / tathā api kiṃ siddhaṃ syāt / anyatra
SA15dhkpvsvu:09423_0: tu tad eva agni-sāmānyaṃ tatra asiddham iti sādhyate / nanu tatra api
SA15dhkpvsvu:09424_0: tad-ayoga-virahiṇā sāmānyena anvayo na siddha eva / na vai kaścit
SA15dhkpvsvu:09425_0: tathā abhūtena anvayaṃ karoti / pratipādayatā hi paraṃ dhūmo
SA15dhkpvsvu:09426_0: agni-nāntarīyako darśanīyo yatra dhūmas tatra agnir iti / sa tathā agni-
SA15dhkpvsvu:09427_0: mātreṇa vyāptaḥ siddho yatra eva svayaṃ dṛśyate tatra eva agni-
SA15dhkpvsvu:09501_0: buddhiṃ janayati / tatra ca sādhya-nirdeśena na kiṃcit / tatra
SA15dhkpvsvu:09503_0: kathaṃ tad-viśiṣṭena anvayaḥ / tad ayam agninā avinābhāvī
SA15dhkpvsvu:09504_0: siddhaḥ / arthād eva agnes tat-pradeśa-ayogaṃ vyavacchinatti iti sa
SA15dhkpvsvu:09505_0: tathā sādhya ucyate / na punas tathā asya upanyāsa-pūrvako anvayaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:09506_0: sādhya-ukter iha anaṅgatvāt / tat-pūrvakatve vā kaḥ pratijñāṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:09508_0: liṅgasya avyabhicāras tu dharmeṇa anyatra darśyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:09510_0: tasmān na agny-ādi-sādhana-vat sattā-sādhanam apy anavadyam iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:09514_0: vyāpini sādhya-dharme na anvaya-vyāghātaḥ / na hi tatra avaśyaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:09518_0: dharmo viruddho abhāvasya sā sattā sādhyate katham //191//
SA15dhkpvsvu:09519_0: sattāyāṃ hi sādhyāyāṃ / sarvas tad-hetur na trayīṃ doṣa-jātim
SA15dhkpvsvu:09520_0: atipatati / asiddhiṃ vyabhicāraṃ virodhaṃ ca / tatra yadi bhāva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:09601_0: dharmo hetur ucyate / sa katham asiddha-sattāke syāt / yo hi
SA15dhkpvsvu:09602_0: bhāva-dharmaṃ tatra icchati / sa kathaṃ bhāvaṃ na icchet / svabhāva
SA15dhkpvsvu:09603_0: eva hi kayācid apekṣayā dharma iti vyatirekī iva dharmiṇo
SA15dhkpvsvu:09604_0: nirdiśyate / na hi dharma-dharmi-vācinoḥ śabdayor vācye kaścid
SA15dhkpvsvu:09605_0: viśeṣo asti ity uktam etat / atha punar ubhaya-dharmaṃ brūyāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:09606_0: anāśrita-vastuno aparyudāsena vyatireka-mātrasya abhāve apy avirodhāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:09607_0: yathā na bhavati mūrta iti amūrtatvaṃ nirupākhye api
SA15dhkpvsvu:09608_0: syāt / nirupākhyasya abhāvād na pratiṣedha-viṣayatā iti cet / tat kim
SA15dhkpvsvu:09609_0: idānīṃ vidhi-viṣayo astu / tad api na iti cet / katham idānīṃ na
SA15dhkpvsvu:09611_0: etad vyavaccheda-mātraṃ dvayor api sambhavad vipakṣa-pracāra-
SA15dhkpvsvu:09613_0: kuryāt / sa ca svayaṃ sva-vāca-ubhaya-dharmatāṃ bruvāṇaḥ sato
SA15dhkpvsvu:09614_0: anyatra apy asya vṛttiṃ bhāṣate sattāyāṃ ca avyabhicāram iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:09615_0: kathaṃ na unmattaḥ / abhāva-dharmaṃ tu bhāva-mātra-vyāpino
SA15dhkpvsvu:09616_0: arthasya vyavacchedaṃ hetuṃ sattāyāṃ vadato asya viruddho
SA15dhkpvsvu:09617_0: hetuḥ syāt / tasya bhāve kvacid asambhavāt abhāve ca bhāva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:09618_0: vyavacchedasya bhāvāt / tad ayaṃ triprakāro api dharmaḥ sattā-
SA15dhkpvsvu:09619_0: sādhane na hetu-lakṣaṇa-bhāk na ca anyā gatir asti / tasmān na
SA15dhkpvsvu:09620_0: sattā sādhyate / sādhanatve punar asyāḥ sāmānyena tan-mātra-vyāpini
SA15dhkpvsvu:09621_0: vastu-dharme siddha-sattāke dharmiṇi na asiddhiḥ / tena ca
SA15dhkpvsvu:09622_0: sādhya-dharmeṇa vyāptir yadi kathaṃcin niścīyate na virodha-
SA15dhkpvsvu:09623_0: vyabhicārāv iti na ayaṃ prasaṅgaḥ / aniścitāyāṃ tu vyāptau dharmi-
SA15dhkpvsvu:09624_0: samāśraye vā tat-svabhāvatayā gamako na kaścid gamakaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:09701_0: vācyaḥ / na hi prakāśatayā prakāśayan pradīpas tad-rūpa-apratipattau
SA15dhkpvsvu:09705_0: tad-dharma-niścayād eva niścito vyāpakatvena tasya dharmiṇo
SA15dhkpvsvu:09708_0: tasya vyāpyasya dharmasya ayaṃ nivartako vyāpako dharmaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:09709_0: svayaṃ nirvartamānaḥ / evaṃ hy ayam asya vyāpakaḥ siddho
SA15dhkpvsvu:09710_0: bhavati yady asya abhāve na bhavet / tad anena dvividhasya api
SA15dhkpvsvu:09712_0: hi prayogaḥ sādharmyeṇa vaidharmyeṇa ca / yathā āhur
SA15dhkpvsvu:09713_0: eke anvayī vyatirekī ca iti / na anayor vastutaḥ kaścid bhedo anyatra
SA15dhkpvsvu:09714_0: prayoga-bhedāt / sādharmyeṇa api hi prayoge arthād vaidharmya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:09715_0: gatiḥ asati tasmin sādhyena hetor anvaya-abhāvāt / tathā
SA15dhkpvsvu:09716_0: vaidharmye apy anvaya-gatiḥ asati tasmin sādhya-abhāve hetv-abhāvasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:09718_0: anityatve yathā kāryam akāryaṃ vā avināśini /
SA15dhkpvsvu:09719_0: anena udāharaṇam anayor darśayati / tatra anvayī yat kiṃcit kṛtakaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:09720_0: tat sarvam anityam yathā ghaṭa-ādayaḥ śabdaś ca kṛtaka
SA15dhkpvsvu:09721_0: iti kṛtakatvasya apy anityatvena vyāptiṃ pradarśya śabdas ya
SA15dhkpvsvu:09722_0: kṛtakatve kathite sāmarthyād eva anityaḥ śabda iti / tasmān
SA15dhkpvsvu:09723_0: na avaśyam iha pakṣa-nirdeśa iti / ayam anvayinaḥ prayogaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:09724_0: vyatireke api na anityatva-abhāve kṛtakatvaṃ bhavati śabdaś ca
SA15dhkpvsvu:09725_0: kṛtaka iti / siddha-tat-svabhāvatayā tad-abhāve na bhavataḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:09726_0: kṛtakatvasya śabde ca bhāva-khyātau tadātmanaḥ sato bhāva iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:09727_0: sāmarthyāt siddheḥ pūrvavān na pratijñā-vacanam / anvayas tv
SA15dhkpvsvu:09801_0: arthāpattyā siddhaḥ / na hy atadātma-niyatasya tan-nivṛttau
SA15dhkpvsvu:09802_0: nivṛttiḥ / tasmāt tan-niyamaṃ prasādhya nivṛttir vaktavyā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:09803_0: sā cet sidhyati tadātma-niyamam arthāt sūcayati iti siddho anvayaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:09804_0: katham idānīṃ kṛtako avaśyam anitya iti pratyetavyo
SA15dhkpvsvu:09807_0: na hi bhāvā vinaśyantas tad-bhāve hetum apekṣante / sva-hetor
SA15dhkpvsvu:09808_0: eva vinaśvarāṇāṃ bhāvāt / tasmād yaḥ kaścit kṛtakaḥ sa prakṛtyā
SA15dhkpvsvu:09810_0: sāpekṣāṇāṃ hi bhāvānāṃ na avaśyaṃbhāvitā īkṣyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:09811_0: nirapekṣo bhāvo vināśe / sāpekṣatve hi ghaṭa-ādīnāṃ keṣāṃcin
SA15dhkpvsvu:09813_0: bāhulye api hi tad-hetor bhavet kvacid asambhavaḥ //194//
SA15dhkpvsvu:09814_0: yady api bahulaṃ vināśa-kāraṇāni santi teṣām api sva-pratyaya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:09815_0: adhīna-saṃnidhitvān na avaśyaṃ saṃnidhānam iti kaścin na vinaśyed
SA15dhkpvsvu:09816_0: api / na hy avaśyaṃ hetavaḥ phalavanto vaikalya-pratibandha-
SA15dhkpvsvu:09820_0: ity antaraślokaḥ / tad ayaṃ bhāvo anapekṣas tad-bhāvaṃ prati
SA15dhkpvsvu:09822_0: kārya-utpādane / nanv anapekṣāṇām api keṣāṃcit kvacin na avaśyaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:09824_0: na tatra api santānapariṇāma-apekṣatvāt / na evaṃ bhāvasya kācid
SA15dhkpvsvu:09825_0: apekṣā / tatra apy antyā kāraṇa-sāmagrī yā avyavahitā kārya-utpatteḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:09826_0: sā phalavaty eva / sa eva ca tatra aṅkura-hetuḥ / anyas tu pūrvaḥ pariṇāmas
SA15dhkpvsvu:09901_0: tad-artha eva / na ca tāṃ tatra kaścit pratibandhuṃ samarthaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:09902_0: ekatra bhāve vikāra-anutpatteḥ / utpattau vā ekatva-hāneḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:09903_0: tadātmanaś ca apracyutasya tad-utpādanaṃ prati vaiguṇyaṃ kāraṇasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:09905_0: yava-bīja-ādayo api śāly-aṅkure janye na sāpekṣāḥ / tadutpatti-pratyayānāṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:09906_0: kadācit tatra api saṃnidhānāt / kathaṃ na sāpekṣāḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:09907_0: yāvatā sa eva eṣāṃ svabhāvo na asti yas tad-utpādanaḥ śāli-bījasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:09908_0: iti tat-svabhāva-apekṣāḥ / evaṃ tarhi kṛtakānām api keṣāṃcit
SA15dhkpvsvu:09909_0: satāṃ vā sa eva svabhāvo na asti yo vinaśvaraḥ / tasmāt tat-svabhāva-apekṣatvān
SA15dhkpvsvu:09910_0: na vinaśvarāḥ / śāli-bīja-ādīnām api sa svabhāvaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:09911_0: sva-hetor iti yo na tad-hetuḥ so atat-svabhāvaḥ syāt / niyata-śaktiś
SA15dhkpvsvu:09912_0: ca sa hetuḥ svarūpeṇa pratīta eva / na ca svabhāva-niyamo
SA15dhkpvsvu:09914_0: ayogāt tathā atra api niyama-hetur vaktavyo yata ime kecin
SA15dhkpvsvu:09915_0: naśvara-ātmano jātā na ca atra kaścin niyāmakaḥ svabhāvasya asti
SA15dhkpvsvu:09916_0: sarva-janmināṃ vināśa-siddheḥ / janmi-svabhāvo nāśī iti cet / na vai
SA15dhkpvsvu:09917_0: janma nāśi-svabhāvasya hetuḥ na ca ahetoḥ svabhāva-niyamaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:09918_0: tasmān na atra kaścid hetoḥ svabhāva-pravibhāgaḥ / tad-abhāvāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:09919_0: phalasya api na asti ity asamānam / sā iyaṃ nirapekṣatā vināśasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:09920_0: kvacit kadācic ca bhāva-virodhinī tad-abhāvaṃ svabhāvena
SA15dhkpvsvu:09921_0: sādhayati / yo hi svabhāvo nirapekṣaḥ sa yadi kadācid
SA15dhkpvsvu:09922_0: bhavet kvacid vā tat-kāla-dravya-apekṣa iti nirapekṣa eva na
SA15dhkpvsvu:09923_0: syād ity uktam / sa tarhi naśvaraḥ svabhāvo nirapekṣa iti ahetukaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:09924_0: syāt / na ahetukaḥ sattā-hetor eva bhāvāt tathā-utpatteḥ / sato
SA15dhkpvsvu:09925_0: hi bhavatas tādṛśasya eva bhāvāt / na avaśyaṃ sataḥ kutaścid
SA15dhkpvsvu:09926_0: bhāva iti cet / ākasmikī tarhi sattā iti / na iyaṃ kasyacit kadācit
SA15dhkpvsvu:09927_0: kvacit viramet / tad hi kiṃcid upalīyeta na vā yasya yatra kiṃcit
SA15dhkpvsvu:09928_0: pratibaddham apratibaddhaṃ vā / sā iyaṃ sattā apratibandhinī cet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:10001_0: niyamavatī na syāt / tasmān na iyam ākasmikī kvacit / kathaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:10002_0: tarhi idānīm ahetuko vināśa uktaḥ / jātasya tad-bhāve anya-anapekṣaṇāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:10003_0: uktaṃ ca atra na vināśo nāma anya eva kaścid bhāvāt svabhāva
SA15dhkpvsvu:10004_0: eva hi nāśaḥ sa eva hy eka-kṣaṇa-sthāyī jāta iti / tam asya
SA15dhkpvsvu:10005_0: mandāḥ svabhāvam ūrdhvaṃ vyavasyanti na prāk darśane api
SA15dhkpvsvu:10006_0: pāṭava-abhāvād iti tad-vaśena paścād vyavasthāpyate vikāra-darśanena
SA15dhkpvsvu:10007_0: iva viṣam ajñaiḥ / tad ayaṃ sattā-vyatirekeṇa na anyat kiṃcid
SA15dhkpvsvu:10008_0: vināśo apekṣata iti tad-vyāpī / kathaṃ punar etad gamyate
SA15dhkpvsvu:10011_0: abhāva-kāriṇaḥ kriyā-pratiṣedhāc ca iti ca-śabdāt / katham asāmarthyam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:10012_0: siddhe hi bhāve kārako na taṃ karoti / na apy anya-kriyāyāṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:10013_0: tasya kiṃcid iti / tad-atad-rūpa-akaraṇāc ca akiṃcitkaro na apekṣyata
SA15dhkpvsvu:10014_0: iti / kathaṃ kriyā-pratiṣedho vināśa iti hi te bhāva-abhāvaṃ manyante /
SA15dhkpvsvu:10015_0: tad ayaṃ vināśa-hetur abhāvaṃ karoti iti prāptam / tatra
SA15dhkpvsvu:10016_0: yady abhāvo nāma kaścit kāryaḥ syāt svabhāvaḥ sa eva bhāva iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:10017_0: na abhāvaḥ syāt / tasmād abhāvaṃ karoti iti bhāvaṃ na karoti iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:10018_0: kriyā-pratiṣedho asya kṛtaḥ syāt / tathā apy ayam akiṃcitkaraḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:10019_0: kim iti apekṣyata iti siddhā vināśaṃ praty anapekṣayā bhāvasya /
SA15dhkpvsvu:10022_0: yatra nāma bhavaty asmād anyatra api svabhāvataḥ //196//
SA15dhkpvsvu:10023_0: so ayaṃ kvacid bhavan dṛṣṭo anapekṣatvāt svabhāvata eva bhavati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:10024_0: tathā anyatra api svabhāva-bhāvī viśeṣa-abhāvād iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:10025_0: yā kācid bhāva-viṣayā dvidhā eva anumitis tataḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:10028_0: tasmāt dviprakārā eva vastu-viṣaya-anumitiḥ kārya-liṅgā svabhāva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:10101_0: liṅgā ca / yathāsvaṃ vyāpini sādhye tayor eva pratibandhāt liṅgayor
SA15dhkpvsvu:10105_0: tṛtīyas tu hetur anupalabdhir aviśeṣeṇa kvacid arthe gamaka ity
SA15dhkpvsvu:10106_0: ucyate / san-niścaya-śabda-vyavahāra-pratiṣedhe hi sarvā eva anupalabdhir
SA15dhkpvsvu:10108_0: te pravṛttir ity uktāḥ / tathā hy anupalabdhir eva asattvam
SA15dhkpvsvu:10109_0: ity uktam prāk / tac ca pratipattṛ-vaśān na vastu-vaśāt / tāvad hi
SA15dhkpvsvu:10110_0: sa bhāvo asya na asti yāvad atra apratipattiḥ / satā api te na tad-artha-akaraṇāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:10111_0: vastutas tv anupalabhyamāno na san na asan / satām
SA15dhkpvsvu:10112_0: api svabhāva-ādi-viprakarṣāt kadācid anupalambhāt tasya asatsv api
SA15dhkpvsvu:10113_0: tulyatvāt / tad etat pratipattuḥ pramāṇa-abhāvān nivṛttaṃ sattvam
SA15dhkpvsvu:10115_0: tena yā api iyam anupalabdhir upalabdhi-lakṣaṇa-prāptānāṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:10116_0: vastuto apy asattva-rūpā apravṛtti-yogyatvāt / tasyā apy etat tulyaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:10117_0: prāmāṇyam atra viṣaye / asan-niścaya-phalā api sā / asattāyām api iyaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:10118_0: pramāṇam eva / na hy asti sambhavo yad upalabdhi-yogyaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:10119_0: sakaleṣv anyeṣu kāraṇeṣu san na upalabhyeta / na punaḥ pūrvā
SA15dhkpvsvu:10122_0: aliṅgāś ca kathaṃ teṣām abhāvo anupalabdhitaḥ //199//
SA15dhkpvsvu:10123_0: so ayam asattāṃ sādhayann anupalabdhi-mātreṇa sarva-arthānāṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:10201_0: pramāṇa-traya-nivṛttyā sādhayet / tatra na śāstra-nivṛttir abhāva-sādhanī /
SA15dhkpvsvu:10202_0: tasya kvacid anadhikāre apravṛtteḥ / śāstraṃ hi pravartamānaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:10204_0: anyathā abaddha-pralāpasya aprāmāṇyāt / tatra ca prakaraṇe
SA15dhkpvsvu:10205_0: bahavo arthā na avaśyaṃ nirdeśyāḥ / yathā pratyātma-niyatāḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:10207_0: kāla-vyavahitā vā prakaraṇa-anupayogino dravya-viśeṣā na tān
SA15dhkpvsvu:10208_0: śāstraṃ viṣayīkaroti / na ca tathā viprakṛṣṭeṣu sva-sāmarthya-upadhānāv
SA15dhkpvsvu:10209_0: jñāna-utpādana-śaktir asti / na ca avaśyam eṣāṃ kārya-upalambho
SA15dhkpvsvu:10210_0: yena anumīyeran / na ca te pramāṇa-traya-nivṛttāv api
SA15dhkpvsvu:10211_0: na santi iti śakyante vyavasātum / tasmān na sarva-anupalabdhiḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:10213_0: sad-asan-niścaya-phalā na iti syād vā apramāṇatā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:10214_0: na eva vā iyam anupalabdhiḥ pramāṇaṃ vyavasāya-phalatvāt pramāṇānām /
SA15dhkpvsvu:10215_0: na hi pravṛtti-niṣedhe api iyaṃ niḥśaṅka-paricchedaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:10216_0: cetaḥ karoti / saṃśayād api kvacil lokasya pravṛtteḥ / tathātve
SA15dhkpvsvu:10217_0: tan niravadyaṃ yadi niścaya-pūrvaṃ vyavahared iti sā iyam apravṛtti-
SA15dhkpvsvu:10220_0: atra na sarva-anupalabdhir apramāṇam / pramāṇam api kācil liṅga-
SA15dhkpvsvu:10221_0: viśeṣa-bhāvinī yathā-udāhṛtā prāk / yat punar uktam apramāṇam anupalabdhir iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:10301_0: yasya kasyacit svabhāvo na upalabhyate deśa-ādi-viprakarṣāt na
SA15dhkpvsvu:10302_0: sa tad-anupalambha-mātreṇa asan nāma yathoktaṃ prāk / yo api
SA15dhkpvsvu:10303_0: jñāpakasya liṅgasya abhāvād atīndriyaḥ pratikṣipyate arthaḥ svabhāva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:10304_0: viśeṣo vā yathā na asti viraktaṃ ceto devatā-viśeṣo vā
SA15dhkpvsvu:10305_0: na asti dāna-hiṃsā-virati-cetanānām abhyudaya-hetutā iti pratyakṣe
SA15dhkpvsvu:10306_0: apy arthe phalasya ānantarya-abhāvād atat-phala-sādharmyād viparyasto
SA15dhkpvsvu:10307_0: apavadeta api na tāvatā tad-abhāva eva vyavahitānām
SA15dhkpvsvu:10310_0: bhāve kiṃ pramāṇam iti cet / ata eva saṃśayo astu bhaved
SA15dhkpvsvu:10311_0: vā pramāṇam ity apratikṣepaḥ / tad atra keṣāṃcid arthānāṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:10313_0: niyama-abhāvāc ca bhavej jñāpaka-asiddhiḥ / neyatā tad-abhāvaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:10315_0: kārye tu kāraka-ajñānam abhāvasya eva sādhakam //201//
SA15dhkpvsvu:10316_0: svabhāva-abhāve sādhye tad-anupalambha eva apramāṇam ucyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:10317_0: kāraka-anupalambhas tu pramāṇam eva / na hy asti sambhavo yad
SA15dhkpvsvu:10318_0: asati kāraṇe kāryaṃ syāt / nanu kadācit kāraṇa-nāśe api kārya-sthitir
SA15dhkpvsvu:10319_0: dṛṣṭā / na brūmaḥ kāraṇa-sthiti-kāla-bhāvī kāryam iti / hetu-rahitā
SA15dhkpvsvu:10320_0: tu bhāva-utpattir na asti ity ucyate / na ca tathā sthāyī bhāvas tad-upādānaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:10322_0: yady asya kathaṃcid abhāvaḥ sidhyet tat-phalaṃ na asti iti niścīyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:10324_0: svabhāva-abhāva eva liṅgini svabhāva-anupalambho api kaścit pramāṇam eva /
SA15dhkpvsvu:10325_0: eva yady anupalabhyamāno vyāpakaḥ svabhāvo asya
SA15dhkpvsvu:10401_0: yady asya kāraṇasya svabhāvasya vyāpakasya vā abhāvaḥ kutaścid
SA15dhkpvsvu:10402_0: gamakād hetoḥ sidhyet / so ayaṃ asan eva sva-kāryaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:10403_0: vyāpyaṃ vā nivartayati / tad-abhāva-asiddhau nivartye api saṃśayāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:10404_0: katham idānīṃ bhāvasya svayam anupalabdher abhāva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:10408_0: bhāvo hi yadi bhaved yathāsvaṃ grāhakeṇa karaṇena upalabhya
SA15dhkpvsvu:10409_0: eva bhavet / sa darśana-pratibandhiṣu vyavadhāna-ādiṣv asatsu upalabhya
SA15dhkpvsvu:10410_0: eva / anupalabdhas tv asann iti niścīyate / tādṛśaḥ sata
SA15dhkpvsvu:10411_0: upalambha-avyabhicārāt / ayam eva hetur hetu-vyāpakayor abhāve
SA15dhkpvsvu:10415_0: yo hi bhāvo yena saha na avatiṣṭhate tad-upādānayor anyonya-vaiguṇya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:10416_0: āśrayatvena ārambha-virodhāt tayor viruddhayor ekasya bhāve
SA15dhkpvsvu:10417_0: apy anya-abhāva-gatir bhavati yathoktaṃ prāk / idam anupalabdher
SA15dhkpvsvu:10418_0: na pṛthag vyavasthāpyate / tata eva virodha-gater virodhāc ca abhāva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:10419_0: sādhanāt / bhavatu nāma evaṃvidhāyā anupalabdher abhāva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:10420_0: gatiḥ / sā punaḥ katham anumānam / kathaṃ ca na syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:10421_0: dṛṣṭānta-anapekṣaṇāt / na hy asyāṃ kaścid dṛṣṭānto asti / kiṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:10422_0: na nirupākhyaṃ vyomakusuma-ādi dṛṣṭāntaḥ / tad asat katham
SA15dhkpvsvu:10423_0: avagantavyaṃ yena evaṃ syāt / anupalabdher eva iti cet / tatra
SA15dhkpvsvu:10424_0: katham adṛṣṭāntikā asattā-siddhiḥ sadṛṣṭāntatve vā anavasthā-prasaṅgaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:10426_0: anyatra api dṛṣṭānta-anapekṣaṇād ananumānam / śṛṇvann api devānāṃpriyo
SA15dhkpvsvu:10429_0: etān sādhayati iti sva-nimitta-sāmagrī-yogya-saṃnidhānaḥ sarvo atra
SA15dhkpvsvu:10501_0: dṛṣṭāntaḥ / asattā punar atra anupalabdhir eva / ata eva iyaṃ kāraṇāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:10504_0: nimitta-vaikalya-abhāvino aṅkura-ādayo dṛṣṭāntaḥ na kevalaṃ nirupākhyam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:10505_0: nirupākhye api iyam eva pravṛttir niṣidhyate / anupalabdhi-
SA15dhkpvsvu:10506_0: lakṣaṇā asattā siddhā eva / so ayaṃ mūḍho nimittaṃ tad-abhāvaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:10507_0: vā abhyupagamya pravṛtti-nivṛttī vilomayan yathā abhyupagamaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:10508_0: pratipādyate nirupākhya-vad anya-vad vā iti / sa eva tāvad
SA15dhkpvsvu:10509_0: upalabdhy-abhāvaḥ kathaṃ siddha iti cet / etad uttaratra vakṣyāmaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:10510_0: anyatra apy anumāne sādhya-dharmeṇa vyāptaṃ sādhanam
SA15dhkpvsvu:10511_0: icchan kim iti dṛṣṭāntena pratyāyyo vyāpya-nirdeśād eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:10512_0: vyāpnuvataḥ siddheḥ / niścita-arthasya api smṛty-artho dṛṣṭānta iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:10513_0: cet / tad itaratra api samānaṃ / so ayam anyatra anupalambha-mātrād
SA15dhkpvsvu:10514_0: asad-vyavahāraṃ pratipadyamāno api iha vyāmūḍha iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:10515_0: smāryate / atha yad idaṃ na santi pradhāna-ādayo anupalabdher
SA15dhkpvsvu:10517_0: vā / kathaṃ ca na syāt / tad-artha-pratiṣedhe dharmi-vācino aprayogād
SA15dhkpvsvu:10518_0: abhidhānasya nirviṣayasya ca pratiṣedhasya ayogāt / na eṣa
SA15dhkpvsvu:10523_0: tathā hetur na tasya eva abhāvaḥ śabda-prayogataḥ //206//
SA15dhkpvsvu:10524_0: niveditam etat yathā na ete śabdāḥ svalakṣaṇa-viṣayā anādi-
SA15dhkpvsvu:10526_0: kurvanti vaktuḥ śrotus ca tad-vikalpa-bhājo yathāpratibhāsi-
SA15dhkpvsvu:10601_0: na ca upādāna-kārya-pratyaya-apratibhāsi rūpaṃ śakyaṃ tad-viṣayatvena
SA15dhkpvsvu:10604_0: ca bhāva-abhāva-ubhaya-dharma ity ucyate / tad atra dharmiṇi vyavasthitāḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:10606_0: artho bhāva-upādāno na vā iti / tasya bhāva-anupādānatve
SA15dhkpvsvu:10607_0: sādhye sa eva pratyātma-vedyatvād apratikṣepa-arho artho dharmī /
SA15dhkpvsvu:10608_0: na ca sa eva arthaḥ svalakṣaṇam iti śakyaṃ vaktum / asamprāpta-niruddhayor
SA15dhkpvsvu:10613_0: atīta-ajātayor vā api na ca syād anṛta-arthatā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:10614_0: vācaḥ kasyāścid ity eṣā bauddha-artha-viṣayā matā //208//
SA15dhkpvsvu:10615_0: iti saṃgrahaślokau / tasya ca yathā samīhita-rūpa-anupādānatve
SA15dhkpvsvu:10616_0: sādhye tathā anupalambho asya dharmo asti iti na sādhana-dharma-asiddhiḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:10617_0: na punar atra ayam eva śabda-vikalpa-pratibhāsy artho apahnūyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:10621_0: na sādhyaḥ samudāyaḥ syāt siddho dharmaś ca kevalaḥ //209//
SA15dhkpvsvu:10623_0: yadi hi śabda-artha eva apohyeta pradhāna-śabda-vācyasya dharmiṇa
SA15dhkpvsvu:10624_0: eva nirākaraṇān nirādhāraḥ sādhya-dharmaḥ syāt / tad ayam
SA15dhkpvsvu:10625_0: ādhāra-vyavaccheda-anapekṣo na vivāda-āśraya iti na upanyasanīya
SA15dhkpvsvu:10628_0: vastv eva cintyate hy atra pratibaddhaḥ phala-udayaḥ //210//
SA15dhkpvsvu:10701_0: na hi śabda-artho asan san vā kaṃcit puruṣa-artham uparuṇaddhi
SA15dhkpvsvu:10702_0: samādadhāti vā / yathā abhiniveśam atattvāt / yathā atattvaṃ ca asamīhitatvāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:10704_0: avadhīrita-vikalpa-pratibhāso vastv eva adhiṣṭhānīkaroti yatra ayaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:10705_0: puruṣa-arthaḥ pratibaddho yathā agnau śīta-pratīkāra-ādiḥ / na hy
SA15dhkpvsvu:10706_0: atra śabda-arthaḥ samarthas tad-anubhava-āptāv api tad-abhāvāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:10707_0: tad ayam arthakriyā-arthī tad-asamarthaṃ prati dattā-anuyogo bhavituṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:10708_0: na yuktaḥ / na hi vṛṣasyantī ṣaṇḍhasya rūpa-vairūpya-parīkṣāyām
SA15dhkpvsvu:10709_0: avadhatte / yat punar etad uktaṃ kalpitasya anupalabdhir
SA15dhkpvsvu:10713_0: kalpanā-viṣayatvāc śabda-artha eva kalpitaḥ / tasya vastv -āśraya-anupalambho
SA15dhkpvsvu:10714_0: dharma ity abhiprāyaḥ / yad uktam na pramāṇa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:10715_0: traya-nivṛttāv api bhāva-abhāva-siddhir iti / tan mā bhūd anya-pramāṇa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:10716_0: anivṛttau nivṛttiḥ / tayor asakala-viṣayatvād āgamaḥ punar
SA15dhkpvsvu:10717_0: na kiṃcin na vyāpnoti / tan-nivṛttiḥ kathaṃ na gamikā iti / uktam
SA15dhkpvsvu:10718_0: atra na āgameṣu sarva-arthā upanibadhyante aprakaraṇa-āpannatvād
SA15dhkpvsvu:10721_0: na artha-siddhis tatas te hi vaktṛ-abhiprāya-sūcakāḥ //213//
SA15dhkpvsvu:10722_0: na hi śabdā yathābhāvaṃ vartante yatas tebhyo artha-prakṛtir

SA15dhkpvsvu:12525_0: hi tāny anāhita-saṃskārāḥ paraiḥ pravartayanti / sva- pratibhā-racita-
SA15dhkpvsvu:12526_0: samayānām api yathā aśruta-artha-vikalpa-saṃhāreṇa eva pravṛtteḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:12527_0: tat kiṃcit kutaścid āgatam ity ekasya upadeṣṭuḥ prabandhena abhāvād
SA15dhkpvsvu:12528_0: apara-pūrvakam ity ucyate / prāg eva yathā-darśana-
SA15dhkpvsvu:12530_0: ādi-kalpikeṣv adṛṣṭā eva vyavahārāḥ paścāt pravṛttā iṣyante /
SA15dhkpvsvu:12601_0: na / teṣām apy anya-saṃskāra-āhitānāṃ yathā-pratyayaṃ prabodhāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:12603_0: tādṛśe apauruṣeyatve kaḥ siddhe api guṇo bhavet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:12604_0: kāmam avisaṃvādakam ity apauruṣeyatvam iṣṭam / tad visaṃvādakānām
SA15dhkpvsvu:12605_0: api keṣāṃcid anāditvād asti iti kim apauruṣeyatvena /
SA15dhkpvsvu:12608_0: yadi apauruṣeyatve api pratiniyatām eva tad-artha-pratibhāṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:12609_0: janayed āśvāsanaṃ syāt / yatheṣṭaṃ tu samāropa-apavādābhyāṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:12611_0: ca te arthās teṣāṃ na saṃghaṭante / samaya-prādhānyād artha-niveśasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:12613_0: aneka-artha-pāṭhāt / rūḍher apy ekāntena ananumateḥ / arūḍha-
SA15dhkpvsvu:12616_0: api ca / ayam apauruṣeyatvaṃ sādhayan varṇānāṃ vā sādhayed
SA15dhkpvsvu:12618_0: anya-aviśeṣād varṇānāṃ sādhane kiṃ phalaṃ bhavet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:12619_0: na hi loka-vedayor nānā varṇāḥ / bhede api ca pratyabhijñāna-aviśeṣāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:12622_0: ca / teṣāṃ ca apauruṣeyatva-sādhane te tulyāḥ sarvatra
SA15dhkpvsvu:12623_0: iti kim anena pariśeṣitam / tathā ca sarvo vyavahāro apauruṣeyaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:12624_0: na ca sarvo avitatha iti vyarthaḥ pariśramaḥ / atha vākyam
SA15dhkpvsvu:12701_0: vākyaṃ na bhinnaṃ varṇebhyo vidyate anupalambhanāt //247//
SA15dhkpvsvu:12703_0: na hi vayaṃ devadatta-ādi-pada-vākyeṣu dakāra-ādi-pratibhāsaṃ muktvā
SA15dhkpvsvu:12705_0: na ca apratibhāsamānaṃ grahaṇe grāhyatayā iṣṭam asty
SA15dhkpvsvu:12706_0: anyad vā iti śakyam avasātum / ākāra-antara-vat / anya-asambhavi
SA15dhkpvsvu:12707_0: kāryaṃ gamakam iti cet / syād etat yadi teṣu varṇeṣu satsu api
SA15dhkpvsvu:12708_0: tat kāryaṃ na syāt / na bhavati teṣām aviśeṣe api pada-vākya-antare
SA15dhkpvsvu:12709_0: abhāvād iti cet / na / teṣām aviśeṣa-asiddheḥ / aviśeṣaḥ pratyabhijñānāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:12710_0: siddha iti cet / na / tasya vyabhicārād anidarśanatvāc
SA15dhkpvsvu:12711_0: ca / varṇa-aviśeṣe api vākya-bhedāt pratipatti-bhedaḥ kārya-bhedaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:12712_0: syāt / sā ca vākyāt / tac ca atīndriyam iti kutaḥ syāt / saṃnidhāna-
SA15dhkpvsvu:12713_0: mātreṇa janane avyutpannasya api syāt / tasmān na vākyaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:12714_0: nāma kiṃcid artha-antaraṃ varṇebhyo yasya apauruṣeyatvaṃ sādhyeta /
SA15dhkpvsvu:12716_0: pakṣe pratyuktam / api ca astv artha-antaraṃ vākyam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:12717_0: tad aneka-avayava-ātmakaṃ vā syād anavayavaṃ vā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:12719_0: te api tasya bahavo avayavāḥ pṛthak prakṛtyā yady anarthakāḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:12721_0: arthavān eva ātmā vākyam / te ca avayavāḥ svayam anarthakāḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:12722_0: teṣu sa ātmā kalpanā-samāropitaḥ syāt / siṃhatā-ādi-van māṇavaka-
SA15dhkpvsvu:12723_0: ādiṣv iti pauruṣeya eva / atha mā bhūd eṣa doṣa iti pratyekaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:12803_0: parisamāpta-arthaṃ hi śabda-rūpaṃ vākyam / te ca avayavās tathāvidhāḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:12804_0: pṛthak pṛthag iti pratyekaṃ te vākyam / tathā ca na aneka-
SA15dhkpvsvu:12806_0: avayava-antara-apekṣā kāla-kṣepaś ca na syāt / tasya niṣkala-
SA15dhkpvsvu:12809_0: sakṛc śrutau ca sarveṣāṃ kāla-bhedo na yujyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:12810_0: atha mā bhūd avayava-antara-apratīkṣaṇena ekasmād eva avayavād
SA15dhkpvsvu:12811_0: vākya-artha-siddher aneka-avayavatva-hānir vākyasya iti sakṛt sarva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:12812_0: avayavānāṃ śravaṇam iṣyate / tadā api kāla-kṣepo na yukta eva /
SA15dhkpvsvu:12814_0: ca pṛthag arthavatām ekasmād eva tad-artha-siddher anyasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:12815_0: vaiyarthyāt / sakṛc śrutau ca pṛthag artheṣv adṛṣṭa-sāmarthyānām
SA15dhkpvsvu:12816_0: arthavattā ca na sidhyati / sahiteṣv artha-darśanād adoṣaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:12817_0: na / pṛthag asato rūpasya saṃghāte apy asambhavāt / artha-antara-anutpatteś
SA15dhkpvsvu:12818_0: ca / śabda-utpāda-vādinas tāvad ayam adoṣa eva / pṛthag
SA15dhkpvsvu:12820_0: kārya-viśeṣa-upayogāt / pratyekaṃ tv avayaveṣu samartheṣu vyarthā
SA15dhkpvsvu:12821_0: syād anya-kalpanā / atha punar ekam eva anavayavaṃ vākyam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:12823_0: ekatve api hy abhinnasya kramaśo gaty-asambhavāt //250//
SA15dhkpvsvu:12824_0: kāla-bheda eva na yujyate / na hy ekasya krameṇa pratipattir
SA15dhkpvsvu:12825_0: yuktā / gṛhīta-agṛhītayor abhedāt / krameṇa ca vākya-pratipattir
SA15dhkpvsvu:12902_0: prayuktair api yat kiṃcid vākyaṃ pratīyeta vinā vā
SA15dhkpvsvu:12903_0: varṇaiḥ / tair anukramavadbhir akramasya upakāra-ayogāt / akrameṇa
SA15dhkpvsvu:12904_0: ca vyāhartum aśakyatvāt / gaty-antara-abhāvāc ca / na eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:12905_0: vākye varṇāḥ santi tad ekam eva śabda-rūpaṃ vyañjaka-anukrama-
SA15dhkpvsvu:12906_0: vaśād anukrama-vad varṇa-vibhāga-vac ca pratibhāti iti cet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:12907_0: anukramavatā vyañjakena akramasya vyaktiḥ pratyuktā / vyakta-
SA15dhkpvsvu:12908_0: avyakta-virodhād avarṇa-bhāge ca vākye asakala-śrāviṇo asakala-vākya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:12909_0: gatir na syāt ekasya śakala-abhāvāt sakala-śrutir na vā kasyacit /
SA15dhkpvsvu:12911_0: ity api mithyā / tasya avarṇa-rūpa-saṃsparśinaḥ kasyacit kadācid
SA15dhkpvsvu:12912_0: apratipatteḥ / varṇānāṃ ca akrameṇa apratipatteḥ kuto akramam
SA15dhkpvsvu:12913_0: eka-buddhi-grāhyaṃ vākyaṃ nāma / na ca antya-varṇa-pratipatter
SA15dhkpvsvu:12914_0: ūrdhvam anyam aśakalaṃ śabda-ātmānam upalakṣayāmaḥ / na api
SA15dhkpvsvu:12915_0: svayam ayaṃ vaktā vibhāvayati / kevalam evaṃ yadi syāt sādhu
SA15dhkpvsvu:12916_0: me syād iti kalyāṇa-kāmatā-mūḍha-matir antyāyāṃ buddhau samāpta-kalaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:12917_0: śabdo bhāti iti svapnāyate / na hi smaryamāṇāyor
SA15dhkpvsvu:12918_0: api pada-vākyayor varṇāḥ krama-viśeṣam antareṇa vibhāvyante /
SA15dhkpvsvu:12919_0: akramāyāṃ buddhau paurvāparya-abhāvāt / teṣāṃ tat-kṛtaḥ pada-
SA15dhkpvsvu:12920_0: vākya-bhedānāṃ bhedo na syāt / na apy avarṇa-kramam anyac
SA15dhkpvsvu:12921_0: śabda-rūpaṃ paśyāma ity uktam / sati vā tad anityaṃ vā syān
SA15dhkpvsvu:12923_0: anityaṃ yatna-sambhūtaṃ pauruṣeyaṃ kathaṃ na tat /
SA15dhkpvsvu:12924_0: avaśyaṃ hy anityam utpattimat kutaścid bhavati / tathā hy ākasmikatve
SA15dhkpvsvu:12925_0: sattvasya deśa-ādi-niyamo na syād ity uktam / tac ca yatna-
SA15dhkpvsvu:12926_0: prerita-aviguṇa-karaṇānāṃ dṛṣṭam anyathā na iti / kāraṇa-dharma-
SA15dhkpvsvu:13001_0: darśanāt puruṣa-vyāpāra eva kāraṇam / ataḥ pauruṣeyaṃ syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:13003_0: atha tac śabda-rūpaṃ nityaṃ syād upalabhya-svabhāvaṃ ca /
SA15dhkpvsvu:13004_0: sa ca tasya svabhāvaḥ kadācin na apaiti iti nityam upalabhyeta /
SA15dhkpvsvu:13005_0: evaṃ hi sa nityaḥ syād yadi na kutaścit sāmarthyāt pracyavet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:13007_0: prāg eva niṣiddhatvāt / na api tasya upalabhya-ātmanaḥ kiṃcid upalambha-
SA15dhkpvsvu:13008_0: āvaraṇaṃ sambhavati / tasya sato api tadātmanam akhaṇḍayataḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:13009_0: sāmarthya-tiraskāra-ayogāt / na hi tatra atiśayam anutpādayan
SA15dhkpvsvu:13010_0: kiṃcitkaro nāma / akiṃcitkaraś ca kaḥ kasya āvaraṇam anyad
SA15dhkpvsvu:13011_0: vā iti nirloṭhita-prāyam etat / kuḍya-ādayo ghaṭa-ādīnāṃ kam atiśayam
SA15dhkpvsvu:13012_0: utpādayanti khaṇḍayanti vā yena āvaraṇam iṣyante / na brūmas
SA15dhkpvsvu:13013_0: te kaṃcid atiśāyayanti iti / api tu na sarve ghaṭa-kṣaṇāḥ sarvasya indriya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:13017_0: vā anyasya sarvadā syād ity uktam / te ca avyavahitāḥ pratighātinā
SA15dhkpvsvu:13021_0: samartha-nirodhāt sati kuḍye anyasya utpitsoḥ kāraṇa-abhāvena anutpatteḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:13023_0: ucyante / na prāg yogyasya pratibandhāt / tasya svabhāvād apracyuteḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:13024_0: athavā sambhavaty api bhāvānāṃ kṣaṇikānām anyonya-upakāro
SA15dhkpvsvu:13026_0: yad indriya-viṣaya-madhya-sthitam āvaraṇaṃ tat tau vijñāna-utpatti-
SA15dhkpvsvu:13027_0: vaiguṇya-tāratamya-bhedena atiśayayed api / āvaraṇa-bhede na śabda-
SA15dhkpvsvu:13028_0: ādau śruti-māndya-pāṭava-darśanāt / anyathā kvacid apy akiṃcitkarasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:13101_0: saṃnidhānasya apy asaṃnidhāna-tulyatvāt tasya idam ity /
SA15dhkpvsvu:13102_0: upasaṃhāro vikalpa-nirmita eva syāt / na vastv-āśrayaḥ / na ca
SA15dhkpvsvu:13103_0: samāropa-anuvidhāyino arthakriyāḥ / na hi māṇavako dahana-upacārād
SA15dhkpvsvu:13104_0: ādhīyate pāke / tasmāt satyām api kalpanāyām atat-parāvṛttayo
SA15dhkpvsvu:13105_0: bhāvā yathā-svabhāva-vṛttaya eva syuḥ / tat saty apy
SA15dhkpvsvu:13106_0: āvaraṇe vijñāpayeyur eva indriya-ādayaḥ / na ca tathā / tasmāt tena ādheyaviśeṣā
SA15dhkpvsvu:13107_0: iti gamyante / na khalv evaṃ nityānāṃ śabdānāṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:13108_0: kasmiṃścit saty atiśaya-hānir utpattir vā / tad yadi teṣāṃ jñāna-jananaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:13109_0: svabhāvaḥ sarvasya sarvadā sarvāṇi sva-viṣaya-jñānāni sakṛj
SA15dhkpvsvu:13110_0: janayeyuḥ / no cen na kadācit kasyacit kiṃcid ity ekānta eṣaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:13112_0: syād etat / na āvaraṇān nityaṃ sarve śabdā na śrūyante / api tu
SA15dhkpvsvu:13113_0: kiṃcit teṣāṃ pratipattau sahakāri pratiniyatam asti / tat kadācit
SA15dhkpvsvu:13114_0: kasyacid bhavati iti tat-kṛtam eṣāṃ kadācit kvacic śravaṇam iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:13115_0: kāmam anya-pratīkṣā astu niyamas tu virudhyate //252//
SA15dhkpvsvu:13116_0: na vai vayaṃ kāraṇānāṃ sahakārīṇi pratikṣipāmaḥ / kiṃ tv
SA15dhkpvsvu:13117_0: apekṣanta eva kāraṇāni tad-avasthā-upakāriṇam / tato labhyasya atiśayasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:13118_0: kārya-upayogāt / tathā śabdo api yadi kiṃcid apekṣya
SA15dhkpvsvu:13119_0: kāryaṃ kuryāt karotu pūrva-svabhāva-niyata ity etan na syāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:13121_0: na hy anupakāry apekṣyata ity uktam etat / tad-upakārasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:13122_0: ca arthāntaratve tasya iti sambandha-abhāva-ādayo apy uktāḥ / tasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:13123_0: ca ajñeyatvam / upakārād eva jñāna-utpatteḥ / tasmād eva śabdo na indriyaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:13124_0: na saṃnikarṣaṃ na ātmānam anyad vā kiṃcij jñāna-utpatti-samāśrayaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:13126_0: api ca / ete śabdā vyāpino vā syur avyāpino vā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:13127_0: sarvatra anupalambhaḥ syāt teṣām avyāpitā yadi /
SA15dhkpvsvu:13201_0: grahaṇa-pakṣe adoṣa iti cet / na / tatra api yogya-deśa-sthiti-tāratamya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:13203_0: bhedo na syāt / sati ca upalambha-pratyaye sarvatra deśe tulyam
SA15dhkpvsvu:13205_0: sarveṣām upalambhaḥ syād yugapad vyāpitā yadi //253//
SA15dhkpvsvu:13206_0: na hi kaścic śabda kvacin na asti iti sarve yugapad upalabhyeran
SA15dhkpvsvu:13209_0: saṃskṛtasya upalambhe ca kaḥ saṃskartā avikāriṇaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:13210_0: syād etat / sann api na sarvaḥ śabda upalabhyate sarveṇa / saṃskṛtasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:13211_0: saṃskṛtena eva upalambhād iti / tatra na saṃskṛtasya upalambho
SA15dhkpvsvu:13213_0: indriyasya hi saṃskāraḥ śṛṇuyān nikhilaṃ ca tat //254//
SA15dhkpvsvu:13214_0: tatra yadi saṃskṛtena upalambha ity asaṃskṛtena indriyo na upalabhate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:13215_0: yasya saṃskāra indriyasya kṛtaḥ sa sarva-śabdān yugapac śṛṇuyād
SA15dhkpvsvu:13219_0: atha api syāt / pratiniyatāḥ te saṃskārāḥ śabdānām / tatra kenacit
SA15dhkpvsvu:13220_0: saṃskṛtam indriyaṃ kasyacid eva grāhakam iti na yugapat sarva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:13221_0: śabda-śrutir iti / saṃskāra-viśeṣāc śruti-niyame indriyāṇām aneka-
SA15dhkpvsvu:13222_0: śabda-saṃghātasya kalakalasya śrutir na syāt / na hy ekaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:13223_0: śabdaḥ kalakalo nāma / bhinna-svabhāvānāṃ yugapac śravaṇāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:13225_0: sakṛc-śrutir bhrāntir iti cet / vaṃśa-ādi-svara-dhārāyāṃ gamaka-avayava-
SA15dhkpvsvu:13226_0: saṃhārāt saṃkulā pratipattiḥ syāt / vakṣyate ca atra pratiṣedhaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:13229_0: dhvanayaḥ kevalaṃ tatra śrūyante cen na vācakāḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:13301_0: na vai kalakale varṇa-pada-vākyāni śrūyante / dhvanīnām eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:13302_0: kevalānāṃ śravaṇāt / vācake ca pratiniyata-śakti-indriyaṃ na
SA15dhkpvsvu:13304_0: dhvanibhyo bhinnam asti iti śraddhā iyaṃ atibahv idam //256//
SA15dhkpvsvu:13305_0: na hi vayaṃ dhvaniṃ śabdaṃ ca vācakaṃ pṛthag-rūpam upalakṣayāmaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:13308_0: avyavasyantaḥ pravartayāmaḥ / tasmād dhvani-viśeṣa eva iyaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:13310_0: sthiteṣv anyeṣu śabdeṣu śrūyate vācakaḥ katham /
SA15dhkpvsvu:13311_0: na dhvanir ato bhinnas tena saha pṛthag vā / na hi pratyakṣe
SA15dhkpvsvu:13312_0: arthe para-upadeśo garīyān / tad ayaṃ sthiteṣv anyeṣu vyāhartṛṣu
SA15dhkpvsvu:13313_0: kevalam eva śabdaṃ śṛṇvaṃs tad-upalambha-pratyayānāṃ tad-anya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:13314_0: niṣpādane sāmarthya-abhāvaṃ pratyeti / yadi hi samarthāḥ syus
SA15dhkpvsvu:13315_0: tat-sādhitaṃ tad upalabhyeta / tat-svabhāvā eva punaḥ pratyayāḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:13316_0: kathaṃ kalakale artha-antaram ārabheran / na hi kāraṇa-abhede
SA15dhkpvsvu:13317_0: kārya-bhedo yuktaḥ / bhedasya ahetukatva-prasaṅgād ity uktam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:13318_0: na ca kalakale vācako na śrūyate / pada-vākya-vicchedānām upalakṣaṇāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:13321_0: tāni pratiniyata-śaktīny api indriyāṇi nānā-rūpān prati-śabda-niyatān
SA15dhkpvsvu:13322_0: dhvanīn śṛṇvanti na tv evaṃ śabdān iti kaḥ śabdeṣv eṣāṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:13401_0: nirvedaḥ / yad uktaṃ na dhvanayo bhedena vācakebhyaḥ siddhā
SA15dhkpvsvu:13402_0: iti kathaṃ na siddhāḥ / vacanād artha-pratipatteḥ / na hi dhvani-
SA15dhkpvsvu:13403_0: bhāgād alpīyasaḥ śabda-artha-pratītiḥ / na ca so anyaṃ sama iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:13405_0: bhāgeṣu dhvaniṣu na sambhavati iti siddham akrama-sattvaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:13406_0: śabda-rūpam / kramavad-bhāgaś ca dhvanir iti / tan na / akramasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:13407_0: kramavad-vyatirekiṇaḥ prāg eva niṣiddhatvāt / atiprasaṅgaś ca evam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:13411_0: eva / krama-bhāvina eva yathāsvaṃ karaṇa-prayogād bhinnā
SA15dhkpvsvu:13412_0: varṇa-bhāgāḥ karma-bhāgā vā krameṇa vikalpa-viṣayā yathā-
SA15dhkpvsvu:13413_0: saṃketam eva artha-pratītiṃ janayanti iti nyāyyam / kiṃ ca /
