SA15dhkpvsvu:14318_0: avaśyaṃ hy utpattimatā vināśena vinaṣṭavyam / tasmin vinaṣṭe
SA15dhkpvsvu:14321_0: yathā atra apy evam iti ced dhantur na amaraṇatvataḥ //272//
SA15dhkpvsvu:14322_0: vināśa-vināśe api ca vastunaḥ pratyāpattiḥ / na hi hantari hate api
SA15dhkpvsvu:14323_0: tadvataḥ pratyujjīvati iti cet / na / hantus tad-ghāta-hetutvāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:14324_0: na brūmo vināśa-hetor agni-daṇḍa-āder nivṛttau bhāvena bhavitavyam
SA15dhkpvsvu:14326_0: tan-nivṛttau kānyā gatiḥ svabhāva-sthiteḥ / hantā hi caitrasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:14327_0: na nāśa-kalpaḥ / kiṃ tarhi / daṇḍa-ādi-kalpaḥ / nāśa-kalpaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:14401_0: hy asya maraṇaṃ / tan-nivṛttau ca syād eva asya punarbhāvaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:14402_0: ananyatve api nāśasya syān nāśaḥ kāṣṭham eva tu /
SA15dhkpvsvu:14403_0: tasya sattvād ahetutvaṃ na ato anyā vidyate gatiḥ //273 /
SA15dhkpvsvu:14404_0: anartha-antara-bhūto vināśaḥ kāṣṭhāt / tad eva tad bhavati / tac
SA15dhkpvsvu:14405_0: ca prāg eva asti iti kim atra sāmarthyaṃ vahny-ādīnām / tasmāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:14406_0: tad-anupakārāt tena na apekṣyante kathaṃcit / na apy asya idam iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:14407_0: sambandham arhati / tasya upakāra-nibandhanatvāt / anyathā atiprasaṅgāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:14408_0: pāraṃparyeṇa upakāre apy avaśyam ayaṃ vikalpo anveti
SA15dhkpvsvu:14409_0: sa kim upakāro artha-antaram āhosvit tad eva iti / tad-arthāntaratve
SA15dhkpvsvu:14410_0: api tasya iti punar upakāratva-ādi-paryanuyogas tad-avasthā
SA15dhkpvsvu:14411_0: eva / tathā ananyatve / tasmāt sato rūpasya tattvānyattva-avyatikramāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:14413_0: tad-atat-kriyā-vikalo na kartā eva iti na kasyacid hetur ahetuś ca
SA15dhkpvsvu:14414_0: na apekṣate / tasmāt svayam ayaṃ bhāvas tat-svabhāva iti siddham /
SA15dhkpvsvu:14417_0: syād etad yasya api vināśo ahetukaḥ so avaśyaṃ nitya iti bhāvas
SA15dhkpvsvu:14418_0: tad-abhāva-lakṣaṇo vināśaś ca saha syātām iti / na / tasya nitya-anitya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:14419_0: dharma-ayogāt / na hy asaty ayaṃ vikalpaḥ sambhavati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:14420_0: tayor vastu-dharmatvāt / vināśasya ca akiṃcitvāt / bhavato hi
SA15dhkpvsvu:14421_0: kenacit sahabhāvaḥ syāt / na ca vināśo bhavati / tasmād adoṣaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:14423_0: yasmād bhāvasya nāśena na vināśanam iṣyate //275//
SA15dhkpvsvu:14424_0: katham asan vināśo bhāvaṃ nāśayet / ato avināśī bhāvaḥ syād
SA15dhkpvsvu:14425_0: ity aprasaṅga eva / vināśād bhāva-nāśa-anabhyupagamāt / yo hi
SA15dhkpvsvu:14501_0: vināśa iti kiṃcin na ity āha sa kathaṃ tato bhāva-nāśam icchet /
SA15dhkpvsvu:14502_0: katham idānīm asati vināśe bhāvo naṣṭo nāma / na hy asad-vināśā
SA15dhkpvsvu:14503_0: naṣṭā gaṇyante pratyutpanna-avasthāyām / na hi yo yena atadvān
SA15dhkpvsvu:14504_0: sa tena tathā vyapadiśyate pratīyate vā / yathā aśvo viṣāṇena /
SA15dhkpvsvu:14505_0: na vai vināśo na asty eva / sa tu na asti yo bhāvasya bhavanti / bhāva
SA15dhkpvsvu:14506_0: eva tu kṣaṇa-sthiti-dharmā vināśaḥ / tam asya svabhāvam uttara-
SA15dhkpvsvu:14507_0: kālaṃ vibhāvayanto vināśo asya bhūta iti yathā-pratīti vyapadiśanti
SA15dhkpvsvu:14508_0: ity uktam / na hi bhāvasya kiṃcit kadācid bhavati / sa eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:14509_0: kevalaṃ sva-hetubhyas tathābhūto bhavati / tan na kenacid bhavatā
SA15dhkpvsvu:14510_0: sa naṣṭaḥ / kiṃ tarhi / svabhāva eva asya yena sa naṣṭo nāma /
SA15dhkpvsvu:14511_0: kathaṃ tarhi idānīm ahetuko vināśo bhavati ity ucyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:14512_0: naśyan bhāvo apara-apekṣa iti taj-jñāpanāya sā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:14513_0: avasthā ahetur uktā asyā bhedam āropya cetasā //276//
SA15dhkpvsvu:14514_0: na bhāvo jāto aparasmān nāśaṃ pratilabhate tathābhūtasya eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:14516_0: svabhāva-jñāpanena artha-antaram iva dharmiṇo dharmaṃ cetasā
SA15dhkpvsvu:14517_0: vibhajya tan-mātra-jijñāsāyāṃ svabhāva eva tathā ucyate / tad etan
SA15dhkpvsvu:14519_0: nāśaṃ guṇaṃ tasya ca bhāvam āropya sahetukam ahetukaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:14521_0: svato api bhāve abhāvasya vikalpaś ced ayaṃ samaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:14522_0: nanv aparabhāvitve api vināśasya svata eva bhāvasya bhavato
SA15dhkpvsvu:14523_0: ayaṃ tattvānyattva-vikalpas tulyaḥ / tadā kim artha-antara-bhāve
SA15dhkpvsvu:14524_0: bhāvo na dṛśyate anarthāntaratve api tad eva tad bhavati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:14525_0: tan na kiṃcid asya jātam iti kathaṃ vinaṣṭo nāma / nanv atra /
SA15dhkpvsvu:14526_0: na tasya kiṃcid bhavati na bhavaty eva kevalam //277//
SA15dhkpvsvu:14527_0: ity uktam / na hy ayaṃ vināśo anyo vā kaścid bhāvasya bhavati ity
SA15dhkpvsvu:14528_0: āha / kiṃ tarhi / sa eva bhāvo na bhavati iti / yadi hi kasyacid bhāvaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:14529_0: brūyāt na bhāvo anena nivartitaḥ syāt / tathā ca bhāva-nivṛttau
SA15dhkpvsvu:14530_0: prastutāyām aprastutam eva uktaṃ syāt / na hi kasyacid
SA15dhkpvsvu:14531_0: bhāvena bhāvo na bhūto nāma / tadā na bhūto yadi svayaṃ na
SA15dhkpvsvu:14601_0: bhavet / na bhavati iti ca prasajyapratiṣedha eṣa na paryudāsaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:14602_0: anyathā iha api kasyacid bhāve na pratiṣedha-paryudāsayo rūpa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:14603_0: bhedaḥ syād ubhayatra vidheḥ prādhānyāt / evaṃ ca apratiṣedhāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:14604_0: kasyacit paryudāso api kvacin na syāt / yadi hi kiṃcit kutaścin
SA15dhkpvsvu:14605_0: nivarteta tadā tad-vyatireki saṃspṛśyeta / tat-paryudāsena / tac
SA15dhkpvsvu:14606_0: ca na asti / sarvatra nivṛttir bhavati ity ukte kasyacid bhāvasya eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:14607_0: pratītiḥ / tathā ca anena artha-antara-bhāva eva uktaḥ syāt / na tayoḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:14608_0: parasparaṃ vivekaḥ / aviveke ca na paryudāsaḥ / tad evaṃ vyatireka-
SA15dhkpvsvu:14609_0: abhāvād anvayo api na syāt / tasya eka-svabhāva-sthiti-lakṣaṇatvāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:14610_0: tat-sthitiś ca tad-anya-vyatireke sati syāt / sa ca na asti ity apravṛtti-
SA15dhkpvsvu:14611_0: nivṛttikaṃ jagat syāt / tasmād yasya nāśo bhavati ity ucyate sa
SA15dhkpvsvu:14612_0: svayam eva na bhavati ity uktaṃ syāt / na vai ghoṣa-sāmyād viṣaya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:14613_0: antara-dṛṣṭo vidhiḥ sarvatra yojanām arhati / na hi gardabha iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:14614_0: nāma-karaṇād bāleya-dharmā manuṣye api saṃyojyāḥ / tathā na
SA15dhkpvsvu:14615_0: caitrasya putro bhavati ity atra dṛṣṭo vidhir nāśe api virodhāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:14616_0: evaṃ ca abhidhāne api prayojanam āveditam eva / ataḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:14617_0: bhāve hy eṣa vikalpaḥ syād vidher vastv-anurodhataḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:14618_0: bhāvo avaśyaṃ bhavantam apekṣate / sa ca svabhāva eva / niḥsvabhāvasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:14619_0: kvacid vyāpāre samāveśa-abhāvāt / vyāpāra iti hi
SA15dhkpvsvu:14621_0: katham idānīṃ bhavaty abhāvaḥ śaśa-viṣāṇam ity ādi-vyavahāraḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:14622_0: na vai śaśa-viṣāṇaṃ kiṃcid bhavati ity ucyate / api tv evam
SA15dhkpvsvu:14623_0: asya na bhavati iti bhāva-pratiṣedha eva kriyate / api ca / vyavahartāra
SA15dhkpvsvu:14624_0: eva etad evaṃ vyāpāra-vad iva samāropya ādarśayanti
SA15dhkpvsvu:14625_0: prakaraṇena kenacit / na tu tat tathā / sarva-artha-vivecanaṃ hi
SA15dhkpvsvu:14626_0: tatra tattvaṃ na kasyacit samāveśaḥ / na khalv evaṃ vināśo vastuni
SA15dhkpvsvu:14627_0: tad-bhāvāt / asāv api yadi vaktṛbhir evaṃ khyāpyate na
SA15dhkpvsvu:14628_0: tu svayaṃ tathā tadā na kiṃcid bhavati iti iṣṭam eva / tasmāt svayaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:14701_0: bhavan svabhāvo vikalpa-dvayaṃ na ativartate tattvam anyattvam
SA15dhkpvsvu:14702_0: iti / atattvam eva svabhāvasya anyattvam / na hi rūpa-rasayor
SA15dhkpvsvu:14703_0: apy anyad eva parasparam anyattvam / svabhāva-apratibandho
SA15dhkpvsvu:14704_0: anyattvam iti cet / ko ayaṃ pratibandho nāma yena sa ca na
SA15dhkpvsvu:14705_0: syāt / na anya-svabhāvaś ca / janma iti cet / sarva-kāraṇānāṃ parasparam
SA15dhkpvsvu:14706_0: avācyatā syāt / tathā ca sarvaḥ sarvasya kathaṃcid upayogi
SA15dhkpvsvu:14707_0: iti na kaścit kutaścid anyaḥ syāt / evaṃ ca avācyatā ity api kāryakāraṇabhāva
SA15dhkpvsvu:14708_0: eva śabda-antareṇa uktaḥ syāt / na artha-bhedaḥ / svabhāva-ananugamanaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:14709_0: tv anyattvaṃ brūmaḥ / sa ca svabhāvavatāṃ parasparam
SA15dhkpvsvu:14710_0: asty eva ity anyattvam eva / na ca taj-janma-lakṣaṇāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:14712_0: vyabhicāra-avirodhāt / tato dharma-bhedāc ca anyattvam / jñāna-kṛtaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:14713_0: pratibandha iti cet / syād etat / yat-pratipatti-nāntarīyakaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:14714_0: yaj-jñānaṃ tad-gatau niyamena tat-pratibhāsanāt tad atad-rūpam
SA15dhkpvsvu:14715_0: apy avācyam iti / na / tasya niḥsvabhāvatvāt svayam / sa eva hi
SA15dhkpvsvu:14716_0: tasya svabhāvo yaḥ pratibhāti / svabhāvavattve asya tadvat pratibhāsa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:14718_0: api na tad-rūpaṃ jñānam iti kasya kim āyattā pratipattiḥ / na
SA15dhkpvsvu:14719_0: ca yad yad āyattā-pratītikaṃ tasya svabhāva-pratibhāsa eva naśyati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:14720_0: prakāśa-āyatta-pratītīnām iva nīla-ādīnām / kā vā tasya pratyāsattiḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:14721_0: tatra yat tasminn anātma-rūpe pratīyamāne sa svayaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:14722_0: pratyupatiṣṭhate / atiprasaṅgo hy evaṃ syāt / pratīyamānasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:14723_0: tad-upādānatā iti cet / ko ayam upādāna-arthaḥ / na kāryakāraṇabhāvo
SA15dhkpvsvu:14724_0: anabhyupagamāt / abhyupagame vā na kārya-kāraṇe anyonya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:14726_0: pratyāsattir iti cet / nanu sa eva asati pratibandhe na yuktā ity ucyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:14801_0: na akārya-kāraṇayoḥ kaścit pratibandha iti ca uktam / yat -pratipatti-
SA15dhkpvsvu:14802_0: nāntarīyakaṃ yaj-jñānam ity api taj-jñāne sati syāt / na hi yo
SA15dhkpvsvu:14803_0: vijñāne svarūpeṇa asvarūpa-asaṃsargeṇa na pratibhāsate tasya kiṃcij
SA15dhkpvsvu:14804_0: jñānam / tad-abhāvān na sidhyati avācyatā-lakṣaṇam artha-
SA15dhkpvsvu:14805_0: rūpasya / tad bhavatā vastutas tattvānyattva-bhājā bhavitavyam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:14806_0: yasya tu vinaśyato bhāvasya na kiṃcid bhavati / tena
SA15dhkpvsvu:14807_0: na bhāvo bhavati ity uktam abhāvo bhavati ity api //278//
SA15dhkpvsvu:14808_0: yad apy ayaṃ bhāvasya abhāvo bhavati ity āha / tad api bhāvo
SA15dhkpvsvu:14809_0: na bhavati ity eva uktaṃ bhavati / evaṃ hi sa nivartito bhavati /
SA15dhkpvsvu:14810_0: pratiṣedhe vidher asambhavāt / tata eva asya vināśe na kaścid hetuḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:14812_0: apekṣyeta paraḥ kāryaṃ yadi vidyata kiṃcana /
SA15dhkpvsvu:14813_0: yad akiṃcitkaraṃ vastu kiṃ kenacid apekṣyate //279//
SA15dhkpvsvu:14814_0: sati hi kārye kāraṇaṃ bhavati / na ca naśyato bhāvasya kiṃcit
SA15dhkpvsvu:14815_0: kāryam ity uktam / tasmād yo nāma nāśa-hetuḥ sa bhāve na
SA15dhkpvsvu:14816_0: kiṃcit karoti ity akiṃcitkaro na apekṣyaṇīyaḥ / tat kathaṃ idānīm
SA15dhkpvsvu:14817_0: anutpanna-atiśayas tad-avastha eva bhāvo naṣṭo nāma /
SA15dhkpvsvu:14818_0: nanv atiśaya-utpattāv api sa eva tasya atiśaya utpanna iti kathaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:14819_0: sa naṣṭo nāma / tena na ayaṃ tad-avastho naṣṭo nāma / yena svayaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:14820_0: na bhavati tena naṣṭaḥ / na artha-antara-utpādād ity uktam / na hy
SA15dhkpvsvu:14821_0: atiśaya-utpattyā svayaṃ na bhūto nāma / abhāvasya sarva-atiśaya-upākhyā-
SA15dhkpvsvu:14823_0: ca utpatti-samāveśa-lakṣaṇatvāt / tasmān na abhāve kasyacid bhāva-upakṣepo
SA15dhkpvsvu:14825_0: etena ahetukatve api hy abhūtvā nāśa-bhāvataḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:14827_0: yo api manyate ahetuke api vināśe abhūtvā asya bhāvāt sattā-anityatvaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:14901_0: ca durnivāram / abhūtvā bhavann ahetuko bhavati ity api
SA15dhkpvsvu:14902_0: viruddham iti / so apy anena eva pratyākhyātaḥ / kasyacid bhāvān abhyupagamāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:14904_0: yathā keṣāṃcid eva iṣṭaḥ pratigho janmināṃ tathā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:14905_0: nāśaḥ svabhāvo bhāvānāṃ na anutpattimatāṃ yadi //281//
SA15dhkpvsvu:14906_0: atha api syād / bhavatu nāma svabhāva eṣa bhāvānāṃ ya ime kṣaṇa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:14907_0: sthiti-dharmāṇāḥ / sa tu utpattimatām eva bhaviṣyati / na hi svabhāva
SA15dhkpvsvu:14908_0: iti sarvaḥ sarvasya svabhāvo bhavati pratigha-ātmatā-vat /
SA15dhkpvsvu:14911_0: na anitye rūpa-bhedo asti bhedakānām abhāvataḥ //282//
SA15dhkpvsvu:14912_0: na vai pratigho anyo vā svabhāvo akasmāt pratiniyamavān / yādṛśī
SA15dhkpvsvu:14913_0: tu sva-hetoḥ śakti-sthitis tādṛśaṃ phalaṃ bhavati iti hetu-svabhāva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:14914_0: niyamāt phala-svabhāva-niyamaḥ / ākasmikatve apy asya ukto
SA15dhkpvsvu:14917_0: tathā syān na anyaḥ / sarva-ākāra-janmanāṃ vināśa-darśanāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:14918_0: nanv idam apy aniśceyam eva sarva-ākāra-janmāno naśyanti iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:14919_0: tāsām aniḥśeṣa-darśanāt / vicitra-śaktayo hi sāmagryo dṛśyante /
SA15dhkpvsvu:14920_0: tatra kācit syād api yā anaśvara-ātmānaṃ janayet / na / jñeya-adhikārāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:14921_0: ye kadācit kvacit kenacij jñātāḥ santo na jñāyante
SA15dhkpvsvu:14922_0: teṣāṃ sattā-anubandhī nāśa iti brūmaḥ / ta eva kṛtakā anityāḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:14923_0: sādhyante / na hy ayaṃ sambhavo asti yat te jñāna-janana-
SA15dhkpvsvu:14924_0: svabhāvāḥ punar anaṣṭā na janayeyur apekṣeran vā param /
SA15dhkpvsvu:14925_0: taj-janana-svabhāvasya niṣpatteḥ / na ca teṣv anapekṣeṣu kasyacit
SA15dhkpvsvu:14926_0: kadācit kiṃcij jñānaṃ nivarteta / na ca evaṃbhūtaṃ kiṃcid asti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:14927_0: sarvasya kenacit kadācit jñānāt / jñāna-mātra-arthakriyāyām apy
SA15dhkpvsvu:15001_0: asāmarthye vastv eva na syāt / tathā hi tal-lakṣaṇaṃ vastv iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:15002_0: vakṣyāmaḥ / tasya ca vināśa-avyabhicārāt sa sattā-anubandhī /
SA15dhkpvsvu:15003_0: pratyākhyeyā ata eva eṣāṃ sambandhasya api nityatā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:15004_0: ata eva yathā uktād vastu-mātra-anubandhād vināśasya śabda-vat
SA15dhkpvsvu:15005_0: sambandha-nityatā api pratyākhyeyā / yā ca śabda-śaktir yogyatā-ākhyā
SA15dhkpvsvu:15006_0: artha-pratipattyā āśrayo jaiminīyair varṇyate sa artha-antaram
SA15dhkpvsvu:15007_0: eva na bhavati / tathā hi / yogyatā iti rūpa-atiśaya eva bhāvānām ity
SA15dhkpvsvu:15008_0: āveditaṃ prāk / astu vā artha-antaram / tathā api
SA15dhkpvsvu:15009_0: sambandha-doṣaiḥ prāg uktaiḥ śabda-śaktiś ca dūṣitā //283//
SA15dhkpvsvu:15010_0: ukto hi sambandha-artha-antara-vāde aneka-prakāro doṣaḥ / tena eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:15011_0: sā śabda-śaktir dūṣitā iti na punar ucyate / api ca /
SA15dhkpvsvu:15012_0: na apauruṣeyam ity eva yathā artha-jñāna-sādhanam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:15013_0: dṛṣṭo anyathā api vahny-ādir aduṣṭaḥ puruṣa-āgasā //284//
SA15dhkpvsvu:15014_0: bhavantu nāma apauruṣeyā vaidikāḥ śabdāḥ tathā api sambhāvyam
SA15dhkpvsvu:15015_0: eva eṣām ayathārtha-jñāna-hetutvam / na hi puruṣa-doṣa-upadhānād
SA15dhkpvsvu:15016_0: eva artheṣu jñāna-vibhramaḥ / tad-rahitānām api pradīpa-ādīnāṃ nīla-utpala-
SA15dhkpvsvu:15017_0: ādiṣu vitatha-jñāna-jananāt / tad ime śabdāḥ saṃskāra-nirapekṣāḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:15018_0: prakṛtyā ca artheṣu pratibhāna-hetavaḥ syuḥ / svabhāva-viśeṣād
SA15dhkpvsvu:15019_0: vahny-ādi-vat / vitatha-vyaktayaś ca niyamena eva niyama-
SA15dhkpvsvu:15020_0: kāraṇa-abhāvād ayuktam iti cet / avitatha-vyakti-niyame kiṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:15022_0: vyakti-niyamaḥ kiṃ na kalpyate / athavā vahny-ādi-vad eva artheṣu
SA15dhkpvsvu:15023_0: ubhaya-jñāna-hetutvaṃ syāt / na hy apauruṣeyā api vahny-ādaya
SA15dhkpvsvu:15024_0: ekatra yathārtha-jñāna-hetavo api sarvatra tathā bhavanti iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:15025_0: tathā śabdānām apy apauruṣeyatve apy ubhayaṃ syād iti / bhavatu
SA15dhkpvsvu:15027_0: na punar nityeṣu śabdeṣv etad asti / nanv evaṃvidho anyatra
SA15dhkpvsvu:15028_0: apy asty eva dharmas teṣām api saṃketa-balād anyathā-vṛtteḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:15029_0: kārya-janana-svabhāva-sthitau ca eṣāṃ samaya-āder apekṣaṇīyasya abhāvāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:15101_0: tataḥ pratītir artheṣu sarvasya sarvadā syāt / na ca asti
SA15dhkpvsvu:15102_0: tasmān na śabdāḥ sthita-svabhāvā iti / api ca /
SA15dhkpvsvu:15103_0: na jñāna-hetutā eva syāt tasminn akṛtake mate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:15104_0: nityebhyo avastu-sāmarthyān na hi janma asti kasyacit //285//
SA15dhkpvsvu:15105_0: yady akṛtakaḥ śabdo na tasmād artheṣu pratītir eva syāt / pratīti-
SA15dhkpvsvu:15107_0: sambhāvanā-ayogāt / evam ayaṃ janako na evam iti vivecanīyasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:15108_0: rūpa-bhedasya abhāvāt / na yādṛśo asya ajanakas tādṛśa eva janako
SA15dhkpvsvu:15109_0: yuktaḥ / anya-apekṣā api niṣiddhā eva / tasmān na nityānāṃ kvacid
SA15dhkpvsvu:15110_0: vijñāna-janana-sāmarthyam / kadācid ajanane nityam ajanana- prasaṅgāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:15111_0: kārya-sātatya-adarśanāc ca na te kathaṃcit kartāra ity
SA15dhkpvsvu:15112_0: ukta-prāyam / yā apy etā nitya-abhimateṣv ākāśa-ādiṣu pratipattayas
SA15dhkpvsvu:15113_0: tā api na tat-svabhāva-bhāvinyaḥ / tathā hi /
SA15dhkpvsvu:15115_0: jāyante buddhayas tatra kevalaṃ na artha-gocarāḥ //286//
SA15dhkpvsvu:15117_0: iti tasmin saty asyāḥ kāraṇe yogye sā bhavaty eva /
SA15dhkpvsvu:15118_0: tad yadi nityānāṃ padārthānāṃ svalakṣaṇe kasyacit jñānaṃ syāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:15119_0: sarvasya sarvadā syāt / kārya-viśeṣā hi vyaktayaḥ kathaṃcit
SA15dhkpvsvu:15121_0: vastu-viśeṣam apekṣanta iti yuktam / tathā akārya-viśeṣo nityo
SA15dhkpvsvu:15122_0: bhāvaḥ kenacid gṛhyamāṇas tat-kāraṇa-apekṣo yadi grahaṇam asya
SA15dhkpvsvu:15123_0: janayet yuktaṃ yat tena eva gṛhyeta / tac ca sthita-svabhāvatvān
SA15dhkpvsvu:15124_0: na sambhavati iti / sarveṇa samaṃ gṛhyeta na vā kenacid iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:15125_0: san kenacid dṛṣṭo na nityaḥ kaścid atīndriyaḥ syāt / na ca etad asti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:15126_0: tasmād artha-sāmarthya-anapekṣāḥ samāropita-gocarā āntaram eva upādānaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:15128_0: eva ākāśa-ādiṣu sarvasya sambhavanti iti / tasmān na aparāvṛtti-
SA15dhkpvsvu:15201_0: dharmāḥ śabdāḥ / tattve vā kuta etad avitatha-artha-pratītaya
SA15dhkpvsvu:15202_0: eva iti / na hy agnir himasya bheṣajam ity ādiṣu śīta-pratighāta-
SA15dhkpvsvu:15203_0: sāmarthyaṃ loka-prasiddhaṃ agneḥ khyāpyata iti sarvaṃ tathā
SA15dhkpvsvu:15205_0: lokaḥ sva-saṃketam anuvidadhad evaṃ pratyeti āhosvic śabda-
SA15dhkpvsvu:15206_0: svabhāva-sthiter iti sandehaḥ / loka-icchayā api parāvartyamānāḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:15207_0: śabdāḥ punar anyatra anyathā dṛśyanta iti loka-prasiddhy-anuvidhāne
SA15dhkpvsvu:15208_0: api sambhavaty eṣām anyathābhāvaḥ / tasmāt kasyacid avaiparītya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:15209_0: darśane api sarveṣāṃ tathābhāvo na sidhyati / akṛtaka-svabhāvatve
SA15dhkpvsvu:15210_0: api hy eṣāṃ kaścin mithyā-artha-niyato api syād iti svabhāva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:15212_0: mithyātvaṃ kṛtakeṣv eva dṛṣṭam ity akṛtaṃ vacaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:15214_0: atha yan mithyā-arthaṃ vacanaṃ tad akhilaṃ kṛtakam iti hetu-vyatirekeṇa
SA15dhkpvsvu:15216_0: satya-artham iti syād vinā apy anvayena / yo hi yena avyāptas
SA15dhkpvsvu:15217_0: tatra tad-vyatirekaḥ śaṅkyeta / na ca viruddhayor ekatra sambhavo
SA15dhkpvsvu:15218_0: asti / asambhave ca vijātīyasya gaty-antara-abhāvād iṣṭa-artha-siddhes
SA15dhkpvsvu:15220_0: vyatireka-mātreṇa eva siddher iti / satyam etat yadi vipakṣayor
SA15dhkpvsvu:15221_0: vyāpyavyāpakabhāvaḥ sidhyet / sa tu na siddhaḥ / yasmāt
SA15dhkpvsvu:15222_0: hetāv asambhave anukte bhāvas tasya api śaṅkyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:15224_0: yadi hetoḥ sādhya-vipakṣe abhāvaḥ sidhyet tadā sādhya-vyatirekaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:15225_0: hetu-vyatireko vyāpnuyāt / na ca tatra tasya asambhave
SA15dhkpvsvu:15226_0: pramāṇaṃ paśyāmaḥ / na ca aviruddha-vidhiḥ pratiṣedha-sādhano
SA15dhkpvsvu:15227_0: yuktaḥ / atiprasaṅgāt / na ca ekatra dṛṣṭasya anyatra asambhava
SA15dhkpvsvu:15228_0: eva pṛthag viruddha-sahabhāvinām api darśanāt / anityatva-vat
SA15dhkpvsvu:15229_0: prayatnānantarīyaka-itarayor / na ca tathāvidhasya adarśanād asattvam
SA15dhkpvsvu:15301_0: na asattā-siddhir ity uktaṃ sarvato anupalambhanāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:15303_0: na hy ayaṃ puruṣa-mātrakaḥ sarvaṃ draṣṭuṃ samartho yena asya
SA15dhkpvsvu:15304_0: darśana-nivṛttyā na tathā syāt / yasya hi jñānaṃ jñeya-sattāṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:15305_0: na vyabhicarati sa evaṃ bruvāṇaḥ śobheta adarśanān na asti iti /
SA15dhkpvsvu:15306_0: tad ime svabhāva-deśa-kāla-viprakarṣeṇa santo apy anupalakṣyāḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:15307_0: syuḥ / tathā hi / ko atyantaparokṣe arthe saṃvādanam itarad
SA15dhkpvsvu:15308_0: vā sarva-darśī vacanasya akṛtakasya itarasya vā vibhāvayituṃ samarthaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:15309_0: pratipāditaṃ ca etat kvacit tathā dṛṣṭānām apy arthānāṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:15310_0: punaḥ kathaṃcid anyathābhāvaḥ yathā kvacid deśe madhurāṇi
SA15dhkpvsvu:15312_0: ca idānīm atad-darśinā tāni pratikṣeptavyāny eva iti / tasmād akṛtakaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:15313_0: ca syād syān mithyā-arthaṃ ca iti na virodhaṃ paśyāmaḥ / na
SA15dhkpvsvu:15314_0: hi iyam anupalabdhir adṛśya-ātmasv abhāva-sādhikā ity uktam / tena
SA15dhkpvsvu:15315_0: yat kiṃcin mithyā-arthaṃ tat sarvaṃ pauruṣeyam ity aniścayād
SA15dhkpvsvu:15317_0: anvayo vyatireko vā sattvaṃ vā sādhya-dharmiṇi /
SA15dhkpvsvu:15319_0: tathā ca uktam / ya eva tu ubhaya-niścita-vācī sa sādhanam dūṣaṇam
SA15dhkpvsvu:15321_0: iti / ko hy adṛṣṭa-virodhasya sambhavaṃ pratyācakṣīta / tad ayaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:15324_0: sa eva asya sapakṣaḥ syāt sarvo hetur ato anvayī //291//
SA15dhkpvsvu:15401_0: yat kiṃcin mithyā-arthaṃ tat sarvaṃ pauruṣeyam iti hetu-vipakṣeṇa
SA15dhkpvsvu:15402_0: sādhya-vipakṣasya vyāptis tad-abhāve abhāva-siddhau syāt / tad-abhāve
SA15dhkpvsvu:15403_0: bhavatas tena vyāpty-ayogāt / yā eva ca vijātīyayor vyāvṛtti-siddhiḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:15405_0: pratiṣedha-dvayāc ca vidhi-siddhir iti kā ananvaya-avyatireka-vyāpti-
SA15dhkpvsvu:15406_0: siddhiḥ / tan na kaścid hetur ananvayo nāma / eka-vyavacchedasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:15408_0: api tathā syāt / na / vyatireka-vyavacchedasya bhāva-rūpatvāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:15411_0: rūpatvāt / abhāva-rūpas tu vyatirekaḥ sa ca vyatiricyamāno
SA15dhkpvsvu:15412_0: bhāvam upasthāpayati na evaṃ nairātmya-ādayaḥ svabhāva-viśeṣāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:15414_0: lakṣaṇatvād ātmanaḥ / tad rūpaṃ nairātmyaṃ na ātma-nivṛtti-
SA15dhkpvsvu:15415_0: mātram anyathā nirupākhye kṛtakatva-ādy-ayogān na tato nairātmya-
SA15dhkpvsvu:15416_0: siddhiḥ syāt / ātma-vyavacchedena nirātmano bhāvasya parāmarśād
SA15dhkpvsvu:15417_0: adoṣa iti cet / paryudāsena vastu-saṃsparśād tad eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:15418_0: vastu-rūpaṃ nairātmyam āyātam / yasya api na abhāva-rūpo vyatirekas
SA15dhkpvsvu:15419_0: tasya bhāva-rūpa-vyavacchede na bhāva-siddhiḥ syād iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:15420_0: na anvaya-anuṣaṅgaḥ / tathā anairātmye api na bhāva-siddhiḥ / yathā
SA15dhkpvsvu:15421_0: na idaṃ nirātmakaṃ jīvaccharīraṃ prāṇa-ādimattvād iti vipakṣayor
SA15dhkpvsvu:15423_0: dṛṣṭam / tad-abhāve ca na asti iti svayaṃ na bhavad api prāṇa-ādīnāṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:15424_0: na ātmani siddhim upasthāpayati / tathā sādhye api prāṇa-ādibhir
SA15dhkpvsvu:15425_0: vyudasyamānaṃ syāt kevalam / nairātmye abhāvāt prāṇa-
SA15dhkpvsvu:15426_0: ādayas tan-nirasanā na ātma-upasthāpanāḥ / tatra bhāva-asiddheḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:15427_0: na ca nairātmya-nivṛttyā ātma-siddhiḥ syāt / vipakṣa-vyatireka-darśane
SA15dhkpvsvu:15428_0: api prasaṅgāt / tan na viparyaya-vyāptir vyatireka-asiddhau /
SA15dhkpvsvu:15429_0: tat-siddhir eva ca anvaya-siddhiḥ / asiddhau vā tad-vyatireka-nivṛtti-
SA15dhkpvsvu:15430_0: siddhāv api tad-asiddhir iti sādhye api prasaṅgaḥ / tan na ananvayā
SA15dhkpvsvu:15501_0: apauruṣeyān nivṛttāv api na satya-arthatvam / prakāra-antara-sambhavāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:15502_0: dvairāśye tu śabdānām etat syād eka-nivṛttau gaty-antara-
SA15dhkpvsvu:15503_0: abhāvāt / te tv anarthakā api syur iti na iṣṭasiddhiḥ / artha-pratīter
SA15dhkpvsvu:15504_0: na anarthakā iti cet / eṣa puruṣa-vyāpāraḥ syāt / artha-antara-vikalpa-vat /
SA15dhkpvsvu:15506_0: anye anyathā vyācakṣate / tad-anusāreṇa ca keṣāṃcit pratītiḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:15507_0: tathā ayam anarthakeṣv artha-vikalpaḥ puruṣa-kṛtaḥ na tu śabda-
SA15dhkpvsvu:15509_0: na hi prakṛtyā prakāśanās tam apekṣante vahny-ādayaḥ / puruṣas
SA15dhkpvsvu:15510_0: tu sva-samaya-vyāpāram ācakṣāṇa upadiśati iti nyāyyam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:15512_0: ca eko naisargiko anyas tu pauruṣeya iti duravasānam / asti
SA15dhkpvsvu:15513_0: viśeṣaḥ pramāṇa-saṃvāda iti cet / etad uttaratra niṣetsyāmaḥ na asty
SA15dhkpvsvu:15516_0: idānīm apauruṣeyam / santi puruṣa-kṛtāny api vākyāni kānicid
SA15dhkpvsvu:15517_0: evaṃvidhāni iti teṣv api prasaṅgaḥ / tadvad eṣām apy abhimata-
SA15dhkpvsvu:15518_0: arthavattā pauruṣeyī ca syāt pramāṇa-anurodhinī ca / api
SA15dhkpvsvu:15519_0: ca idaṃ mantrā apauruṣeyāś ca iti vyāhataṃ paśyāmaḥ / tathā hi /
SA15dhkpvsvu:15521_0: yuktam / yady ete mantrāḥ kasyacit samayo yathā mat-praṇītam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:15523_0: anena arthena yojayāmi iti parārtha-paratā-anurodhena anyato vā kutaścid
SA15dhkpvsvu:15524_0: hetoḥ kṛtaḥ syāt tadā mantra-prayogāt kadācit artha-
SA15dhkpvsvu:15526_0: atha api bhāva-śaktiḥ syād anyatra apy aviśeṣataḥ //292//
SA15dhkpvsvu:15527_0: na vai puruṣa-samayān mantrebhyo artha-siddhiḥ / kiṃ tarhi / bhāva-
SA15dhkpvsvu:15528_0: svabhāva eṣa yad ime kathaṃcin niyuktāḥ phaladāḥ / tat tarhi
SA15dhkpvsvu:15601_0: rūpaṃ varṇānāṃ sarvatra aviśiṣṭam iti yathākathaṃcit prayuktād
SA15dhkpvsvu:15602_0: api phalaṃ syāt / varṇā eva hi mantro na anyat kiṃcit / tat-kramo
SA15dhkpvsvu:15604_0: kramasya arthāntaratvaṃ ca pūrvam eva nirākṛtam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:15605_0: na varṇa-vyatirikto anyaḥ krama iti niveditam etat / avyatireke
SA15dhkpvsvu:15606_0: ca varṇā eva mantras / te ca aviśiṣṭāḥ sarvatra iti sarvadā phaladāḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:15607_0: syuḥ / upaplavas tv alpīyaso api kramasya bhraṃśād dṛṣṭaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:15609_0: ca / sarva-bhraṃśe tu kasyacid eva samayasya ananuṣṭhānād asaṃnidher
SA15dhkpvsvu:15610_0: na artha-anarthau / kiṃ ca kramasya arthāntaratve anarthāntaratve
SA15dhkpvsvu:15611_0: vā varṇa-ātmanas tat-krama-ātmano vā mantrasya artha-hetor
SA15dhkpvsvu:15614_0: yato hi bhāva-śakteḥ phala-utpattiḥ sā avikalā iti na phala-vaikalyaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:15615_0: syāt / na hi kāraṇa-sākalye kārya-vaikalyaṃ yuktam / tasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:15619_0: yadi mantrā vidhānād anyato vā kaṃcit svabhāva-atiśayam āsādayeyuḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:15620_0: sa tatra samartho apekṣyaḥ syāt / na ca nityeṣv etad
SA15dhkpvsvu:15621_0: asti ity uktam / tat kim ayam asamartho apekṣyata ity anapekṣāḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:15622_0: sadā kuryur na vā kadācid anatiśayāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:15623_0: sarvasya sādhanaṃ te syur bhāva-śaktir yad īdṛśī /
SA15dhkpvsvu:15625_0: yadi bhāva-śaktayā eva mantrāḥ siddhi-pradā na te kaṃcit parihareyur
SA15dhkpvsvu:15626_0: yajamānam anyaṃ vā / na hy anyaṃ prati svabhāvo atad-bhāvo
SA15dhkpvsvu:15627_0: bhavati / tasya tena anapakarṣaṇād anyena ca anutkarṣaṇāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:15702_0: abhāvāt / ata eva asya asaṃskāryatvāt prayoktā api na asti / ataḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:15704_0: saṃskāryasya api bhāvasya vastu-bhedo hi bhedakaḥ /
SA15dhkpvsvu:15705_0: prayoktṛ-bhedān niyamaḥ śaktau na samaye bhavet //295//
SA15dhkpvsvu:15706_0: ādheyaviśeṣā hy anityā bhāvāḥ / tad-hetoḥ svabhāva-bhede tataḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:15707_0: samāsādita-atiśayatvād anyatra anyathā syuḥ / na abhede / kāraṇa-aviśeṣe
SA15dhkpvsvu:15708_0: kārya-aviśeṣāt / viśeṣe tasya ahetukatva-prasaṅgād ity ukta-
SA15dhkpvsvu:15709_0: prāyam / tad ime mantrāḥ svabhāva-atiśayāt phaladāyinaḥ kāryā
SA15dhkpvsvu:15710_0: api na śūdra-ādi-prayoge apy anyathā syuḥ / śūdra-vipra-abhidhānayoḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:15713_0: asti / tayor jāti-bheda iti cet / sa khalv ākṛti-guṇa-śakti-
SA15dhkpvsvu:15714_0: bhede dṛṣṭo gava-aśva-vat / anupadeśaṃ ca enaṃ lokaḥ pratipadyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:15715_0: na tadvad anayoḥ kaṃcid api guṇaṃ viniyataṃ paśyāmaḥ / apaśyantaś
SA15dhkpvsvu:15716_0: ca kathaṃ bhedaṃ pratipadyemahi / yo apy ayaṃ nāma-
SA15dhkpvsvu:15717_0: bheda-anvayo loke pratīti-bhedaḥ so asaty api jāti-bhede vyāpāra-
SA15dhkpvsvu:15719_0: tad ime aviśiṣṭena prayujyamānā mantrās tato aviśiṣṭam eva
SA15dhkpvsvu:15720_0: svabhāvam āsādayanti / tena aviśeṣeṇa eva phaladāḥ syuḥ / yadā
SA15dhkpvsvu:15721_0: tu samayād ebhyaḥ phalaṃ tadā ayam adoṣaḥ / samayakārasya
SA15dhkpvsvu:15722_0: ruceḥ phala-utpatti-niyamāt / svabhāva-vṛttayo hi bhāvās tan-mukhena
SA15dhkpvsvu:15724_0: yathākathaṃcid vṛtteḥ / yad api prayoktā phalam aśnuta iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:15726_0: vā paśyāmaḥ / tad ubhayaṃ viśeṣa-janmani syāt / anyathā /
SA15dhkpvsvu:15728_0: yena tataḥ kaścit phalam aśnute anyo na /
SA15dhkpvsvu:15729_0: prayogo yady abhivyaktiḥ sā prāg eva nirākṛtā //296//
SA15dhkpvsvu:15801_0: na hi nityānāṃ kācid abhivyaktir ity uktam yato abhivyañjakaḥ
SA15dhkpvsvu:15803_0: vyaktiś ca buddhiḥ sā yasmāt sa phalair yadi yujyate /
SA15dhkpvsvu:15804_0: syāc śrotaḥ phala-sambandho vaktā hi vyakti-kāraṇam //297//
SA15dhkpvsvu:15806_0: na hi śabdasya anyataḥ svarūpa-pariṇāmo vyaktir na apy āvaraṇa-vigamanam /
SA15dhkpvsvu:15807_0: kiṃ tu tad-viṣayā pratītir aśrūyamāṇe avyakta-vyapadeśāt /
SA15dhkpvsvu:15808_0: tatra yadi buddhi-hetur vaktā syāt tat tulyaṃ śrotary api iti
SA15dhkpvsvu:15809_0: so api phalaṃ vaktṛ-vad aśnuvīta / na hi vaktuḥ kaścid anyas
SA15dhkpvsvu:15811_0: na vaktur iti viśeṣa iti cet / kaḥ punar upayogo vaktuḥ śrotari
SA15dhkpvsvu:15812_0: yena upādhir iṣyate / tataḥ śabda-śrutir iti cet / nanu tad eva idaṃ
SA15dhkpvsvu:15813_0: paryanuyujyate kathaṃ tata iti / asambandhāt / viṣaya-upanayanād
